185a1(khri brgyad): bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las rnams dang / las yang
185a2(khri brgyad): dag par blangs pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gnas kyi rnam pa dang / rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gnas pa khams du ma dang / 
185a3(khri brgyad): khams sna tshogs pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen pa dang / sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi 'dun pa du ma dang / mos pa sna tshogs pa
185a4(khri brgyad): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa dang / sa dmas can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa'i shes pa
185a5(khri brgyad): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa dang / kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu ma khyen pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par
185a6(khri brgyad): thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa
185a7(khri brgyad): dang sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/ des tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma'i bar dag kyang rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang
185a8(khri brgyad): bcas par rjes su dran pa dang lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho dang skye ba dag kyang gzigs te/ sems can gang dag gi lus dang / ngag dang / 
185b1(khri brgyad): yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa log par lta ba dang / 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa dag rgyu de dang / rkyen des lus zhig ste/ shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan
185b2(khri brgyad): 'gro log par ltung ba dag tu skye ba dang / sems can gang dag lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa yang dag par lta ba 'phags pa rnams la skur ba mi 'debs pa
185b3(khri brgyad): dag rgyu des lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi lha'i nang du skye ba dag kyang gzigs la des lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las shin tu 'das pa/ sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba
185b4(khri brgyad): dang / kho dag bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro dag tu las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'gro ba dag kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen
185b5(khri brgyad): pa dang / zag pa rnams zad pas zag pa med cing / sems rnam par 'gro ba dngashes rab rnam par grol ba dag kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
185b6(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa ste/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jig pa bzhi gang zhe na/ nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
185b7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ kye ma de la chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang
185b8(khri brgyad): bcas pa dang / ge slong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjesu mi mthong te rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
186a1(khri brgyad): bas bde ba 'thob cing bag tsha ba med pa 'thob la/ mi 'jigs pa thob ste/ gnas kyi khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gan su dam
186a2(khri brgyad): bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ su
186a3(khri brgyad): yang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o// zhe bya ba dang / de bzhin du sbyar teng zag bzad do zhes dam bcas na de la khyod
186a4(khri brgyad): kyis zag pa 'di dag zad do zhes chos dang 'thun par bad dag la rgol ba med pa dang / ngas gang dag bar dugacod pa'i cho su gsungs pa de dag bstan kyang bar du gcod par mi
186a5(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro zhes chos dang 'thun par bdag la rgol ba med pa dang ngas gang sdug bsngal gang yang dag par zad par byed pa nges par 'byin par byed pa'i lam du gsungs pa de bstan
186a6(khri brgyad): kyang sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par mi 'gyur ro zhes lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcos pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu'i 'jig
186a7(khri brgyad): rten na chos dang 'thun par 'ga' zhig bdag rgol lo snyam pa'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu de yang dag par rje su ma mthong bas bde ba thob cing bag tsha ba med pa thob la/ mi 'dzags
186a8(khri brgyad): pa thob ste gnas kyi khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnasu dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ 
186b1(khri brgyad): lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ su yang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis bskor bar bya'o// zhes bya ba ste/ de dag ni mi 'jigs pa
186b2(khri brgyad): bzhi zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i
186b3(khri brgyad): tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o// de dag kyang gang zhe na/ don la dmigs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la
186b4(khri brgyad): dmigs pa dang / spobs pa la dmigs pa dag go/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba med pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i spyod pa yongasu
186b5(khri brgyad): dag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag mi mnga' bas gzhan la la zhig gis shes pa su 'ong zhes gang bcab par dgongs pa/ de bzhin gshegs
186b6(khri brgyad): pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa dang po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi spyod pa yongasu dag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi spyod pa yongasu ma dag pa mi mnga' bas
186b7(khri brgyad): gzhan la la zhig gis shes su 'ongs zhes gang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa gnyis pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thugs kyi spyod
186b8(khri brgyad): pa yongs su dag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi spyod pa yongasu ma dag pa mi mnga' bas gzhan la la zhig gis she su 'ong zhes gang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mngar ste/ 
187a1(khri brgyad): 'di ni bsrungs pa med pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
187a2(khri brgyad): pa chos ston pa'i tshe kha cig rna blags te gus par nyan cing / bka' nyan par sems nye bar 'jog la/ chos kyi rjesu mthun pa'i chos la nan tan byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes
187a3(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur/ yid bde bar mi 'gyur/ thugs yang yeng por mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o// kha cig rnami klag gus par mi nyan tsang bka' nyan pa'i
187a4(khri brgyad): sems nye bar mi 'jog la/ chos kyi rje su mthun pa'i chos la nan tan mi byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa dkun nas mnar semasu mi 'gyur/ mi zod par mi 'gyur/ 
187a5(khri brgyad): thugs mi ches par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o// kha cig rna blags te gu sa par nyan cing / bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar 'jog
187a6(khri brgyad): la chos kyi rjesu mthun pa'i chos la nan tan du byed/ kha cig rna mi klog gus par mi nyen cing / bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar mi 'jog la chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la nan
187a7(khri brgyad): tan mi byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa 'am/ kun nas mnar sems gnyi su mi 'gyur te/ thams cad dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du btang snyom su gnas pa
187a8(khri brgyad): 'di ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsnyel pa mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid gang zhe na/ gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod
187b1(khri brgyad): pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir ro// sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las mi yol ba ste/ 'din bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin
187b2(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgribs pa spangs pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad na nyon mongs pa rnams spang kyang de dag la lus kyi 'gyur ba dag 'byung gi/ de bzhin
187b3(khri brgyad): gshegs pa la ni de dag mi mnga' ste/ de dag ni bag chags kyi sgrib pa spangs pa zhes bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
187b4(khri brgyad): thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi brda nye bar bzungs ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba la gzigs pa'i phyi dar dus thams cad du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum 'jig
187b5(khri brgyad): rten la rtog pa mdzad pa ste/ yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can ma tha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba la gzigs pa rtag tu
187b6(khri brgyad): 'byung ba 'di ni thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
187b7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ bar der de bzhin gshegs pa la khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / bsnyel ba med pa dang / sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang / 
187b8(khri brgyad): tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang 'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang dran pa snyams pa
188a1(khri brgyad): med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang / lus
188a2(khri brgyad): kyi las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / yid kyi las thams cad
188a3(khri brgyad): ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs
188a4(khri brgyad): pa'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa ste/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
188a5(khri brgyad): bco brgyad ces bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/ nga gi dmigs pa ni dngos po med pa/ dbang byed pa na
188a6(khri brgyad): dran pa/ rnam pan napa/ mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
188a7(khri brgyad): rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba dang / phyag dang zhabs 'jam
188a8(khri brgyad): nang bzhon sha chags pa dang / bdun mtha dang / sor po ring ba dang / ting pa langs pa dang / bu che ning drang ba dang / zhabs 'bar 'bur med pa dang / chu'i ma gyen du/ 
188b1(khri brgyad): drugs pa dang / byin par rigs me rgyas su dang / phyag rnaMs nang ring sa dang / 'dums kyis bsgrubs rngub pa dang / mdags se drwa ba dang / lpags pa srab pa dang / 
188b2(khri brgyad): re re nas skyes shing g.ya su 'khyil ba dang / zhal la mdzod spu'i mtshan dnga' ba dang / ro stod seng ge 'dra ba dang / dpung mgo legs par grub pa dang / thal gong rgyas pa dang / ro bra
188b3(khri brgyad): ba mkhyen pa dang / shing n+ya gro ta ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang / ljags ring zhing srab pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / 'gram pa seng
188b4(khri brgyad): ge lta bu dang / tshems shin tu dkar ba dang / tshems mnyadam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshem das bzhi bcu mnga' ba dang / spyan mtho mthing dang / ba'i
188b5(khri brgyad): rdzi ma lta bu rnamaso// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag da nga zhabs kyi mthil dag la 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa rnam pa thams
188b6(khri brgyad): cad du yongasu rdzogs pa 'di lta ste dper na rus pa 'am ba so la gzugasu brkos pa lta bu dag mnga' bas na phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no// zhabs kyi mthil gnyis
188b7(khri brgyad): mnyam par sa la 'jog cing zhabs zhum pa med pas na zhab shin tu gnas pa yin no// ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel bas na phyag dang zhabs 'brel pa yin no// 
188b8(khri brgyad): shing bal gyi 'dab ma ltar phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon shas chags la snyibs phyag dang zhabs gzhon sha chags pa yin no// phyag dang zhabs kyi bol gnyis dang / dpung mgo gnyis
189a1(khri brgyad): dang / lhag nga'i phyogs mthobs na mdun mnubayin no// drug dang nabs kyis sa rang bas na/ mar ma rang bayin na/ zhas
189a2(khri brgyad): kyi stong pa che bas rting pa yangs pa yin no// khru bdun du 'phags pas drang zhing sgyu mo g.yo bas na/ sku che zhing drang ba yin no// dbus mo'i sgang dang long bu shin tu mi mngon pas na
189a3(khri brgyad): zhabs 'bar 'bur med pa yin no// spug las byig su bum par 'khyil cing byin du phyogs pas na mu'i sku gyen du phyogs pa yin no// byin pa dgas me bya'i byin pa dang / mangs
189a4(khri brgyad): rgyu'i snying po ltar byin rim gyis zlum pas na byin pa ri dag so dargyal bu yin no// phyag sbom zhing ring ba'i phyir dam btud kyang phyag gi pus mo sleb pas na phyag sbom zhing ring sa
189a5(khri brgyad): yin glang po che dang / rta cang shes ltar gas / 'i mtshan shin tu mdzes par sgrub su nub pas na 'ad sa kyilnga bsrub su nub pa yin no// gser shin du byung
189a6(khri brgyad): pa'i mdog 'dra bas na mdog gser 'dra ba yin no// lpags pa gser dang dngul shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing sku la rdul gyis mi gos pas na lpags pa srab pa yin no// 
189a7(khri brgyad): sru shin tu 'gyes shing gcig pu gnyis ma yin pas na spu re re nas skye zhing gas su 'khyil ba yin no// me tog kun da dang / zla ba dang / ba'i 'o ma dang / ba mo'i mdog ltar
189a8(khri brgyad): dkar zhing nyi ma dang zla brgya pas kyang shin tu 'phags par 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin 'tshams legs par brgyan bas na zhal la mdzod spu'i mtshan mnga' ba yin no// sku'i stong
189b1(khri brgyad): 'phel ka che bas na ba stad seng ge 'dra ba yin no// mgur zlum zhing khyil ler 'dug pas na dpung mgo legs par grub pa yin no// gser gyi glegs ma shin tu rnam par byi
189b2(khri brgyad): lta bus mthong ka shin tu rgyas pas na/ thal gong rgyas pa yin no// ljags rlung dang / mkhris pa dang bad kan gyis nyams pa mi mnga' zhing / ro thams cad so sor rnam par rig
189b3(khri brgyad): pa dang mthun par rnam par rig pas ro bro ba mkhyen pa yin no// sku'i khrun dang / 'dom gyi tshad du mnyam pas na shing n+ya gro ta ltar chu zheng gab pa yin no// dbu'i gtsug tor
189b4(khri brgyad): zlum zhing lhag la gas su 'khyil ba dang ldan zhingadadabu leg par grub cing blta na sdug pas na dbu gtsug to/ dar dang ldan pa yin no// ul ba la dmar po 'dab
189b5(khri brgyad): ma'i mdog 'dra zhing yangs pas na ljags ring zhing srab payin no// dbyig gi snying po dang / byaka la bing ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas na tshangs pa'i dbyangs
189b6(khri brgyad): yin no// me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar shin tu legs par grub cing zlum la rgyas shing blta na sdug la mkhrang bas na 'gram pa seng ge lta bu yin no// me tog ku mu
189b7(khri brgyad): ta dang / zla ba dang dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dkar pa'i tshems mnga' bas na tshems shin tu dkar ba yin no// tshems mtho dpa' med pas na tshems mnyam pa yin no// 
189b8(khri brgyad): tshems mtshams mdod pas tshems thags bzang ba yin no// tshems bla 'og lhag chad med cing mnyam pas na/ tshems bzhi bcu mngar ba yin no// dkar
190a1(khri brgyad): gnag gi phyogs ma 'dres shingashin tu rnam par dag la/ dmar po'i rgyun dang ma 'dres pas spyan mthon ting yin no// 
190a2(khri brgyad): spyan gyi rdzi ma bla 'og legs par gzhol zhing ma 'dzings pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan ma ni ba'i rdzi ma lta bu yin no// de la bla ma rnams la bsu bsgyel dang / chos
190a3(khri brgyad): nyan pa dang / me tog 'phreng 'bul ba dang / gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten la sogs pa'i gan du 'gro ba dang / g.yog 'khor gyi sbyin pa byas pas na/ phyag dang zhabs
190a4(khri brgyad): mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de ni g.yog 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas yin no// / yi dam la brtan pas na/ zhabs shin tu gnas
190a5(khri brgyad): par gyur te/ de ni mi g.yo ba'i snga ltas yin no// bsdu ba 'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba/ dang / don spyod pa dang / don 'thun pa dag kun tu bsten
190a6(khri brgyad): pas na/ phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel par gyur te/ de ni myur du 'du ba'i snga ltas yin// bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bldag pa dang / bca' ba bsod pa dag gi sbyin pa byas pas
190a7(khri brgyad): na/ phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa dang / bdun mtho bar 'gyur te/ de gnyis ni bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bldag pa dang / bca' ba dang / bsod pa dag
190a8(khri brgyad): 'thob pa'i snga ltas yin no// gsad pa las thar par byas pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba la sogs pa byin pas srog gi rim gro byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spang ba kun tu brten pas na/ 
190b1(khri brgyad): sor mo ring ba dang / ting ba yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang bar gyur te/ de dag ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas yin no// dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang / bzung ba rnams mngon pa/ 
190b2(khri brgyad): spel cing / yongasu 'grib par ma byas pas na/ zhabs 'bar 'bur med pa dang / sku'i spu gyen du phyogs par gyur te/ de gnyis ni chos yongs su mi nyams pa'i snga ltas yin no// 
190b3(khri brgyad): bzo'i las dang / rig pa'i gnas rnams gus par byas shing byin pa dang blangs pas na byin pa ri dgas e ne ya'i lta bur gyur te/ de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas yin no// bdog
190b4(khri brgyad): cing yod pa'i nor blangs na/ med ces mi zer zhing / byin pas na/ phyag sbom zhing ring bar gyur te/ de/ ni dbang sbyin zhing 'dul bar byed pa'i snga ltas yin no// mdza'
190b5(khri brgyad): bshes dang / gnyen 'dab dang / gnyen phan tshun 'brel pa dag gi dbyen ma byas shing bye bar gyur pa dag bsdu mas pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par blangs pa dang
190b6(khri brgyad): gsang ba'i tshig bsrungs pas na 'doms kyi sba ba sbub su nub par gyur te/ de ni sras mang ba'i snga ltas yin no// stan dang / gos dang / bgo ba rnams dang / khang bzangs dang / 
190b7(khri brgyad): gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzangs po dag gi sbyin pa byas pas na mdog gser 'dra ba dang / lpags pa srab par gyur te/ de gnyis ni stan dang gos dang / bgo ba rnams dang / 
190b8(khri brgyad): khang bzangs dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po dag 'thob pa'i snga ltas yin no// 'du 'dzi spangs pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / pha ma dang / phu nu la sogs
191a1(khri brgyad): / pa bla ma rnams ji ltar rigs pa'i gan su bkod cing rim gro byas pa dang / sbyin pa byin pa dang / mgu bar byas pas na/ s+phu re re nas skye zhing g.yasu
191a2(khri brgyad): 'khyil pa dang / zhal mdzod spu'i mtshan mnga' bar gyur te/ de gnyi zla med pa'i snga ltas yin no// mu cor mi smra zhing gzhan la mi smod pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / legs par
191a3(khri brgyad): smra ba la rjesu 'thun par byed pa dang / seng ge'i sgra dang 'thun par smra bas na/ ro stod seng ge 'dra ba dang / dpung mgo legs par grub par gyur te/ de gnyis ni mi tshim pa'i snga lta sa yin// 
191a4(khri brgyad): nad pa rnams la rtsi dang / g.yog 'khor dang / sman dadang / 'thun pa'i kha zas byin zhing rim gro byas pas na 8/ thal gong rgyas pa dang / ro bro bar mkhyen par gyur te/ de gnyis
191a5(khri brgyad): ni gnod pa mi mnga' ba'i snga ltas yin no// kun dga' ra kha dang / 'dun sa dang / bsil khang dang / khro na pa dang / bgrod dka' bar zam pa gdags pa dang / kha
191a6(khri brgyad): zas dang / me tog phreng ba dang / gtsug lag khang dang / 'dug gnas la sogs pa bya ba la thog mar zhing / gzhan dag kyang spro ba bskyed pa dang / gzhan dag la lhag par byin pas na/ shing / 
191a7(khri brgyad): n+ya gro ta ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu gtsug tor dang ldan par gyur te/ de gnyis ni mnga' dbang chen po brnyes pa'i snga ltas yin no// yun ring po nas 'jam zhing snyan pa dang / gnyen pa'i
191a8(khri brgyad): tshig brjod pa na ljags ring zhing srab pa dang / chags pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur te/ de gnyis ni gsung gi lam yan lags lnga dang ldan pa'i dbyangs brnyes pa'i snga ltas yin no// 
191b1(khri brgyad): gsung gi lams nasag lnga dang ldan pa'i dbyangs ni kun tu shes par bya zhing / rnam par rig par bya ba dang / mnyan par 'os shing mi mthun pa med pa dang / zabacing dbyangs rjes
191b2(khri brgyad): 'byung ba dang / ma tshugs shing / rna ldan pa dang / me 'khrugs shing gis la ba'o// sun ring nas cig rgyal ba slas shing / dus smrabs na/ 'gram pa sed ges bur gyur te/ 
191b3(khri brgyad): don tshig btsun pa'i thams yin no// rim gro zung ba dang / brnyas pa med pa dang / 'dze ba sangs su dag pasan/ choms shi dkar ba dang / tshems mnyam par gyur te/ de gnyis
191b4(khri brgyad): ni labar tha'as bsags pa'i sngags min no// dran ni dang panas bden ring bra ma med par srung bsar/ tshems dbugs pazang ba dang / tshems pa'i bcum par bar gyur te/ 
191b5(khri brgyad): gnyis ni 'khor mi byed pa'i snga sngas yin// ltung ba dang / spong bar byed pa la yang chags pa dang / spang ba med cing rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis nges par rtogs pas na/ rgyun
191b6(khri brgyad): mthon tang dang pa'i rnams gyur / de gnyis ni kun nas mdzes pa'i sngasmras yin no// rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen ba'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis yin te/ ded/ 
191b7(khri brgyad): garang bzhin tu'ang kyis slong gsum gyi stang chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / bzhed na 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag kyang / snang bas khyab par mdzad do// de bzhin
191b8(khri brgyad): gshegs pa sems can rnams lathugs brlabs 'ang 'dams gang tsam du byin gyis rlob par mdzad do// gal te bcom ldan 'dasa'ong 'dam gang bar byin gyis ma brlab su zinan/ ra
192a1(khri brgyad): bzhin gyi'od kyi zil gyis non par gyur pas/ nyim dang / zla bdag gi 'od kyang mngon par mi 'gyur la/ zla ba dang / 
192a2(khri brgyad): byed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo khyud kor dag kyang med par mi 'gyuraro// rang bzhin gyisgra dbyangs kyis kyang stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams mngon par go bar
192a3(khri brgyad): mdzad do// bzhed na gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / ji snyed du sdang bas khyab par 'gyur ba de snyed du dbyangs kyis mngon par go bar yang mdzad do// rab 'byor de la de bzhin
192a4(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i dpe byang bzang po brgyad dru gang zhe na 'di dalta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad la ma chags pa'i thugs
192a5(khri brgyad): mnga' bas na/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni gnyen 'dab la bya/ mas pa bzhin du/ sems can la phan pa dang / bde/ 
192a6(khri brgyad): bar dgongs pa'i thugs mnga' bas nA/ sen mo mdog sdum pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs mtho ba'i rgyud du skyes pas na sen mo mtho ba yin
192a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ tshul kha na ma tho ba med pas na/ sor mo rnams zlum pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen por bsags/ 
192a8(khri brgyad): pas na/ ser mo rnams rgyas pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rim gyis yang dag par bsgrubs pas na/ sor mo rnams byin gyis phra ba yin/ 
192b1(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku dang gsung dang / thugs kyi phrin las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba dag shin tu dben pas na/ rtsa mi mngon pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
192b2(khri brgyad): 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i mdung pa 'grel par mdzad pas na/ rtsa mdud med pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dgongs pa shin tu dben pas nas/ 
192b3(khri brgyad): long bu mi mngon pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na mi mnyam pa thams cad las 'grol bar mdzad pas na/ zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin// sangs/ 
192b4(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ mi'i seng ge yin pas na/ seng ge'i stabasu gshegs pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i glang po chen po yin pa/ 
192b5(khri brgyad): na/ glang po che'i stabasu gshegs pa yin// sangasargyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ ngang pa'i rgyal po na/ ra na mkha' la bzhud pas na/ ngang pa'i lta ba su gshegs
192b6(khri brgyad): pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyes bu'i khyu mchog yin pas na/ khyu mchog gi stabasu gshegs pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
192b7(khri brgyad): 'thun pa'i las mnga' bas na/ galas phyog su ldog cing gshegs pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bltan mdzes pas na/ mdzes par gshegs pa yin no// 
192b8(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon pa mi mnga' bas na/ mayo bar gshegs pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ tshul
193a1(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pas na/ sku'i 'khril bag chags pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
193a2(khri brgyad): sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu sbyangs pas na/ sku byi dor byas pa lta bu yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rim gyis ston pas na/ sku rim par 'tsham
193a3(khri brgyad): ba yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sku dang gsung dang thugs shin tu gtsang bas na/ sku gtsang ba yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
193a4(khri brgyad): rang bzhin gyi thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pas na sku 'jam pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad/ das rnams ni/ rang bzhin gyis thugs rnam par dag pa
193a5(khri brgyad): na/ sku rnam par dag pa yin no// sangs rgyas brtsa ma ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos 'dul ba shin tu yongasu rdzogs pas na/ mtshan yongasu rdzogs pa yino// sangs
193a6(khri brgyad): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ yangs shing mdzes pa'i ston gsungs pas na/ sku khong lag yangs shing bzang ba yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can
193a7(khri brgyad): thams cad la thugs mnyam pas na/ gom pa snyoms pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ shin tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pas na/ shin tu gzhon mdog can
193a8(khri brgyad): yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' bas na sku zhum pa med pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan pas nas ni/ mi dge
193b1(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba rnams byang bas na/ sku rgyas pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ yang 'byung ba'i srid par mtshams sbyor bzad pas na/ su shin tu grims pa
193b2(khri brgyad): yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / nying lag rnams shin tu legs par ston pas na/ yan lag dang nying lag
193b3(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par 'byes pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pas na/ zigs pa rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa
193b4(khri brgyad): yino// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' bas na sku zlum pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 
193b5(khri brgyad): 'khor ba'i skyon rnams rab tu sbyangs pas na/ sku skab sa phyin pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rna mas ni/ nga rgyal gyi rtse mo bcom pas na/ sku ma rnyongs
193b6(khri brgyad): pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos zad par byed pa rnam par zlog pas na/ phyal phyang nge ba yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
193b7(khri brgyad): chos shin tu zab mo rnams thug su chud pas na/ lte ba zab pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'thun par 'dzin par zhugs pa'i slob ma mnga' bas na/ 
193b8(khri brgyad): ba g.yas phyog su 'khyil ba yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni slob mgun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mngar bas na kun nas mdzes pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom
194a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin tu gtsang bas na kun nas skyong gtsang ba yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos
194a2(khri brgyad): 'dul ba nag po ston pa dang bral bas na sku la sme ba dang gnag bag med pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ shing blta ltar yang ba'i lus thob par gyur pa'i chos
194a3(khri brgyad): ston pas na/ phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen 'dab dang / skye bo phal po che la snyoms par byams pas dge sbyong chen po yin
194a4(khri brgyad): bas na/ phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu zab cing bstan par gnas pas na/ phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin no// 
194a5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bzod pa rgya chen kho'i chos ston pas na phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ ha cang phal che ba
194a6(khri brgyad): ma yin pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bas na/ zhal ha cang yang mi ring ba yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'jig rten thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur ston pas na/ 
194a7(khri brgyad): zhal la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du gtong zhing 'dul bas na/ ljags mnyen pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom
194a8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnams ni/ ston cha 'phra ba'i tshogs pa dang ldan pas na ljags srab pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byis pa'i skye bo chags can rnams gting
194b1(khri brgyad): dpag dka' ba'i chos kyis 'dul bar mdzad pas ljags dmar ba yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po che'i nga ro dang / 'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa mi mnga' bas/ 
194b2(khri brgyad): na glang po che'i nga ro dang / 'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ snyan cing mnyen la 'jam par smra ba'i slob ma mnga' bas na/ gsungs snyan cing
194b3(khri brgyad): mnyen la 'jam pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las log pas na/ mche ba zlum pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtse ba rnan pa
194b4(khri brgyad): 'dul ba la mkhas pas na/ mche ba rno ba yin no// sangs da rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos 'dul ba mchog tu dkar bas na mche ba dkar ba yin no// sangs rgyas
194b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni cha mnyam pa'i sa la bzhugs pas na mche ba mnyam pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par rtogs pa rim
194b6(khri brgyad): gyis ston pas na/ mche ba byin gyis phra ba yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi mthon po la bzhugs pas na/ shangs mtho ba yin no// sangs rgyas bcom
194b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ba mnga' bas na shangs gtsang ba yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ gzigs pa rnam par dag pas na/ spyan rnam par dag pa yin
194b8(khri brgyad): no sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos shin tu yangs pa dang ldan pas na/ spyan yangs pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can/ 
195a1(khri brgyad): gyi tshogs shin tu bsags pas na rdzim stug pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang lha ma yin dang / mi'i nang nam
195a2(khri brgyad): chung mig dkar gnag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma rangs pa lta bu dang ldan pa mchog rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar byas shing bstod pas na spyan dkar gnag 'byes shing pad ma'i 'dab ma rangs pa lta bu
195a3(khri brgyad): yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni rtag tu yangs pa ston pas na smin tshugs rings pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'jam pos 'dul ba la mkhas pas/ 
195a4(khri brgyad): na smin ma 'jam pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nga rnams ni kun nas skyon mkhyen pas na smin ma'i spu mnyam pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
195a5(khri brgyad): ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis skye bo rgyud snum pa rnams 'dul bar mdzad pas na smin ma sdum pa yin no// sang / sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos mchog tu yang / 
195a6(khri brgyad): pa ston pas na snyan shal stug cing ring ba yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i g.yul las rgyal bas na snyan mnyam pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
195a7(khri brgyad): 'das rnams ni sems kyi rgyud ma nyams pa'i sems can rnams 'dul bar mdzad pas na snyan gyi dbang po mi nyams pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lte bar gyur pa thams cad
195a8(khri brgyad): rnam par spangs pas na dpral ba legs par 'byes pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / phas kyi rgol ba rnams rab tu bcom pas na 'phral
195b1(khri brgyad): bar byes che ba yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lamadam pa shin tu yong su rdzogs pas na dbu shin tu rgyas pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na yul
195b2(khri brgyad): la rung bltar dka' ba rnam par bzlog pas na bu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i bag la nyal ba
195b3(khri brgyad): rnams spangs pas nang bu sgra stug pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dgongs pa 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thug su chud pas na dbu sgra 'jam pa yin no// sangs rgyas
195b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs mnga' da bas nang bu skra mi 'dzangs pa yin no// sangs rgya das bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu mi brlang ba'i gsung mnga'
195b5(khri brgyad): bas na dbu snga mo bshor ba yin no// sangs rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi spos kyi me tog gis skye bo rnams la mthun par bsgrubs pas na dbu skra dri/ 
195b6(khri brgyad): zhim pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dpal be'u dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil pas brgyan ste/ rab 'byor de
195b7(khri brgyad): dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mnga' ba'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de ltar sbyin pa gnyis po zang zing gi sbyin pa
195b8(khri brgyad): dang chos kyi sbyin pa dag gis sems can rnams yang dag par sdud par byed de/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yino// 
196a1(khri brgyad): la pa sa na pas khyo rjin pa ma la sa kyi pa / @
196a2(khri brgyad): sotshan pa dngag sa 'dis ldan padang /  par smra deni byung pa dang / dngam
196a3(khri brgyad): mam ma ma sa ba m+bu gzhan ma kyang chuchu par me pa' sem sa dang chen pa sa shes rab pa ma khye pa sa srung pa kyang chu
196a4(khri brgyad): mas 'jig ngas pa nags ga / byang chags ni par zung pa lam
196b1(khri brgyad): shig yi ge gcig sa mkhas par gyis shig/ mi ge gnyis la mkhas par gyis shig/ mi ge bani bcwa rtsa lnga'i bar dag la mkhas par gyis shig/ mi ge gcig gas
196b2(khri brgyad): thams cad 'grib pa dang ldan par rjes su rtog par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis kyis thams cad 'grib pa dang ldan par rjesu rtogs par gyis shig/ yi ge gsum gyis thams cad
196b3(khri brgyad): 'grib pa dang ldan par rjesu rtogs par gyis shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bar dag gis thams cad 'grib pa dang ldan par rjes su rtogs par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig tu mi ge
196b4(khri brgyad): bzhi bcu rtsa lnga 'dus par bsgoms shig/ yi ge bzhi pa cu rtsa lnga rnams su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgoms shig/ ces 'doms par byed do// rab 'byor byang chub
196b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin no// yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bar dgal mkhas pa yin no// yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa
196b6(khri brgyad): 'dus par bsgom pa mkhas pa yin no// yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga rnams su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgoms pa la mkhas pa yin te/ yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par byas nas/ 
196b7(khri brgyad): yi ge med pa mngon par bsgrubs pa la mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos la mkhas pa dang / 
196b8(khri brgyad): yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/ de chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pas chos ston te/ yi ge rnams kyi yi ge med pa'i chos ston pa bzhin no// rab 'byor chos de ni yi ge
197a1(khri brgyad): med pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
197a2(khri brgyad): gal te mtha' las 'das pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa stong pa nyid kyi slad du sems can yang gtan dmigasu ma mchis la chos kyang dmigs su ma mchis shing chos kyi rang bzhin yang dmigs su ma
197a3(khri brgyad): mchis lags na bcom ldan 'das 'on ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol
197a4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin dpal spyod pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa da la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
197a5(khri brgyad): pa dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / ba sam gtan bzhi la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
197a6(khri brgyad): bzhi la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / 
197a7(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 
197a8(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang
197b1(khri brgyad): po brgyad bcu dang / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la spyod pa dang ji ltar sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid lags/ de dag ni sems can dang / sems/ 
197b2(khri brgyad): can du gdags pa yang dmigs su ma mchis lags te/ sems can dang sems can du gdags pa dmig su ma mchis pas gzugs kyang dmig su ma mchis la// rnam par shes
197b3(khri brgyad): pa'i bar du yang dmigs su ma mchis pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang dmigs su ma mchis la de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
197b4(khri brgyad): brgyad kyi bar dag kyang dmigs su ma mchis lags so// sems can dang sems can du gdags pa dmigs su ma mchis pa de la ni gzugs kyang ma mchis la/ de bzhin
197b5(khri brgyad): du dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu'i bar dag kyang ma mchis lag/ sa so// dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu'i ba ra dag ma mchis lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'on
197b6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ji ltar sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur to/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
197b7(khri brgyad): chen po de sems can rnams mchis pa ma lags pa'i chos rnams la yang dag par 'dzin du stsol cing phyin ci log la sbyor bar bgyid pa 'am/ gcig tu mi 'gyur lags drang / de
197b8(khri brgyad): ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ byang
198a1(khri brgyad): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
198a2(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smra ba de bzhin te/ rab 'byor sems can dmigs su med pas nang stong pa nyid du rigs
198a3(khri brgyad): par bya'o// byi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar du rig par bya'o// 
198a4(khri brgyad): phung po stong pa nyid du rigs par bya'o// khams stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// skye mched stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
198a5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// bdag stong pa nyid dang / sems can stong pa nyid dang / srog s+ho// nga ba nyid dang / skye ba stong pa nyid dang / shed las
198a6(khri brgyad): skyes pa stong pa nyid dang / gang zag stong pa nyid dang / gso ba stong pa nyid dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang // tshor ba
198a7(khri brgyad): po dang / tshor bar byed pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te bsam gtan stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// tshad med pa stong
198a8(khri brgyad): pa nyid dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi bar
198b1(khri brgyad): dag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te rnam par thar
198b2(khri brgyad): pa brgyad stong pa nyid dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid dang / mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid dang / so// 
198b3(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
198b4(khri brgyad): 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ 
198b5(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byang chub stong/ pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos de dag thams
198b6(khri brgyad): cad stong par mthong bas phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston te/ ci nas kyang stong pa nyid de dag tu phyir mi ldog pa de ltar chos ston to// des chos thams cad sgrib pa med
198b7(khri brgyad): par yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ chos gang yang 'khrug par mi byed cing gnyi su mi 'byed par yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du chos ston par byed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs
198b8(khri brgyad): pa'i sprul pa zhig gis sprul pa bye ba phrag du ma mngon par sprul nas kha cig ni sbyin pa la bkod/ kha cig ni tshul khrims la bkod cing / de bzhin du sbyar te/ kha cig ni bzod pa la / kha
199a1(khri brgyad): cig ni brtson 'grus la/ kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin la/ kha cig ni shes rab la/ kha cig ni bsam gtan rnams la/ kha cig ni tshad med pa rnams la/ 
199a2(khri brgyad): kha cig ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la/ kha cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la/ kha cig ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag la/ kha cig ni rnam pa
199a3(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la bkod/ kha cig ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod/ kha cig ni byang chub kyi bar dag la bkod na/ rab 'byor ji snyam du sems sprul pa des
199a4(khri brgyad): chos gang yang rnam par bye ba yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rnams grangs des ji ltar byang chub sems
199a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyo/ da pa sems can rnams la chos ston te/ ma bcing / sa ma grol ba'i tshul gyis de dag phyin ci log rnams las
199a6(khri brgyad): rnam par grol bar byed cing / de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba la dgod pa de ltar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba yin la/ tsher
199a7(khri brgyad): ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma bcings ma grol ba yin te/ gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin la/ 
199a8(khri brgyad): tsher ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams
199b1(khri brgyad): kyi bar gyim bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs dang / 
199b2(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i bar dag dang / 'du byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi bar gyi chos rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
199b3(khri brgyad): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sems can rnams la chos ston kyang sems can du dmigs pa yang med do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad mi dmigs
199b4(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ de yang gzugs stong zhes par mi nga dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar du stong ngo zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus
199b5(khri brgyad): byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ 2dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi rna
199b6(khri brgyad): gang du yang gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di dag la gang la gnas par gyur pa ngo bo nyid med pas na dngos po med pa yang dngos po med pa la mi gnas la/ rang gi
199b7(khri brgyad): dngos po yang dngos po med pa la mi gnas shing / gzhan gyis dngos po yang dngos po med pa la nga gi dngos po la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar de dag thams
199b8(khri brgyad): cad ni dmigs su med de/ gang dmigs su med pa de ni gang la yang gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
200a1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgoms te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi
200a2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / 'phags pa thams cad la
200a3(khri brgyad): mnyes par byas pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan
200a4(khri brgyad): thos rnams kyis kyang chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di nyid rtogs te/ rtogs nas kyang sems can rnams la chos ston cing / chos rnams kyi chos nyid de las kyang mi 'da' ste/ chos kyi dbyings
200a5(khri brgyad): kyang 'da' ba med la/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa// 'i mtha' yang 'da' bar med pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i/ phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar de dag la gang 'da'
200a6(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 'phags pa khri brgyad stong pa// / bam po lnga bcu rtsa
200a7(khri brgyad): gnyis pa/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gal te/ chos kyi dbyings la 'da' ba ma mchis shing de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang 'da' ba ma mchis
200a8(khri brgyad): na/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ci gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa zhig lags sam/ rnam par shes pa
200a9(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
200b1(khri brgyad): yang gzhan la/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams
200b2(khri brgyad): kyang gzhan pa zhig lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan ma yin// de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la
200b3(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no// rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin la chos thams cad kyi bar gzhan ma yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan yin la de bzhin nyid dang / yang
200b4(khri brgyad): dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no// de skad ces bka' stsa ngal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te gzugs
200b5(khri brgyad): kyang gzhan ma lags shing chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan ma lagasal rnam par shes pa'i bar yang gzhan ma lags/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang
200b6(khri brgyad): gzhan ma lags/ de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyi bar yang gzhan lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na nag po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa nag po na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro ra
200b7(khri brgyad): skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten lags so zhes bgyi ba dang / dkar po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar po ni lha dang mi rnams lags so// zhes bgyi ba dang / dkar nag
200b8(khri brgyad): gi chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar nag gi ni bde ba dang / sdug bsngal 'dren ma lags so// zhes bgyi ba dang / mi gnag cing dkar po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa mi
201a1(khri brgyad): gnag cing dkar ba ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa
201a2(khri brgyad): nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lag so zhes bgyi bar rnam par 'god par ji ltar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
201a3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste 'bras bu rnam par dgod par bstan par zad kyis/ don dam pa'i
201a4(khri brgyad): bden par ni 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bstan par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste ming dang gzugs de skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon
201a5(khri brgyad): mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ chos de ni rnam par rtog pa med cing bsnyad du med pa ste/ de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma
201a6(khri brgyad): med pa stong pa nyid do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar
201a7(khri brgyad): bzung ste/ 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa mchis kyi/ don dam par ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur mi
201a8(khri brgyad): 'gyur lags sam/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub nyid dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
201b1(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu mi 'gyur lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor ci byis pa so so'i skye ba
201b2(khri brgyad): rnams kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa shes sam/ 'o na ni de dag la yang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong
201b3(khri brgyad): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa yod par yang 'gyur te/ gal te kun rdzob kyi
201b4(khri brgyad): bden pa 'am/ don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar shes na da ni byis pa so so'i skye bo zhes bya ba'i grangasu yang mi 'gro ba zhig na/ 'di ltar de dag la yongasu shes pa med de/ de'i phyir de
201b5(khri brgyad): dag la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / 
201b6(khri brgyad): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa dag kyang med do// rab 'byor 'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la ni lam yang med la lam med par bzhag pa yang med la
201b7(khri brgyad): lam bsgom pa yang med na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lta yod par 'gyur re skan/ 'phags pa gang dag rnams la ni lam yang yod la lam rnam par bzhag pa
201b8(khri brgyad): yang yod do// lam bsgom pa yang yod pas na 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa yang yod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
202a1(khri brgyad): 'das ci lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu 'byung zhing 'bras bu thob par 'gyur lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ lam bsgoms pas
202a2(khri brgyad): 'bras bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / 'bras bu thob par yang mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor lam ma bsgom par yang 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur te/ lam gyis kyang 'bras bu mi 'thob la lam ma
202a3(khri brgyad): yin pas kyang ma yin zhing lam la mi gnas par yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sems can rnams la 'bras bu rnam
202a4(khri brgyad): par dgod par byed de/ chos kyi dbyings la char bcad pa'i tshul gyis 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ma yin no// gas dal pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dus byas kyi khams sam/ 
202a5(khri brgyad): 'dus ma byas kyi khams char bcad pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dgod/ kha ma mchis par gyur na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
202a6(khri brgyad): 'bras bu yin no// 'di ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems bsrabs pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yin no// 'di ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i cha dang 'thun pa kun tu sbyor ba rnams
202a7(khri brgyad): spangs pa'i phyir/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yin no// 'di ni gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid yin no// kun 'byung ba'i chos gang ci yang rung
202a8(khri brgyad): ba de dag thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can no zhe bya ba ni rang byang chub yin no// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba rnams spangs pa'i phyir/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yin no zhes bka' stsal na/ 
202b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la char bcad pas 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa med do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal
202b2(khri brgyad): bar bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong 'bras bu 'am/ 
202b3(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dus byas yin nam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
202b4(khri brgyad): 'dus ma bgyis lags so// bde bar gshegs pa 'du das ma bgyis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyidas bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci 'dus ma byas kyi chos
202b5(khri brgyad): la char bcad pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos
202b6(khri brgyad): 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa de'i tshe 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang char gcod pa
202b7(khri brgyad): byed dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
202b8(khri brgyad): spyod pa ni/ nang stong pa nyid nas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi tshul gyis char bcad pa med pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston to// de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ 
203a1(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi/ 
203a2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan dang po nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar ram/ byams pa'am/ snying rje'am dga' ba 'am
203a3(khri brgyad): btang snyoms sam/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar ram dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar ram/ 
203a4(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos gang la yang ba dag nyid kyang mngon par zhen par mi byed la gzhan yang ma ngon par zhen par mi byed do// de mngon par zhen pa med
203a5(khri brgyad): pas gang la yang chags pa med cing / 'di lta ste dperan de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni sbyin pa/ yang sbyin par byed la/ sems can thams cad yongs su
203a6(khri brgyad): mya ngan las bzla ba'i don ma gtogs par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la yong chags pa med cing / sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang nyam su myong bar mi 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi bar dag
203a7(khri brgyad): dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi bar dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma
203a8(khri brgyad): byas kyi chos rnams gang la yang mi gnas so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la yang chos thams cad la yang
203b1(khri brgyad): spyod la chos gang la yang mi gnas shing chags pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid legs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro// shes rab
203b2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang yi ge mngon par bsgrubs pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun cu rtsa gsum pa'o// 
203b3(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid legs/ 
203b4(khri brgyad): par rtogs pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byo ra dper na sprul pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug la kun du spyod pa med pa dang / gzugs la
203b5(khri brgyad): kun tu spyod pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar la rku/ na du spyod pa med pa dang / de bzhin du nang dang / phyi'i chos rnams la kun du spyod pa med pa dang / bgal
203b6(khri brgyad): nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba rnams la kun du spyod pa med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la kun du spyod pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 
203b7(khri brgyad): 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la kun du spyod pa med pa dang / lam la kun du spyod pa med pa dang / 'bras bu rnams la kun tu
203b8(khri brgyad): spyod pa med pa de ltar rab 'byor chos rnams kyi chos kyi tshul legs par rtogs pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa'i lam bsgom pa ji lta bu lags// bka'
204a1(khri brgyad): stsal pa rab 'byor lam bsgom pa gang la brten nas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur zhing rnam par byang nas mi 'gyur la/ 'gro
204a2(khri brgyad): ba lnga'i 'khor ba na yang mi snang ba yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad rtogs pa lags/ 
204a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di snyams du sems de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dang / dngos po 'ga' zhig la brten nas kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba
204a4(khri brgyad): 'am rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po gang yang dmigs su yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom nga ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
204a5(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i sprul pa la ni dngos po 'ga' zhig la brten nas kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par bya/ nga bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda'
204a6(khri brgyad): ba'i dngos po gang yang ma mchis lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar chos rnams kyi chos kyi tshul legs par rtogs pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
204a7(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci gzugs thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ tshor ba thams cad dang / 'du shes
204a8(khri brgyad): thams cad dang 'du byed thams cad dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs thams
204b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bu yin no// tshor ba thams cad dang / 'du thathams cad dang / 'atsu mas cad dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa lta bu yin no// 
204b2(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ sprul pa la ni gzugs ma mchis tshor ba ma mchis/ 'du shes ma mchis 'du
204b3(khri brgyad): byed rnams ma mchis rnam par shes pa ma mchis kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis shing gang las sems can rnams yong su thar par bgyi ba'i 'gro ba
204b4(khri brgyad): lnga'i 'khor ba yang ma mchis lags na 'o na ji ltar bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyes bu'i mthur 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
204b5(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad/ kha spyod pa na/ gang sems can dmyal ba'am/ dud
204b6(khri brgyad): 'gre'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ mi 'am lha dag las yongs su thar par bya ba'i sems can 'ga' yang mi dmigs snyam 'am/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan
204b7(khri brgyad): 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang khams gsum nas yongs su thar par bya
204b8(khri brgyad): ba'i sems can 'ga' yang mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes shing mthong la rnam par rig pa'i phyir ro// 
205a1(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur 'tshal
205a2(khri brgyad): cing mthong la rnam par rig pa lags na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzug
205a3(khri brgyad): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / byang chub kyi lam la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyis pa dang / sems
205a4(khri brgyad): can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid lags/ de skad ce/ des gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab
205a5(khri brgyad): 'byor gal te sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur shes su zin na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems
205a6(khri brgyad): can rnams kyi don du bskal pa grangs med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod pa zhig na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sprul pa
205a7(khri brgyad): lta bur mi shes te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal pa grangs med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed/ sangs rgyas
205a8(khri brgyad): kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / 
205b1(khri brgyad): mig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu la bu dang / sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyang ci la gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
205b2(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gang las spyod par bgyid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can rnams ni yod pa ma yin pa'i
205b3(khri brgyad): ming dang mtshan ma dag la gnas pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de dag ming dang mtshan ma las bskyod par byed do// de nas
205b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ming ni gang lags/ mtshan ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
205b5(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta sde ming zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni blo bur du ming btags pa ste/ 2// de lta ste zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'am/ 
205b6(khri brgyad): gzugs shes bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba 'am/ bud med ces bya ba 'am/ skyes pa zhes bya ba'i ma/ khye'u zhes bya ba 'am/ bu mo zhes bya ba
205b7(khri brgyad): 'am sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa zhe bya ba 'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba 'am/ lha zhes bya ba 'am/ mi zhes bya ba 'am
205b8(khri brgyad): 'dus byas kyi chos shes bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes bya ba 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ phyir
206a1(khri brgyad): mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas shes bya ba'am/ yang dag par rdzogs
206a2(khri brgyad): pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba de dag ni bcos mar ming du brtags pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad kyis rang bzhin ni ming ste gzhol ba'i phyir ro// 'dus byas thams cad ni ming tsam
206a3(khri brgyad): du zad na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams de la chags pas de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas 'di skad du ming 'di
206a4(khri brgyad): ni yongs su rtogs pas kun nas bskyed pa yin pas rang bzhin gyis stong zhing dngos po med pa la/ khyed cag yod pa yin par yongs su rtog pas chags par ma byed
206a5(khri brgyad): cig/ mkhas pa dag ni chos stong pa dag la mngon parazhen par mi byed do// zhes kun nas 'dra/ la bar byed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
206a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas de ltar sems can rnams la chos ston par byed do// rab 'byor mtshan ma gang zhe na/ rab 'byor
206a7(khri brgyad): gnyis po 'di dag ni gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams chags par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang / gzugs med pa'i mtshan
206a8(khri brgyad): ma'o// rab 'byor de la gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs gang ci yang rung ste/ rags pa 'am/ phra ba'am/ bzang ba 'am/ ngan padag ste/ 
206b1(khri brgyad): gang skad cig pa'i chos de dag thams cad la yongs su rtogs pas 'dzin par byed pa de ni/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma zhes bya'o// gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gzugs
206b2(khri brgyad): med pa'i chos gang ci yang rung ste/ mtshan mar bzung zhing yongs su brtags pa las nyon mongs pa skye ba de ni gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o// de la byis pa so so'i skye bo
206b3(khri brgyad): rnams chags pas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la/ thabs la mkhas pas de dag mtshan ma de dang bral nas/ mtshan ma
206b4(khri brgyad): med pa'i dngos po la 'dzud cing 'god par byed do// ci nas kyang 'di ni mtshan ma'o// 'di ni mtsha na ma med pa'o// zhes gnyis su mi lhung de ltar 'dzud cing
206b5(khri brgyad): de ltar 'god par byed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas de ltar sems can
206b6(khri brgyad): rnams mtshan ma dang phral nas mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su 'dzud cing 'god par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
206b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di dag thams cad de tsam du bas te/ 'di ltar mtshan ma mchis pa tsam du bas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
206b8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ji ltar bdag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams kyi bye brag tu 'bogs par 'gyur la/ gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams kyi bye brag
207a1(khri brgyad): tu 'bogs pa la 'god par bgyid pa dang / sa gnas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid cing / sems can rnams kyang de dag nyid la sbyor
207a2(khri brgyad): bar bgyid lags de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor gal te mtshan ma dngos po
207a3(khri brgyad): zhig yin te dngos po med pa ma yin par gyur na ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyi khyad
207a4(khri brgyad): par thob par mi 'gyur la/ gzhan dag kyang khyad par 'thob pa la 'god par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab byor 'di ltar mtshan ma ni dngos po ma yin zhing dngos po
207a5(khri brgyad): med de/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spro// dang mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi
207a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ mtshan ma med/ 
207a7(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
207a8(khri brgyad): rdzogs par byed do// tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'phags
207b1(khri brgyad): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag yongs su rdzogs par byed do// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// phyi nang
207b2(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin du sbyar te mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rnam par thar
207b3(khri brgyad): pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin du sbyar te mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin
207b4(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yod/ su rdzogs par byed do// des dge ba'i chos de dag yongs// 
207b5(khri brgyad): par byas nas mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzhan yang dge ba'i/ chos de dag la sbyor bar byed do// rab 'byor gal te chos rnams la tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam gyi
207b6(khri brgyad): mtshan ma zhig yod par gyur na yang / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtshan ma med pa dang / dran pa med pa dang / yid
207b7(khri brgyad): la bya ba med pas chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi 'gyur la// sems can rnams kyang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la de bzhin nyid du 'god par yang mi 'gyur ba zhig
207b8(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni zag pa med cing mtshan ma med pa dang / dran pa med pa dang / yid la byed pa med pa yin te/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems
208a1(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byed do// de nas bcom
208a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mtshan ma mtshas shing dran pa ma mchis la bgyid pa ma mchis pa la lags na
208a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'o na 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni thun mong gi chos so// 'di dag ni thun mongs ma yin pa'i chos so// 
208a4(khri brgyad): 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 
208a5(khri brgyad): zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi lags de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshedang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
208a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bka'
208a7(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan
208a8(khri brgyad): la/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ 
208b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'o na mtshan ma med pa nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
208b2(khri brgyad): 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yin nam/ gsol pa/ 
208b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa'i chos
208b4(khri brgyad): de dag thams cad la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang
208b5(khri brgyad): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzu/ gas med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dran pa/ nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi dang / 
208b6(khri brgyad): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lags bdun dang / 'phags pa'i la mo yan lag brgyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar
208b7(khri brgyad): dag gis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams
208b8(khri brgyad): la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs par bslab par bya ba gzhan med pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'dir dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus pa'i phyir
209a1(khri brgyad): te/ 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid yin no// mtshan ma dang bral ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med/ 
209a2(khri brgyad): pa yin no// mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa yin te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag la slob pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
209a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po de ni phung po lnga la slob pa yin/ skye mched bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ khams bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la slob
209a4(khri brgyad): pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 
209a5(khri brgyad): phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la/ slob pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyidastong pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 
209a6(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la slob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
209a7(khri brgyad): bcu la slob pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan
209a8(khri brgyad): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ji ltar nye bar
209b1(khri brgyad): len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la slob pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gzugs rab
209b2(khri brgyad): tu shes te/ gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang / gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa yang rab tu shes so// gzugs ji ltar rab tu shes zhe
209b3(khri brgyad): na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na dbu ba rdos pa la snying po med pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang shin tu gse tshags dang / shin tu gsong ldong dang / shin tu snying po med par rab tu shes
209b4(khri brgyad): so// gzugs kyi skye ba ji ltar rab tu shes zhe na/ gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med la gzu gas ni gang du yang 'gro ba med pas gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang
209b5(khri brgyad): mi 'gro ba de ltar gzugs kyi skye ba rab tu shes so// rab 'byor gang nas kyang ma 'ongs gang du yang ma song ba de ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa rab tu
209b6(khri brgyad): shes so// gzugs kyi skye ba de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab tu shos zhe na/ de bzhin nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / 
209b7(khri brgyad): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'phel ba med pa dang / 'grib pa med pa de ltar de bzhin nyid rab tu shes so// rab 'byor gzhan yang
209b8(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid yin te/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de la log pa nyid med pas de'i phyir yang de bzhin nyid ces bya ste/ de ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid
210a1(khri brgyad): rab tu shes so// tshor ba ji ltar rab tu shes/ tshor ba'i skye ba ji ltar rab tu shes/ tshor ba'i 'jig pa ji ltar rab tu shes/ 
210a2(khri brgyad): tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ltar rab tu shes she na 'di lta ste/ dper na chu'i chu bur gyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa gsog tu 'dug pa de ltar tshor ba rab tu shes so// de gang
210a3(khri brgyad): nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pa de ltar tshor ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa rab tu shes so// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ de bzhin nyid de ni ma nor ba
210a4(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid de de ltar tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid rab tu shes so// / 'du shes ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ di lta ste dper na smig rgyu'i tshogs la chu shin tu dmigs su
210a5(khri brgyad): med pa de ltar 'du shes rab tu shes so// de gang nas/ kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pa de lta ra 'du shes kyi skye ba dang / 'jigs pa rab tu shes/ 
210a6(khri brgyad): so// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid rab tu shes so// 'du byed rnams ji ltar rab
210a7(khri brgyad): tu shes she na/ 'di lta ste dper na chu shing shun pa so sor phye na snying po mi dmigs pa de ltar 'du byed rnams rab tu shes so// 'du byed rnams kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa ji ltar
210a8(khri brgyad): rab tu shes she na/ de gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pa de ltar 'du byed rnams kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa rab tu shes so// 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
210b1(khri brgyad): ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid rab tu shes so// rnam par shes pa ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ 'di lta ste/ 
210b2(khri brgyad): dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ji lta ba de ltar na/ rnam par shes pa rab tu shes so// de dag nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba
210b3(khri brgyad): med pa de ltar rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig par rab tu shes so// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de ltar rnam
210b4(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid rab tu shes te/ de ltar na na/ dam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid rab tu shes pa yin/ no// khams rnams ji ltar shes she na/ mig gi
210b5(khri brgyad): khams ni mig gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ltar mig gi khams rab tu shes so// gzugs kyi/ khams ji ltar shes she na/ gzugs kyi khams ni
210b6(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ltar gzugs kyi khams rab tu shes so// mig gi rnam par she shi khams ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
210b7(khri brgyad): khams ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rab tu shes so// rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna
210b8(khri brgyad): ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / 
211a1(khri brgyad): lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang
211a2(khri brgyad): yid kyi khams ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ yad kyi khams ji ltar rab tu shas sha na/ yid kyi khams ni yid kyi khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ltar yid kyi khams rab tu shre
211a3(khri brgyad): so// chas kyi khams ji ltar rab shes sha na/ chos kyi khams ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ chos kyi khams ni chos kyi khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ltar chos kyi khams
211a4(khri brgyad): rab tu shes so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i kham sa ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi
211a5(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ltar yid kyis rnam par shes pa'i khams rab tu shes te/ de ltar na khams bco brgya da rab tu shes pa yin no// skye mched rnams ji
211a6(khri brgyad): ltar rab tu shes she na/ nang gi skye mched rnams ni nang gi skye mched rnams kyis stong la/ phyi'i skye mched rnams ni phyi'i skye mched rnams kyis stong pa de ltar skye mched rnams rab tu shes so// 
211a7(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rab tu shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden
211a8(khri brgyad): pa rab tu shes pa'o// sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ sdug bsngal du rab tu shes pa dang / bden par rab tu shes pa dang / 'phags pa rnams
211b1(khri brgyad): kyi bden pa'o// zhes rab tu shes la/ gnyis las rnam par grol zhing gnyis ma yin pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa yin par rab tu shes pa ste/ kun 'byung ba yang de bzhin
211b2(khri brgyad): 'gog pa yang de bzhin/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam yang de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa rab tu sheso// sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ sdug bsngal
211b3(khri brgyad): gyi de bzhin nyid ni/ de bzhin nyid yin pa de ltar sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid rab tu shes te/ de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam gyi de bzhin nyid du kyang rab tu shes// 
211b4(khri brgyad): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni skye ba med par rab tu shes so// de bzhin du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa
