296a1(khri brgyad): tha snyad 'dogs par 'gyur ba gzugs kyang ba nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
296a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'di lta ste 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po la gzugs shes bya bar ming dang 'du shes dang 'dogs pa dang / rje su tha snyad
296a3(khri brgyad): 'dogs par byed pa la/ byams pa 'di snyams du sems/ de gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid yin nam/ btags pa tsam du zad/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das btags pa tsam du bas
296a4(khri brgyad): lag so// byams pa 'o na 'di lta ste 'du byed kyi mtshan dma'i dngos po'i bar dang / 'du shes dang / 'du bya dang rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
296a5(khri brgyad): chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du mi gas pa kho na'o zhes bya bar byams pa khyod ji ltar de snya/ du sems/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems// tshor ba dang / 
296a6(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid de btags pa tsam du zad dam/ bcom ldan 'das btags pa tsam du bas
296a7(khri brgyad): lagaso/ byams pa'o na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o zhes bya bar khyod
296a8(khri brgyad): ji ltar de snyam du sems/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te gzugs
296b1(khri brgyad): ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda' dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam kho na lags shing / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs
296b2(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda' dang / btags pa dang tha snyad tsam kho na lags sam/ de lta na 'di lta ste ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda' dang / btags/ 
296b3(khri brgyad): pa dang / tha snyad tsam zhes bgyi bas gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam/ de ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / 
296b4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho nar mi 'gyur lags sam/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / ba/ com ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di
296b5(khri brgyad): skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa 'di ji snyam du sem sa/ gzugs shes bya ba'i ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda' dang / btags pa dang / tha snyad tsam kho na gang yin
296b6(khri brgyad): pa de jig skye ba 'am/ 'jig pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lag so// bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'o na khyod/ 
296b7(khri brgyad): 'di snyam du gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa kho na'o snyam du sems pa de ci las gyur/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa/ 
296b8(khri brgyad): shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang / 'du shes dang / brda' dang / btags pa dang zhwa snyad tsam kho na gang yin pa de la skye ba 'am// 'jig pa'i// 
297a1(khri brgyad): kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lag so// bka' stsal ba/ byams pa
297a2(khri brgyad): nakhyod 'di snyam du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ngo ba nyid dmigs pa kho na' snyam du sem/ 
297a3(khri brgyad): pa de ci las gyur/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams
297a4(khri brgyad): cad kyi gzugs ma mchis pa kho na lags sam/ bcom lda ngan 'das ci rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
297a5(khri brgyad): par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ma mchis pa kho na lags sam/ de skad ces gsol/ rang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams
297a6(khri brgyad): pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyis gzugs med do zhes nga mi smra'o// byams pa rnam pa thams cad du mtshan nyid thams cad kyi tshor ba dang // 'dra/ 
297a7(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du medo zhes nga mi smra'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub/ 
297a8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ gzugs ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dra/ 
297b1(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mchis lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la/ 
297b2(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'jig rten gyi brda' dang / tha snyad kyi gzugs yod kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no// byams pa 'jig rten gyi brda' dang tha snyad kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
297b3(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yod kyi don dam par ni ma yin// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
297b4(khri brgyad): dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom lda ngan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ dbyings 'di ni don dam par ni brjod
297b5(khri brgyad): du ma mchis// bcom ldan 'das gal te brjod du man chis pa'i dbyings don dam par mchi su lags na 'o na 'a/ du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs shes bgyi bar
297b6(khri brgyad): glo bur du ming du 'dogs par ji ltar 'gyur/ don dam par mchis na 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
297b7(khri brgyad): dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bgyi ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du 'dogs par ji ltar 'gyur/ gal te don dam par ma mchis na ni 'o na brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyingasu yang ji
297b8(khri brgyad): ltar 'gyur te/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings shes bgyir mi rung lagaso// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
298a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris/ ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig/ byams pa 'di ji
298a2(khri brgyad): snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang 'brel pa'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas pa de'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba
298a3(khri brgyad): dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes shes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming
298a4(khri brgyad): du btags pa 'di khyod kyis dmigs sam/ gsol pa kha bcom ldan 'das de ni mi dmigs lagaso/ bka' stsal pa/ byams pa rnam grangs 'dis 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngosas
298a5(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de brjod med pa'i dbyings kyang ma yin la/ 'du khyed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de las brjod med pa'i dbyings te/ zhan pa yang ma yin par rig par bya'o// 'di lta ste gzug
298a6(khri brgyad): shes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes shes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa shes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar du
298a7(khri brgyad): gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po dgal te brjod du med pa'i dbyings yin du zin na/ 'o na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang yongasu mya ngan las 'das
298a8(khri brgyad): par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par yang 'gyuraro byams pa gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po las brjod du med ni
298b1(khri brgyad): dbyings gzhan yin du zin na ni/ 'o na mtshan ma de'ang mi dmigs na 'di ltar brjod du med pa'i dbyings de rtogs par 'gyur ram/ byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma
298b2(khri brgyad): de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan yang ma yin la/ 'di lta ste gzugs shes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes shes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam
298b3(khri brgyad): par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa de las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan ma yin pa yang ma yin par rig par bya'o// / 
298b4(khri brgyad): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' brjod du ma
298b5(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i dbyings dang 'brel pa'i shes rab kyi spyod pa lag na sa pa 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bgyi ba dang / tsho ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed
298b6(khri brgyad): rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bgyi ba'i bar dag gang la glo bur du ming du btags pa'i 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de mi dmigs/ 
298b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das ci mchis pa mi dmigs lags sam/ 'on te ma mchis pa mi dmigs lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa
298b8(khri brgyad): la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la ni rang dbang nyid dam/ yod pa nyid gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa gang gi tshe khyod 'du byed kyi mtshan
299a1(khri brgyad): ma'i dngos po de la rnam par rtogs pa de'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rnam par rtog pas kyi rung bar 'gyur ram/ gang gi tshe brjod du med pan
299a2(khri brgyad): dbyings dang 'brel pa'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas te/ rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe rnam par mi rtog pas gzung bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lag so// byam pa de lta yin 'di lta ste/ 
299a3(khri brgyad): 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la 'di ltar gzugs shes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes shes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / 
299a4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar du glo bur du ming du btags pa de rnam par rtog pa tsam du ma zad dam/ rnam dpar rtogs pa tsam nyid // de de ltar rnam par mi rtogs pa'i
299a5(khri brgyad): dbyings la gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa rnams dang bral bar gyur pa na/ 'di lta ste gzugs shes bya ba dang / tshe ra ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed
299a6(khri brgyad): rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du gang la glo bur du ming du btag pa de la yod pa gang yin/ gang yod pa ni mi dmigs par
299a7(khri brgyad): 'gyuraro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha
299a8(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa la zhugs pas gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i btags pas rnam pa du ma zhig tu rtogs par bgyi/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
299b1(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i brtags pa rnab du zhig tu rtogs par bgyi lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
299b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa la zhugs pas
299b3(khri brgyad): gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i brtags pa rnam pa gsum du rtog par bya// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du
299b4(khri brgyad): rab tu dbye ba'i brtags pa rnam pa gsum du rtog par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'di ni kun brtags pa'i gzugaso// 'di da ni rnam par brtags pa'i gzugaso// 'di ni chos nyid kyi
299b5(khri brgyad): gzug so// 'di lta ste/ 'di ni kun tu brtags pa'i rgyu/ ra ba'o// 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i tshor ba'o// 'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba'o// 'di lta ste 'di ni kun brtags
299b6(khri brgyad): pa'i 'du shes so// 'di ni rdzar brtags pa'i 'du shes// 'di ni chos nyid kyi 'du sheso// 'di lta ste 'di dag ni kun brtags pa'i 'du byed rnam so// 'di dag ni rnam par brtags
299b7(khri brgyad): pa'i 'du byed rnamaso// 'di dag ni chos nyid kyi 'du byed rnamaso// 'di lta ste/ 'di ni kun brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o// 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o// 'di
299b8(khri brgyad): ni chos nyid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// 'di lta ste 'di dag ni kun brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dgo/ 'di dag ni rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnamaso// 'di
300a1(khri brgyad): dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pa
300a2(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kun brtags pa'i gzugs ni gang lags/ rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs ni gang lags chos nyid kyi gzugs ni gang lags// 
300a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kun brtags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / kun brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ni gang lags/ rna
300a4(khri brgyad): par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gang lags/ chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ byams pa gang du/ 
300a5(khri brgyad): 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang / de la gzugs shes bya ba'i ming dang 'du shes dang / brtags pa dang / tha snyad la brten nas/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du yongasu rtogapa
300a6(khri brgyad): 'di ni kun brtags pa'i gzugaso// byams pa gang 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de la tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang / rnam par
300a7(khri brgyad): shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang / 'du shes dang / brtags pa dang / tha snyad la brten nas// tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
300a8(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid du yongasu rtog pa 'di ni kun brtags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
300b1(khri brgyad): shes pa'o// 'di dag ni kun brtags la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar rnam so// 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rnam par rtogs pa tsam gyi chos la gnas pa'i rnam par rtog/ 
300b2(khri brgyad): pa la brten nas/ mngon par brjod de/ gang la 'di ni gzugaso zhes bya ba dang tshor ba'o zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnamaso shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes// 
300b3(khri brgyad): pa'o zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnamaso zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ming dang / 'du shes dang / brtags pa dang / tha snyad gang yin pa 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i gzugaso// 'di ni
300b4(khri brgyad): rnam par brtags pa'i tshor ba'o// 'di ni rnam par brta/ dadags pa'i 'du shes// 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du byed rnamaso// 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i rnam pa
300b5(khri brgyad): shes pa'o// 'di dag rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgya sa kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go// gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
300b6(khri brgyad): ma byung yang rung ste/ chos nyid 'di ni gnas pa nyid dang / chos gnas pa'i dbyings dang / gang kun brtags pa'i gzugs des rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs rtag pa rtag pa'i
300b7(khri brgyad): dus dang / ther zug ther zug gi dus ngo bo nyid med pa kho na dang / chos la bdag med pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni chos nyid kyi gzugaso// 'di ni chos
300b8(khri brgyad): nyid kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o// 'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dgo/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa
301a1(khri brgyad): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzugs gsum po 'di dag las rdzasu
301a2(khri brgyad): ma mchis par blta ba'i gzugs ni gang lags/ rdza su ma mchis pa ni gang lags/ rdza su ma mchis pa yang ma lags la/ rdza su mchis pa yang ma lags shing don dam par
301a3(khri brgyad): rab tu phye ba ni gang lags/ tshor ba gsum po 'di dag dang / 'du shes gsum po 'di dag dang / 'du byed gsum po 'di dag dang / rnam par shes pa gsum po 'di dag dang / sangs
301a4(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gsum po 'di dag las rdza su ram mchis pa dag ni gang lags/ rdza su mchis pa ni gang lags/ rdza su ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ rdzasu
301a5(khri brgyad): mchis pa yang ma lags shing / don dam pa rab tu phyeb dag ni gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la
301a6(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ byams pa kun brtags pa'i gzugs de ni rdza su med par blta bar bya'o// rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtogs pa rdza su yod par lta bar bya ste/ 
301a7(khri brgyad): rang dbang du 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no// gang chos nyid kyi gzugs de ni rdza su med pa yang ma yin/ rdza su yod pa yang ma yin zhing / don dam pas rab tu phye bar blta bar bya'o// gang / 
301a8(khri brgyad): kun brtags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gang dag kun brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni rdza su med par blta
301b1(khri brgyad): par bya'o// gang rnam par brtags pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gang dag rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar
301b2(khri brgyad): de dag ni rnam par rtog pa rdza su yod pa'i phyir rdza su yod par blta bar bya ste/ rang dbang du 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no// byams pa gang chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
301b3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / byams pa gang dag chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag ni rdza su med pa yang ma yin la/ rdza su yod pa yang ma yin zhing / don dam
301b4(khri brgyad): pas rab tu phye bar blta bar bya'o// de skad ces bka'astsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub semasadapa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
301b5(khri brgyad): 'das de ltar gzugs rab tu dbye ba'i brtags pa yangamachis la de ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 2 du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs
301b6(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du/ rab tu dbye ba'i brtags pa yang mchis na/ 'di lta ste gzugs shes bya ba de ni gnyi su med pa'i grangasu byas pa'o// 'di lta ste tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 
301b7(khri brgyad): 'du shes shes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba'i bar 'di ni gnyi su med pa'i grangasu byas pa'o zhe
301b8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bka' stsal ba de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba de ni gnyi su med pa'i grangasu byas pa'o// 'di lta ste tshor
302a1(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar zhes bya
302a2(khri brgyad): ba de ni gnyi su med pa'i grangasu byas pa'o zhes/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'di ji snyam du
302a3(khri brgyad): sems/ kun brtags pa'i gzugs la rdza su med pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs yin nam/ 'on te ma yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// de la gzugs shes
302a4(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ming dang / 'du shes dang / brtags pa dang / tha/ da skad tsam nyid gang yin pa de ji ga gzugs yin nam/ da gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// byams
302a5(khri brgyad): pa rnam grangs 'dis gang kun brtags pa'i gzugs de gzu gas kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin te/ gang gzugs kyang ma yin la gzugs ma yin pa
302a6(khri brgyad): yang ma yin pa de ni gnyi su med pa ste/ ngas 'di la dgongs nas 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni gnyi su med pa'i grangasu byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya'o// byams/ 
302a7(khri brgyad): pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang la brten nas gzugs shes bya ba'i ming dang brtags pa dang / tha snyad du 'gyur ba rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs rdza su yod pa nyid gang yin pa de jig
302a8(khri brgyad): gzugs ma yin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs de nyid la kun brtags pa'i
302b1(khri brgyad): gzugs des de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin zhing / de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa gang yin pa de gzugs yin nam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// byams pa rnams grangs/ 
302b2(khri brgyad): 'dis kyang 'di ltar gang rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs de yang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te/ gang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin
302b3(khri brgyad): pa yang ma yin pa de gnyi su med pa ste/ ngas de las dgongs nas 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba de ni gnyi su med pa'i grangasu byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya'o// byams
302b4(khri brgyad): pa 'di ji snyam du sems// gang chos nyid kyi gzugs bdag med pas rab tu phye ba'i gzugs de ji ga gzugs yi/ na nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// 
302b5(khri brgyad): chos nyid kyi gzugs de nyid kyi gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin/ pa de gzugs ma yin pa de yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcwam ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// byams pa rnams grangs
302b6(khri brgyad): 'dis kyang 'di ltar chos nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa de yang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa yang ma yin te/ gang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa yang ma
302b7(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni gnyi su med pa ste/ ngas de las dgongs nas 'di lta ste gzugs shes bya ba de ni gnyi su med pa'i grangasu byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya ste/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 
302b8(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la yang sbyar bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la
303a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ltar
303a2(khri brgyad): gzugs la gnyisu ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas shing / de ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag
303a3(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la mkhas pa mtha' gnyis spangs nas dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pa yongasu 'tshal ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/ spong ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/ mngon sum du bgyi ba'i
303a4(khri brgyad): mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/ bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta buradang lta bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal
303a5(khri brgyad): pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ mtha' gnyis spangs nas 'di ltar dbu ma'i lam du zhugs pas gang gzugs yongasu shes pa
303a6(khri brgyad): yang ma yin yongasu mi shes pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongasu shes pa'o// gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
303a7(khri brgyad): kyi bar du yong su shes pa yang ma yin yongasu mi shes pa yang ma yin pa de ni de'i yang su shes pa'o// gang gzugs spong po yang ma yin mi spong ba yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spyong ba'o// gang tsher
303a8(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du spong ba yang ma yin mo spong ba yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o// gang gzug
303b1(khri brgyad): spong ba mngon sum du mi byed la/ mngon sum du mi byed pa yang ma yin pa de nyid de'i mngon sum du byed pa'o// gzugs spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom pa yang ma yin mi sgom pa yang ma yin pa de
303b2(khri brgyad): nyid de'i sgom pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la yang sbyar bar bya'o// de skad ces
303b3(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
303b4(khri brgyad): 'di lta bu'i yongasu 'tshal ba dang / spongs pa dang / ma/ don sum du bgyid pa dang / bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsol
303b5(khri brgyad): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bya mas pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni zab po// mchog
303b6(khri brgyad): tu zab bo// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'
303b7(khri brgyad): rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ltar zab pa dang / mchog tu zab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa
303b8(khri brgyad): ni/ 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin/ mya ngan lam 'das pa yang ma yin te/ de'i phyir zab pa dang mchog tu zab pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
304a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las
304a2(khri brgyad): 'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma lags mya ngan las ma 'das pa yang ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa gzhan gyi don la brtsams te/ 'khor ba
304a3(khri brgyad): yongasu mi gtong bas mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin// bdag gis don las brtsams te/ mya ngan las 'das pa yongasu mi gtong bas/ mya ngan lA ma 'das pa yang ma yin no// de skad
304a4(khri brgyad): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// ba com ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi don lnga
304a5(khri brgyad): brtsams te 'khor ba yongasu mi gtong na/ de 'khor yongasu mi btang bas/ 'dis ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa yongasu btang bar mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
304a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' bdag gi don las brtsams te/ mya ngan las 'das pa yongasu mi gtong na 'dis ji ltar 'khor ba yongasu btang bar mi 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
304a7(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ 'khor ba la yang 'khor ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog/ mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mya ngan las
304a8(khri brgyad): 'das pa nyid du rnam par mi rtog ste/ de de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas/ 'di lta ste 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa de dag mnyam pas mnyam par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
304b1(khri brgyad): ltar de 'khor ba la 'khor ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog pas 'khor ba las yid byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mya ngan las 'das pa nyid du mi rtog pas
304b2(khri brgyad): mya ngan las 'das pa las nyams par yang mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin du 'khor ba na yang mi nyamaso// de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa de rig pa 'dis 'khor ba yang
304b3(khri brgyad): yongasu mi gtong la/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang yongasu mi gtong bar rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas
304b4(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spro/ dad pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa 'khor ba ji
304b5(khri brgyad): ltar ma btang ba de ltar blangs pa yang ma mchis shing / mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar ma btang bas de ltar blangs pa yang ma mchis par mi 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan
304b6(khri brgyad): 'das gal te blangs pa ma mchis pa ji ltar ma btang ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa 'di ltar 'khor ba len to zhes 'am/ mi len to zhes mi smra'o// byams
304b7(khri brgyad): pa 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi sems la dbang thob pa thabs la mkhas pas 'khor ba
304b8(khri brgyad): bstan pa'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'khor ba yongasu mi gtong ba'o zhes
305a1(khri brgyad): nga smra'o// stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i dbyings la gnas pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa yongasu mi gtong ba'o zhes nga smra'o// de skad ces bka' sprul pa
305a2(khri brgyad): dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid 'dus par ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom
305a3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes
305a4(khri brgyad): pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du/ gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dgyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos de dag dang / stong pa
305a5(khri brgyad): nyid de'i dngos po dang / dngos po med par gang yin pa dang / spros pa med pa gang yin pa de ni byams pa rnam par mi rta gas pa'i mtshan nyid 'dus par blta'o// de skad ces
305a6(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci nyan thos thams cad gcig tu nges par gtan tu mya ngan
305a7(khri brgyad): las 'das pa la gnas pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de ni ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa 'jig rten 'di ni khams sna tshogs pa
305a8(khri brgyad): khams du ma ste/ khams du ma'i 'jig rten de na sems can gyi rigs dang rang bzhin mang du dmigs te/ byams pa gang thog ma nyid nas bzang po'i bye brag don du gnyer te/ bzang po'i
305b1(khri brgyad): bye brag nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi rigs kyi rnam pa de lta bu yang yod// gang thog ma nyid nas dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer te/ dman pa nyid thob la de nyid kyis mchog
305b2(khri brgyad): par 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi rnam pa de lta bu yang yod/ gang thog ma nyid nas dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer te dman pa nyid thob la dman par shes nas/ de tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin
305b3(khri brgyad): gyi/ de'i 'og tu bzang po'i bye brag tshol zhing bzang po thob par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bye brag de lta bu yang yod do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
305b4(khri brgyad): dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom lnga na 'das sems can rnams kyi rigs rnam pa gsum po gang lags pa de dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas bla na med pa yang
305b5(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer kyang skye ba mchis pa ji ltar thob par 'gyur/ sgrub pa nyid de'i skye ba la gas par ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal lag so// / 
305b6(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de'i skye ba las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis 'gyur bar ni nga mi 'dogs kyi/ de'i skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sprul pa dang
305b7(khri brgyad): yongasu bsngos pa'o zhes nga 'dog so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di
305b8(khri brgyad): ltar thog ma nyid nas bzang po'i bye brag don du gnyer zhing bzang po'i bye brag nyid thob par 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam pa rlabs po che dang / che ba'i
306a1(khri brgyad): lhag pa'i bsam pa ni ngo mtshar lagaso// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa rlabs po che ni gang lags che ba'i lhag pa'i
306a2(khri brgyad): bsam pa nyid ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams brgya byin nyid dang / tshangs pa nyid dang / 'jig rten skyong ba nyid dang / 'khor lo
306a3(khri brgyad): bsgyur ba nyid thams cad dang / 'jigs rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/ de dag la mi chags shing mi 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'
306a4(khri brgyad): rnams kyi bsam pa rlabs po che'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di lta ste/ 'du byed yongasu mi gtong da bas de la ma chags pa'i bde ba dang / 'dzin pa med pa'i
306a5(khri brgyad): bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba sems can tha mas cad dang thun mongs du bya bar 'dod cing / bla na me da pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo bar byed pa
306a6(khri brgyad): gang yin pa 'di ni/ de dag gi che ba nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam par blta bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad
306a7(khri brgyad): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lag so// byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lagaso// 
306a8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba rnams la slob par 'tshal bas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
306b1(khri brgyad): chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi lag so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslabs pa rab tu dbye ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ brgyad du
306b2(khri brgyad): gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor bzhi po de dag yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa'i phyir yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston
306b3(khri brgyad): cing / de'i tshe tshigasu gcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// dga' dang gus dang dad pa'i mchog ni nyer bzhag te/ sgribs nyon mongs dri ma bsal nas rab zhi pas/ 'gro don mngon
306b4(khri brgyad): bzhugs nges pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin// gang la dpa' rnams spyod pa de ni mnyan par gyis// 'dzam bu de'i gling 'dir chu klung ji snyed 'bab pa dag/ ma dros gnas
306b5(khri brgyad): pa'i klu dbang klu bdag rab rten nas// me tog 'bras bu sman dang nags tshal skyed byed de/ de ni klu bdag de ni/ dpal gyi mthu yin// rgyal ba'i nyan thos pa dag ji snyed
306b6(khri brgyad): chos ston dang // 'chad cing rigs pa dag dang ldan par brjod pa dang // bde ba mchog dang byed dang de'i 'bras thob pa// de dag kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i mthu// ci phyir
306b7(khri brgyad): zhe na rgyal bas chos tshul gang bstan pa// de la mi mchog slob mar gyur pas mngon bslab shing // mngon sum byas nas bslabs pa ji bzhin ston byed// sangs rgyas mthus byed rang gi
306b8(khri brgyad): stobs dang mthu ma yin// gang la shes rab pha rol phyin mchog mi dmigs shing / byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs byang chub sems mi dmigs/ de skad thos nas rmongs pa med
307a1(khri brgyad): cing mi skrag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni bde gshegs shes rab spyod// gzugs med tshor ba med cing 'du she sems pa med/ de la rnam
307a2(khri brgyad): shes gnas kyi rdul tsam mi rnyed pa/ de ni chos kun mi gnas gnas med rgyu ba ste/ yongasu bzung med bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub thob// de nas kun tu rgyu ba bzo sbyangs phyi rol gyi// 
307a3(khri brgyad): phung po rnam par 'jig cing shes la dmigs par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de ltar chos shes shing / mya ngan 'das par mi reg de ni shes rab gnas// gzhan yang shes
307a4(khri brgyad): rab 'di ni gang yin gang gi phyir/ gang las 'byung zhes chos 'di thams cad stong par rtog/ nye bar brtags nas zhum da pa med cing skrag med pa// byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang / 
307a5(khri brgyad): chub nye ba yin/ gal te mi shes bzhin du gzugs dang / 'du shes dang / tshor ba sems dpa' rnam shes phung po ra spyod byed cing // phung 'di stong zhes yongs rtogs byang
307a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' ni// mtshan mar spyod de skye med gnas la reg ma yin// gzugs dang tshor ba dang ni 'du shes sems pa dang // rnam par shes pa mi spyod gnas med gang rgyu ba// shwe
307a7(khri brgyad): rab bstan de spyod ces khas len mi byed de// skye med blo yis zhi ba'i ting 'dzin mchog la reg/ byang chub sems dpa' de ltar rab zhi 'dir gnas te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs
307a8(khri brgyad): pa rnams kyis lung bstan yin// bdag ni mnyam par gzhag ces 'am langs shes rlom sems med// ci'i phyir zhe na/ don chos rang bzhin yongs shes phyir// de ltar spyod
307b1(khri brgyad): na bde gshegs rnams kyi shes rab spyod// de ni spyod dang mi spyod rab tu shes pas na// chos gang spyod pa de yang dmigs par mi 'gyur te// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod
307b2(khri brgyad): mchog yin// gang zhig yod pa ma yin de ni med ces bya// byis pa rnams kyis de btags med dang yod par byed// yod dang med pa 'di gnyis med pa'i chos yin te/ byang chub
307b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' gang zhig 'di shes de nges 'byung // gang 'dir phung po lnga dag sgyu ma 'dir shes shing / sgyu ma gzhan dang phung po gzhan du mi byed la/ sna tshogs 'du shes bral zhing nye bar
307b4(khri brgyad): zhi spyod pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yi na// dge ba'i bshes dang ldan zhing lhag mthong ldan gyur pras// rgyal ba rnams kyi yum thos skrag par yongs mi 'gyur
307b5(khri brgyad): gang zhig sdig pa'i grogs ldan gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa// de ni snod so ma btang chus reg zhig pa bzhin// ci phyir/ ra 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bya zhe na// chags pa'i
307b6(khri brgyad): byed pa kun la chags pa gcod 'dod pas// rgyal ba rnams kyi byang chub chags med gyur la reg/ des na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'thob bo// ci'i phyir de ni sems dpa' che/ 
307b7(khri brgyad): zhes bya zhes na/ 'di ni sems can phung po chen po'i mchog 'gyur dang / sems can khams kyi lta gyur chen po gcod pa ste/ de phyir 'di ni sems dpa' che zhes brjod pa yin// 
307b8(khri brgyad): gtong ba che dang blo che ba dang mthu che dang // rgyal ba rnams kyi theg chen mchog la zhugs pa dang / bdud kyi g.yo rgyu gdul phyir go cha che bgos pa/ de'i phyir na sems dpa' che zhes brjod
308a1(khri brgyad): pa yin/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis bzhi mdor sprul byas te// skye bo phal chen mgo mang dbye ba gcod par byed// sgyum ci 'dra de 'drar sems can de/ 
308a2(khri brgyad): kun shes// 'gro kun sprul pa 'dra bar de la 'jigs pa med// gzugs dang 'du shes tshor ba dang ni sems pa dang // rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol yod pa min// de ltar
308a3(khri brgyad): byang chub 'jug cing zhum pa'i sems med pa// 'di ni gang zag dam pa rnams kyi go cha mchog/ ci phyir 'di ni byang chub theg chen bya zhe na// de ni gang bzhon sems can thams cad mya ngan zla/ 
308a4(khri brgyad): theg pa 'di ni gzhal med khang chen na mkha' mtshungs// dga' skyid bde ba mngon par thob byed theg pa mchog/ zhen nas/ gang zhig phyog su 'gro ba de mi dmigs// mya ngan 'das par
308a5(khri brgyad): 'gro bar gsungs na 'gro mi dmigs// dper na me shi de'i 'gro rgyu mi dmigs bzhin// de phyir de ni mya ngan 'das shes brjod pa yin// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang / 
308a6(khri brgyad): da ltar yang // byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs dus gsum dag pa ste/ gang dag de ni 'dus byas ma yin spros med de/ 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// byang chub
308a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' mkhas pa gang tshe gang dus na// skye ba med par bsams te de ltar spyod cing // snying rje chen po bskyed kyang sems can 'du shes med// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod
308a8(khri brgyad): mchog yin// gal te sems can 'du shes sdug bsngal 'du shes skyed// sdug bsngal spyad par bya zhing 'gro don bya snyam ste/ bdag dang sems can yongs rtog byang chub sems dpa' ste/ 
308b1(khri brgyad): 'di ni shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod ma yin// bdag ci 'dra ba de 'drar sems can thams cad shes// sems can thams cad ci 'dra de 'drar chos kun shes// skye ba med dang / 
308b2(khri brgyad): skye ba gnyi gar mi rtog pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// 'jig rten dag na chos ming ji snyed yongs brjod pa/ skye ba kun las yang ngag 'das shing thal byas nas// 
308b3(khri brgyad): 'chi med ye shes mchogs thob de la gzhal med de/ de phyir 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin ces bya// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig dogs med 'di ltar spyong // de ni thabs dang she
308b4(khri brgyad): rab gnas par shes par bya// chos rnams rang bzhin med par yongasu shes gyur pa// 'di ni shes rab pa rol tu phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// gang zhig gzugs la
308b5(khri brgyad): mi gnas tshor la mi gnas shing // gang zhig 'du shes mi gnas sems par mi gnas la/ rnam shes gang mi gnas pa chos nyid mi gnas ste// 'di ni shes rab pha rol
308b6(khri brgyad): phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// rtag dang mi rtag bde dang sdug bsngal sdug mi sdug/ bdag dang bdag med de bzhin nyid dang stong nyid dang / 'bras bu thob dang dgra bcom sa la mi gnas shing // 
308b7(khri brgyad): rang rgyal sa dang sangs rgyas sa la mi gnas te// ji ltar ston pa 'dus ma byas khams mi gnas shing // de bzhin 'dus byas la yang mi gnas gnas med rgyu// de ltar byang chub
308b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' gnas la gnas med gnas// gnas med gnas yin 'di ni rgyal bas gnas shes gsungs// gang dag bde gshegs nyan thos 'gyur bar bya snyam dang / rang sangs
309a1(khri brgyad): rgyas dang chos rgyal 'gyur byed 'dod pa// bzod pa 'di la mchen thob par mi nus te// dper na pha rol nur rol 'gro dgas mi mthong bzhin/ 
309a2(khri brgyad): gang zhig chos nyid 'gro dang gang bshad thos pa dang / 'bras bu thob dang rang rgyal de bzhin 'jig rten mgon// mkhas pa gsal ba mya ngan 'das pa gang thob pa// de dag thams cad de bzhin/ 
309a3(khri brgyad): gshegs pas sra su gzigs// gang zag bzhi po de dag de la mi skrag te// rgyal sras bden la mkhas dang phyir mi ldog pa dang // dgra bcom dri ma bsal cing som nyi spangs pa dang // dge/ 
309a4(khri brgyad): pa'i bshes kyis yongasu srin byas bzhi pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de ltar spyod pa ni// dgra mas la mi slob rkyen rtogs sar mi slog/ thams cad ma
309a5(khri brgyad): nyid ched du sangs rgyas chos la slob// bsgrub pa mi slob la gyis slob pa de bslab yin// gzugs 'brel ba nga yongs 'bri longasu bzung phyir min// sna tshogs chos rnam
309a6(khri brgyad): yong su bzung phyir slob pa min// de ltar slob pa thams cad mkhyen nyid yongs 'dzin cing // ngas 'byung 'di ni sngon dga' ba'i bslab pa yin// gzugs ni shes rab ma yin gzugs la/ 
309a7(khri brgyad): shes rab med// tsher dang 'du shes sems pa dag dang rnam par shes// 'di dag shes rab ma yin de la shes rab med// de dag nam pa'i khams mtshungs tha dad yod ma yin// dmigs
309a8(khri brgyad): pa rnams kyi rang bzhin de'i pha mtha' mid// sems can rang bzhin gang yin de yang ba mtha' med// dam pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yang bamatha' zeng / 'jig rten mkhas pa'i
309b1(khri brgyad): shes rab de yang pha mtha' med// 'du shes tshur rol yin zhes 'dren pas yongasu bsgrags// rnam shes rnam par bshig nas spong ba pha rol 'gro/ gang dag de la 'du shes bral ba
309b2(khri brgyad): rjes thob pa// de dag pha rol phyin nas ston pa'i bka' la gnas// gal te gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi bskal bzhugs te// ston pa 'di yis sems can zhes bya'i sgra brjod kyang // bzod nas/ 
309b3(khri brgyad): dag pa'i sems can skye ba ga la yod// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// gang tshe ni shes rab pha rol phyin 'di dang // mthun par smra gyur de tshe sngon gyi skyes mchog gi// 
309b4(khri brgyad): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas 'gyu ro zhes// nga la lung bstan gyur ces rgyal ba de skad gsungs// shes rab pha rol phyin gang mgon po rnams spyod pa/ 'di ni gang zhig
309b5(khri brgyad): rtags 'dzin kun tu chub byed pa// de la dug dang mtshon dang / nga me dang chus mi tshugs// bdud dang bdud kyi phyog/ sa kyis glags kyang rnyed mi 'gyur// la las bde gshegs
309b6(khri brgyad): yongasu mya ngan 'das pa yi// mchod rten rin chen bdun las byas shing mchod byed la// bde gshegs mchod rten gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed// de dag rnams kyi bye ba phrag stong zhing gang ste/ 
309b7(khri brgyad): yongasu brtag bzung zhing rnams bye ba mtha' yas na// sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis// las gzhan mi byad lha'i me tog spos rab dang / byug pas dus gsum bskal
309b8(khri brgyad): pa'am de bas lhag mchod la// gang zhig gang las rnam 'dren stobs bcu 'byung 'gyur ba// bde bar gshegs pa'i yum 'di glegs bam bris byas te// 'chang zhing me tog byug pas/ 
310a1(khri brgyad): bsti bstang byed gyur na// mchod rten byas mchod bsod nams des ni char mi phod// rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol byin 'di rig sngags che// sems can
310a2(khri brgyad): khamal mya ngan sdug bsngal chos zhi byed// gang dag 'das dang gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon// rig sngags 'di bslabs sman pa'i rgyal po bla med gyur// gang dag phan dang snying
310a3(khri brgyad): brtser bcas pa skyed spyod pa// rig sngags 'di la bslabs nas mkhas pa byang chub reg/ 'dus byas bde dang 'dus ma byas bde gang yin pa// bde ba de kun 'di las 'byung bar rig par bya// 
310a4(khri brgyad): sa bon btab nas sa la gnas nas 'byung 'gyur ba// chogangs pa rnyed nas rnam mang gzugs dag rnam par bskyed/ pha rol phyin lnga byang chub ston ji snyed pa// de dag kun kyang
310a5(khri brgyad): shes rab pha rol phyin las skye// 'khor lo sgyur rgyal lam/ gang nas ni rtag 'gro ba// lam de nyid nas rin chen bdun dang dpung tshogs kun// gang nas rgyal ba'i shes
310a6(khri brgyad): rab pha rol phyin 'di 'gro// de nyid nas ni ston chos kun 'gro bar 'gyur// rgyal bas brgya byin dri ba yongs dris lan gsol ba// gal te gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing gyur la/ 
310a7(khri brgyad): kun rgyal ba'i ring bsrel byu bur bltam gyur kyang // bdag ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di nyid len// ci slad ce na sku gdung mi gus bdag ma lags// 'on kyang shes rab yongasu bsgoms
310a8(khri brgyad): bas mchod par 'gyur// dper na rgyal po rten mi rim gro kun thob ltar// sangs rgyas ring bsrel shes rab pha rol phyin la rten// nor bu rin chen lhon kun ldang ring tang med// gang
310b1(khri brgyad): tshe gang du rtsal bde ni phyag bgyi 'os// de phyung gyur kyang gabaco la ni dga' bgyid de// ston de dag nor bu ris de'i lags// de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin mchog ston gyis// rgyal
310b2(khri brgyad): ba mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel mchod pas brnyes// de ltas gang zhig rgyal ba'i ston 'dzin 'tshal das// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di ni zab pa lags// sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sngon du
310b3(khri brgyad): 'gro ba shes rab ste// tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan de bzhin no// dge chos chud mi gsan phyir yongasu 'dzin pa yin// 'di ni chos rnams thams cad tshul gcig
310b4(khri brgyad): ston par byed// dper na 'dzam+bu'i gling na shing mang bya ba stod// rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i gzugs ldan pa// dgrib mar gyur pa'i grangasu brjod pa ma gtogs par// grib
310b5(khri brgyad): ma sna tshogs med cing bye brag yod ma yin// de bzhin rgyal ba pha rol phyin lnga 'di dag kyang // shes rab pha rol phyin pas yongasu bsngos gyur te// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
310b6(khri brgyad): phyir yong su bsngos byas na// byang chub bsngos pas drug kun 'dir ni tshul cig gyur// byang chub sems dpa' gal te yongasu mi shes bzhin// gzugs dang 'du shes tshor nga sems
310b7(khri brgyad): dang rnam par shes// mi rtag yongasu brjod pa chos la spyod pa ste// mkhas pa nam yang chos rnams chud gson mi byed do// gang la gzugs dang tsher ba 'du shes mi dmigs shing // 
310b8(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa dag dang sems pa mi dmigs la// chos kun skye med stong pa'i tshul du rab shes pa// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zhing
311a1(khri brgyad): rnams ji snyed pa/ de snyed sems can la las dgra bcom nyid brtul bas/ gang gis shes rab pha rol phyin 'di yig bris te// sems can gzhan la glegs
311a2(khri brgyad): byin bsod nams khyad par 'phags// ci phyir zhe na smra mchog de dag 'dir bslabs nas// chos rnams mtha' dag stong pa nyid du 'dir ston byed// de thos nyan thos myur du rnam par grol
311a3(khri brgyad): la reg/ rang rgyal byang chub dang ni sangs rgyas byang chub reg/ lcug ma med par sngon 'byung 'jig rten yong med na// de la yal 'dab me tog 'bras bu ga la 'byung // byang chub sems
311a4(khri brgyad): med rgyal 'byung 'jig rten yod med na// 'bras bu brgya byi ngan tshangs pa nyan thos ga la 'byung // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang tshe 'od kyi dra ba 'gyed// de tshe sems can las
311a5(khri brgyad): byed brtson pa de bzhin du// mkhas pa'i shes phyir 'jig/ rten byang chub sems byung na// ye shes kyis ni sem/ sa can ston chos dang ldan// dper na ma dros mtsho la bdag
311a6(khri brgyad): med gyur pa ni// chu klung 'dzam+bu'i gling 'dir 'bab par ga la 'gyur// chu klung med na me tog 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur// rgya mtsho la yang rin chen gzugs mang med par 'gyur// de
311a7(khri brgyad): bzhin 'dir yang byang chub sems med bde gshegs kyi// ye shes 'jig rten 'di dag kun tu ga la 'byung // ye shes med na ston 'phel med byang chub med// rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas
311a8(khri brgyad): chos kyang med par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di ni srin bu me khyer ji snyed pa// kun gyis snang bar bya phyir 'odi rnams byung ba bas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer gcig phyung ches mchog ste/ 
311b1(khri brgyad): me khyer tshogs kyi 'od rnams kun gyis char mi phod// nyan thos tshogs rnams ji snyed sbyin dang tshul khrims dang // sdom dang rab tu ldan pa'i bsod nams skyed pa yang // byang chub sems/ 
311b2(khri brgyad): dpa' rjesu yid tsal gcig la// nyan thos tshogs kyi bsod nams phung pos char mi phod// 'das dus sngon gyi sa ng+yas bye ba khrag khrig gang // zhing mang mtha' yas dag na bye stong gang
311b3(khri brgyad): bzhugs dang // gang yang mya ngan 'das pa 'jig rten mgon po rnams// sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir rin chen chos ston to// dang po byang chub mchog tu sems skyed bskyed pa nas// rnam
311b4(khri brgyad): par 'dren pa rnams kyi dam chos zad kyi dus// de bar rgyal dab de dag bsod nams gang yin pa// pha rol phyin/ dang ldan dang sangs rgyas gang dag dang // gang yang sangs
311b5(khri brgyad): rgyas sras rnams dang ni nyan thos dang // slob dang mi slob dang ge ba zag bcas zag med pa// bsdus nas byang chub sems dpa' rje su yid rang byed// 'gro ba'i don du byang
311b6(khri brgyad): chub rgyur phyir thams cad bsngo// yongs bsngo gal te sems dang 'du shes gnas byed cing // byang chub 'du shes yongs sngo sems can 'du shes pa// 'du shes dang ni lta bas sems
311b7(khri brgyad): gsum ldan par gnas// dmigs pa yod pas yongasu bsngos par chung ma yin// gal te 'di ltar chos rnams 'gag shing zad pa dang / gang du yongasu bsngo ba de yang zad pa dang // 
311b8(khri brgyad): chos kyis chos la nam yang mi bsngo shes gyur na// de ltar rab tu shes pas yongasu bsngos pa yin// gang te mtshan mar byed na de ni bsngo ma yin// ji ste mtshan ma med na byang
312a1(khri brgyad): chub bsngo ba yin// ji ltar dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas bzang za ba// dkar po'i chos la dmigs pa'ang de 'drar rgyal bas gsungs// de ltar/ 
312a2(khri brgyad): bdag gis yongasu bsngo ba bslab bya ste// ji ltar rgyal ba de dag dge bar rab mkhyen pa'i// rnam pa gang dang 'byung gang mtshan de gang yin la// rje su yid rang de lta de ltar yongasu bsngo/ 
312a3(khri brgyad): de ltar bsod nams byang chub yongasu sngo byed na// dug med sangs rgyas mi spong rgyal bas gsungs pa smra// de ltar yongs sngo dpa' bo 'jig rten dmigs can gyi// byang chub sems/ 
312a4(khri brgyad): dpa' thams cad de yis zil gyis gnon// dmus long dmigs bu med pa bye khrag khrig rnams// lam yang mi shes grong khyer 'jug par ga la 'gyur// shes rab med
312a5(khri brgyad): na mig med pha rol phyin lnga 'di// dmigs bu med pas byang chub reg par nus ma yin// gang tshe shes rab kyi ni rab tu zin gyur na// de dag mig rnyed gyur cing 'di
312a6(khri brgyad): / dag ming thob po// dper na ri me'i las ni yongs zin mig med pa// mig ma byas pas de tshe rngan pa mi tho ba bzhin// gang tshe 'dus byas 'dus ma byas dang dkar nags chos// shes
312a7(khri brgyad): rab rnam par zhig nas rdul tsam mi dmigs tshe// 'jig rten dag na shes rab pha rol phyin grangs 'gro// na mkhar gar mi gnas pa ci yang med pa bzhin// gal te bdag ni rgyal ba'i
312a8(khri brgyad): shes rab sbyad bya zhing // sems can sdug bsngal reg pa khrag khrig mang sgrol sems// sems can 'du shes yongs brtag byang chub sems dpa' ste// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin
312b1(khri brgyad): nga'i spyod mchog min// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig sngon srung skyong pa'i tshe// pha rol tu phyin 'dir spyad pa mkhas pa som nyi med// thos ma thag tu de ni ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed/ 
312b2(khri brgyad): de'i byang chub zhi ba myur du rtog par 'gyur// sngon spyod chen sangs rgyas khrag khrig bkur byas kyang // rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin la ma dang na// de ni dper na tshong pa rin chen gling song la/ 
312b3(khri brgyad): zong rnams zad par byas nas phyir ldog byed dang mtshungs// de lta bas na gal te sangs rgyas ye shes mchog/ reg par 'dod na rgyal ba'i yum 'dir dad par gyis// thos nas blo chung gang
312b4(khri brgyad): zhig 'di ni spong byed pa// de spangs nas ni mnar med 'gro ste/ skyabs med 'gyur// gzugs kyi dag pa 'bras bu'i dag par rig par bya// 'bras bu gzugs dag thams cad
312b5(khri brgyad): mkhyen nyid dag par gsungs// thams cad mkhyen nyid la/ bras bu dag pas gzugs kyang dag/ namakha'i kham sa dang mtshungs shing gcad med dbye ba med// dpa' bo
312b6(khri brgyad): shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'dir spyod pa// byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum yang dag 'das gyur cing // nyon mongs bsal bar gyur kyang skye ba ston par byed// rga dang na dang 'chi ba
312b7(khri brgyad): med kyang 'chi 'pho ston// 'gro ba 'di dag 'dod ming gzugs kyi 'dam la thog/ til gyi 'khor lo lta bu'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khyam// 'gro ba 'khrul pa ri dgas rgya 'dra shes gyur na// 
312b8(khri brgyad): shes rab ldan pa mkha' la bya bzhin rnam par rgyu// spyod pa yongs dag gang zhig gzugs la mi spyod cing // rnams shes 'du shes tshor ba sems par mi sbyong na// de ltar spyod pa chags
313a1(khri brgyad): pa thams cad yongs spong // chags las rnam par grol ba bde gshegs shes rab spyod// de ltar spyo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba/ 
313a2(khri brgyad): chags pa bcad nas 'jig rten chags pa med par 'gyur// nyi ma sgra gcan bza' bral lde der 'dug pa dang // me btang rtswa dang shing dang nags tshal bsreg pa bzhin// chos rnams thams cad / 
313a3(khri brgyad): rang bzhin dag par yongs rtogs shing // byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pha rol phyin mthong na// byed pa po yang mi dmigs chos kun mi dmigs te// 'dir ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i
313a4(khri brgyad): spyod mchog yin// rgyal ba la ni lha rgyal brgya byin gyis zhus dpa// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spyod pa ji ltar btso dan// phung po khams la rdul tsam brtson par mi byed pa// phung
313a5(khri brgyad): mi brtson de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson// gang zhin rje/ sa 'di sbrul dang sgyu ma 'drar thos na// som nyi med kyi bslab la phyir zhing sbyor byed pa// sems can de ni ring nas/ 
313a6(khri brgyad): theg zhugs rig par bya// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig mang la lhag byas yin// dpag tshad mang por dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pa'i mis// gnag rdzi mtshams dang nags tshal phun sum tshogs
313a7(khri brgyad): mthong na// 'di dag grong dang grong khyer nye ba'i rtags snyam te// dbugs phyin rnyed par gyur cing chom rkun 'jigs pa med// de bzhin byang chub yongs tshol tshe rgyal rnams// shes rab pha rol
313a8(khri brgyad): phyin 'di mnyan pa gang thob pa// de ni dbugs phyin thob par gyur cing 'jigs med de// dgra bcom sa la yin rkyen rtogs la yin// mi zhig rgya mtsho'i chu ni blta phyir 'gro ba yis// gal
313b1(khri brgyad): te shing dang nags rnams mthong nad dung ring // ji ste ma mthong rgya mtsho che de mi ring ste// nye bar gyur pa'i rtags yin snyam du som nyid med// de ltar byang chub dam par rab zhugs rig bya ste/ 
313b2(khri brgyad): rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di nyan pa// rnam par 'dren pas mngon sum lung bstan mgyur kyang // ring por ma thig sangs rgyas byang chub rig par 'gyur// dpyid dus bzang 'brung
313b3(khri brgyad): rtswa dang lo ma yal kha rnams// lo ma 'bras bu me tog yang dag skyed par byed// shes rab pha rol phyin 'di su'i lag thob pa// ring por mi thogs 'dren pa'i byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// 
313b4(khri brgyad): dper na bud med sbrum pa'i sdug bsngal nyen gyur na// de ni de'i btsa' ba'i dus bab shes par bya// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i shes rab nyan// 'dun pa rtog
313b5(khri brgyad): cing myur du byang chub reg par 'gyur// shes rab pha ro/ la phyin spyod tshe rnal 'byor pa// gzugs kyi 'phe/ la ba dang ni yongasu 'grib mi mthong // chos dbyings chos
313b6(khri brgyad): dang min rnamasu mi mthong ste// mya ngan 'das la mi reg de ni shes rab gnas// gang zhig 'dir spyod sangs rgyas chos rnams mi rtog ste// stobs dang rdzu 'phrul rkang dang byang chub zhi mi
313b7(khri brgyad): rtog/ rnam par mi rtog rtog bral byin gyis rlabs kyis spyod// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// smra ba'i zla ba sangs rgyas la ni rab 'byor zhus// ston pas bar
313b8(khri brgyad): tu gcod par 'gyur ba mang gsungs na// ston dga' ba rnams kyi bar du gcod gang lags// de la chung zad tsam zhig yongasu rjod par bya// rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di yig
314a1(khri brgyad): bris tshe// spobs pa tha dad rnam pa dum 'byung 'gyur te// 'gro ba'i don ma byas par glog bzhin myur du yang // yongasu nyams par 'gyur ba 'di ni bdud
314a2(khri brgyad): las// 'di bshang tshem bcig som nyid za 'gyur te// 'dren pas 'dir ni bdag gi ming yang yongs ma brjod// rigs dang sa dang rus kyang yong su ma brjod ces// de ni nyan par mo
314a3(khri brgyad): 'gyur spong 'gyur bdud kyi las// de ltar rtsa ba thab ni yongasu mi shes pas// blun po de dag yal kha 'dab mtshol bar 'gyur// glang po rnyed kyang glang po'i rjes ni tshol bltar// shes
314a4(khri brgyad): rab pha rol phyin thos mdo 'tshol de bzhin// dper na la la raro brgya ldan pa'i zas rnyed la// zas mchog rnyed nas drug cu pa dag tshol byed ltar// byang chub sems dpa' pha rol
314a5(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di rnyed nas// dgra bcoms las byang chub tshol/ byed de bzhin no// bsti stang 'dod par 'gyur zhing / dpa 'dod 'gyur dang // lta ba'i sems dang bcas te khyim
314a6(khri brgyad): 'dris byed ldan zhing // chos btang nas ni chos mi ni bya ba spyod 'gyur ro// lam por lam gol song ba 'di ni bdud kyi las// gang dag de'i tshe na chos kyi dam pa 'di// nyan par 'dun cing
314a7(khri brgyad): dad pa bskyed par gyur pa las// de dag chos smra bya ba min dang ldan rig nas// dga' ba med par gyur cing yid kyang mi bde bas// de'i tshe na bdud kyi las 'di 'byung bar 'gyur// gzhan
314a8(khri brgyad): yang bar chad 'gyur ba rnam pa du ma ste// de tshe gang dag gis ni dge slong mang dkrugs nas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di ni 'dzin mi byed// rin chen gang dag rin tang med cing dkon gyur
314b1(khri brgyad): pa// de dag la ni rtag tung dgra yang rab tu mang // de bzhin rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog/ dkon mchog rin chen la yang gnod pa byed pa'ang mang // theg pag sar duzhuH/ 
314b2(khri brgyad): pa sems can blo chung ba// gang zhig dkon pa'i rin chen 'di ni ma rnyed pa// de la bar chad bya phyir bdud ni spro bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'di dag yongasu 'dzin dang ldan// 
314b3(khri brgyad): ma zhig na bar gyur la bu ni mang yod pa// de kun yid mi bde zhing de la rim 'gro byed// de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi sangs rgyas kyang // yum 'gyur shes rab dam pa 'di/ 
314b4(khri brgyad): la dgongs pa mdzad// gang dag 'das dang phyogs bcu'i// 'jig rten mgon gang dang // ma 'ongs dus na 'byung 'gyur de dag 'di las byung // 'jig rten ston pa bskyed pa
314b5(khri brgyad): rgyal ba rnams kyi yum// sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod pa ston par byed// 'jig rten de bzhin nyid dang dgra bcom de bzhin nyid// rang rgyal de bzhin nyid dang rgyal ba
314b6(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid// gcig pa nyid de dngos bral gzhan min de bzhin nyid// shes rab pha rol phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen// mkhas pa 'jig rten gnas sam mya ngan 'das
314b7(khri brgyad): kyang rung // chos nyid skyon med chos rnam stong pa 'di gnas te// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin nyid 'di rjesu rtogs// de phyir de bzhin gshegs shes sangs rgyas mtshan gsol to// shes
314b8(khri brgyad): rab pha rol phyin pa nyams dgar rab rten pa// stobs bcu rnams 'dren rnams kyi spyod yul 'di yin te// sems can sdug bsngal ngan song gsum las yongs 'don kyang // de dag
315a1(khri brgyad): nam kyang sems can 'du shes 'gyur ba med// dper na seng ge ri sul brten nas 'jigs med par// ri dgas phra ma skrag par byed cing sgra sgrog ltar/ 
315a2(khri brgyad): mimi'i seng ge shes rab pha rol phyin rten nas// mu steg can mang skrag byed 'jigs med sgra yang sgrog/ dper na na mkhar gnas pa nyi ma'i 'od zer ni// sa 'di skems par byed cing gzugs
315a3(khri brgyad): kyang rab tu ston// de bzhin chos rgyal shes rab pha rol phyin brten pa// sred pa'i chu klung skems shing chos kyang rab tu ston// gzugs rnams mi mthong tshor ba dag kyang mi mthong zhing / 
315a4(khri brgyad): 'du shes mthong ba med la sems pa mi mthong zhing // gang la rnam par shes dang sems kyang mi mthong ba// 'di ni chos mthong yin zhes de bzhin gshegs pas bstan/ 
315a5(khri brgyad): namapar mthong zhes sems can tshigs du rab brjod pa/ namakha' ji ltar mthong ba don 'di rtogs shig ltar/ de ltar chos mthong ba yang de bzhin gshegs pas bstan/ 
315a6(khri brgyad): mthang ba dper ni brjod par nus pa ma yin no// gang gi de ltar mthong ba de yis chos kun mthong // rgyal po btang snyoms 'dug cing blon po kun byed ltar// sangs rgyas mdzad dang nyan thos
315a7(khri brgyad): chos rnams ji snyed pa// de dag thams cad shes rab pha rol phyin pa byed// rgyal po grong du mi 'gro yul 'khor mi 'gro la// rang gi yul las 'du ba thams cad sdud pa ltar// byang chub
315a8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chos nyid gang du'ang mi g.yo' la// sangs rgyas sa'i ston gang yin thams cad sdud// gang zhig bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa' brtan zhing // shes rab kyi pha rol
315b1(khri brgyad): byin mchog la bsam sbyor ba// nyan thos rang rgyalas gnyis shin tu 'das byas nas// zil gyis mi non rgyal ba'i byang chub myur du thog/ dper na rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i gru'i chag gyur/ 
315b2(khri brgyad): la/ mi gang ro'am rtswa 'am shing ni mi 'dzin pa// chung bus 'dzin par 'gyur te ngogs byin mi 'gyur// gang zhig 'dzin pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur// de ltar gang dag dang ldan dang / 
315b3(khri brgyad): pa rnyed gyur pa// shes rab pha rol phyin pa rnam par spong mi byed// de dag thabs kyi ston shes rab yongs bzung ste// mchog tu rmad byang bde gshegs byang chub myur tu reg/ dper na la
315b4(khri brgyad): las rdza som btang chu skyed na// nyams chung phyir ni myur du 'jig par rig par bya// so btang bum par chu skyed lam tu 'jig pa yis// 'jigs pa med pa'i bde bar/ 
315b5(khri brgyad): khyim du phyin par 'gyur// gzhan yang byang chub sems pa dad pa mang gyur kyang // shes rab rnam par nyam sa na myur du 'jig par 'gyur// dad pas shes rab de ni
315b6(khri brgyad): yongasu zin gyur na// sa gnyis shin tu 'das te byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// dper na bcos legs ma byas gru ni rgya mtsho'i nang // nor dang bcas shing tshong bar bcas te 'jig par
315b7(khri brgyad): 'gyur// gru de legs par bcos legs byas dang ldan gyur na// mi 'jig nor dang bcas pa ngog su phyin par 'gyur// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dad pas yongs bsgom kyang // 
315b8(khri brgyad): shes rab med na byang chub las ni myur nyams 'gyur// de nyid shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog ldan na// ma smas ma nyams rgyal ba'i byang chub reg par 'gyur// lo brgya nyi shu lon/ 
316a1(khri brgyad): rgos shing sdug bsngal mi// langs kyang bdag nyid 'gro bar nus pa ma yin te// de ni g.yas g.yon gnyis nas mi'i sa rten byas na// 'gyel ba'i
316a2(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa med cing bde blag 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' shes rab stobs chung ba// rab tu zhugs par gyur kyang bar du 'jig par 'gyur// de nyid thabs dang she
316a3(khri brgyad): rab mchog gis yongs zin na// mi 'jigs de bzhin gshegs kyi byang chub reg par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' dang po'i las kyi sar gnas gang // lhag pa'i bsam pas sang
316a4(khri brgyad): rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs pa// slob ma bzang po bla mgu das dang rab ldan pa// mkhas de dag gis dge ba shes rtag tu bsten par bya// ci phyir zhe na mkhas pa'i ston de
316a5(khri brgyad): las 'byung // de dag shes rab pha rol phyin pa rjesu ston// sangs rgyas chos rnams dge ba'i bshes la bston to// zhes ston kun gyi mchog mnga' rgyal ba de skad gsung // sbyin
316a6(khri brgyad): ngang tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab byang chub yongasu bsngo bar gyis// phung po zhen nas mchog tu 'dzin par mi byed ces// dang po'i las can dag
316a7(khri brgyad): la de skad bstan par bya// de ltar spyod pa legs mtsho smra ba'i zla ba rnams// 'gro ba'i skyabs dang dpung ba nyen dang ni gnas yin te// rten dang blo dang gling dang yongs 'dren don 'dod dang // gsal
316a8(khri brgyad): byed sgron ma chos mchog smra ba mi 'khrugs bzhin// grags chen ldan rnams bya dka' go cha gon byed de// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams kyi go cha min// theg gsum 'du shes bral zhing
316b1(khri brgyad): yongasu bzung ba med// mi ldog g.yo ba med cing chos rnams 'khrugs pa med// de dag 'di 'dra'i chos dang ldan zhing spros pa med// som nyi yid gnyis 'gyod dang bral zhing don dang ldan// shes
316b2(khri brgyad): rab pha rol phyin pa thos nas mi nur ba// gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing mi ldog rig par bya// 'dren pa rnams kyi chos 'di zab ste mthong bar dka'// sus kyang rtog pa med cing thob par gyur med pa// 
316b3(khri brgyad): don gcig nyid du rtogs nas/ phan byed snying brtser 'gyur// blo chung sems can tshogs sus 'di ni shes par 'gyur// sems can rnams ni gnas la dga' zhing yul rnams 'dod// 'dzin la
316b4(khri brgyad): gnas shing mi mkhas blun rmongs mun pa bzhin// thob par bya raba'i chos ni gnas med 'dzin med de// 'di ni 'jig rten dag dang rtsod pa 'byung ba yin// na mkha'i khams ni shar gyi
316b5(khri brgyad): phyogs dang lho phyogs dang // de bzhin nub kyi phyogs dang byang / phyogs pa mtha' yas// steng dang 'og dang phyogs pa cu ji snyed rnams na'ang // tha dad gyur pa med cing bye brag gyur
316b6(khri brgyad): pa med// 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ma phyin de bzhin nyid// da ltar de bzhin nyid dang dgra bcom de bzhin nyid// chos kun de bzhin nyid dang rgyal ba'i de bzhin nyid// de ni chos kyi de bzhin nyid
316b7(khri brgyad): de bye brag med// bde gshegs byang chub tha dad chos dang bral gyur pa// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig thob 'dod pa// thabs dang ldan pas shes rab pha rol phyin la sbyor// 'dren
316b8(khri brgyad): pa shes rab med na 'thob par 'gyur ma yin// bya zhig lus che dpag tshad brgya pa yod gyur tam// dpag tshad lnga bcur gyur pa'i gshog zad stobs med pa// de ni sum bcu rtsa gsum
317a1(khri brgyad): gnas nas 'dzam gling 'dir// bdag nyid mchongs na de ni nyam nyes 'gyur ba yin// rgyal ba rnams kyi pha rol phyin pa lnga 'di yang // bskal pa bye ba khrag
317a2(khri brgyad): khrig mang por bsgrubs byas shing // smon lam mtha' yas rgya chen 'jig rten rtag bstan kyang // thabs med shes rab bral ba nyan thos nyid du lhung // sangs rgyas theg pa 'di la nges par 'byung
317a3(khri brgyad): 'dod pas// 'gro ba kun la sems snyoms pha ma'i 'du shes dang // phan pa'i sems dang byams pa'i yid dang brtul ba dang // tha ba med cing drang la tshig 'jam smra bar bya// 'jig rten
317a4(khri brgyad): mgon la gnas brtan rab 'byor yongs zhus pa// ston rgya ma tshe nyon mongs ma mchis rtags bstan gsol// mthu che ba drag ji ltar slar ldog mi 'gyur ba// de ltar ston phyogs
317a5(khri brgyad): tsam rgyal bas lung bstan gsol// tha dad 'du shes bral zhi nga tshig dang ldan par smra// dge sbyong dag dang bram ze ga/ zhan la brten mi byed// mkhas pa dus gsum rtag dung na// 
317a6(khri brgyad): song gsum po spangs// de dag dge ba bcu'i las lam mngon par brtson// zang zing med par 'gro la chos ni rje su ston// chos la cig du dga' zhing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan// 'gro
317a7(khri brgyad): 'chag nyal dang 'dug par shes bzhin rab tu ldan// gnya' shing gang tsam lta zhing 'gro la sems 'khrul med// gtsang byas gtsang ma'i gos 'chang gsum po dbyen zhing dag/ khyu mchog
317a8(khri brgyad): rtag tu chos 'dod rnyed pa 'dod ma yin// bdud kyi yul las 'das shing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog/ bsam gtan bzhi la bsam med bsam gtan der mi gnas// grags pa 'dod pa ma
317b1(khri brgyad): yin khro bas sems dkris med// khyim par gyur na rtag tu dngos po kun ma chags// 'tsho ba'i longs spyod mi mthun 'tsho ba'i bsam pa med// drag shul spyod sngags bud med sbyor ba'i sngags
317b2(khri brgyad): mi byed// rtsa 'am 'dod phyir mi las las rnams len mi byed rab tu dbyen pa shes rab pha rol phyin mchog brtson// 'thabs dang rtsod dang bral zhing byams pa'i sems kyang brtan// kun mkhyen
317b3(khri brgyad): 'dod cing brtan la rtag tu gzhol sems ldan// mtha' 'khob kla klo skye bo yul mtha' rnam par spangs// rang gis la dogs med rtag tu ri rab 'dra// chos phyir srog kyang 'dor zhing rnal 'byor/ 
317b4(khri brgyad): rab tu brtson// mi ldog rtags ni 'di dag yin par shes par bya// gzugs dang tshor dang 'du shes sems pa rnam she/ ngas rnams// zab cing rang bzhin mtshan ma med de rab zhi pa// 
317b5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyis ni phung po brtags pas gting mi rtogs// dpe ran mnga' yis rgya mtsho'i gting thug tshol dang mtshungs// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig zab mos 'di lta bur// don
317b6(khri brgyad): dam gos pa med pa'i chos rnams rtogs pa ste// gang na phung po med cing khams dang skye mched med// de la bsod nams sogs par jig ga la byed// dper na 'dod chags chos la spyod pa'i skyes pa
317b7(khri brgyad): zhig/ bud med dus btab de dang ma phrad rnams rtog pa// de ni nyin gcig sems kyi spyod pa ji snyed pa// de snyed bskal par byang chub sems dpas rje su rtogs// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig
317b8(khri brgyad): bskal mang bye stong du// sbyin pa sbyin dang tshul khrims dri med srung byed kyang // gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin mchog ldan pa'i mchog/ rjod pa'i legs la sbyin dang khrims kyi char mi pos// byang
318a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab mchog bsgoms te// de las langs nas gos pa med pa'i chos brjod cing // de yang 'gro ba'i don du byang chub rgyur sngon/ 
318a2(khri brgyad): dge ba de dang mnyam pa 'jig rten gsum na med// bsod nams de yang gsog dang de bzhin stong pa dang // gsob dang la ma R+Ya dang snying po med par snang // de ltar spyad pa spyod pa bdag shegs shes rab
318a3(khri brgyad): spyod// de ltar spyod pa bsod nams dpag med yongasu 'dzin// sangs rgyas rab tu bshad pa mdzad cing da pa pa/ chom la brjod pa tsam du zad par shes// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por brjod
318a4(khri brgyad): byas kyang // ches kyi dbyings la zad pa med cing 'phel ba med// gang zhig rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di dang // ming tsam nga zad par yongasu brjod pa'i chos de dag/ yongasu sngo rlom sems
318a5(khri brgyad): med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// nyams pa med cing sa / sa rgyas byang chub mchog reg 'gyur// 'bru mar snying / po 'bar ba phrad pa dang po yis// snying po tshig min de med
318a6(khri brgyad): pas kyang tshig pa min// me lce phrad pa thams snying po tshig min la// me lce tha ma med par snying po tshig min ltar// dang po'i sems kyis byang chub mchog reg ma yin la// de med pas kyang de/ 
318a7(khri brgyad): la reg par nus ma yin// tha ma'i sems kyis byang chub zhi 'thob nus ma yin// de med pas kyang de 'thob nus pa ma yin no// sa bon las ni myu gu me tog 'bras bu 'byung // de yang 'gags la
318a8(khri brgyad): de med par yang shing de med// de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub rgyu yin te// de yang 'gags la de med par yang byang chub med// chu'i thigs pa dang po chung ngu chung ngu yang // rims
318b1(khri brgyad): kyis tha mas rdza ma yongasu gang bar byed// de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub mchog rgyu ste// rim gyis dkar po'i ston rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// stong pa mtshan med smon pa med pa chos
318b2(khri brgyad): spyod cing // mya ngan 'das la mi reg mtshan ma la spyod cing // mya ngan 'das la mi reg mtshan ma la spyod pa// dper na mnyan pa mkhas pa par 'gro tshur 'gro yang // mtha' gnyis mi gnas rgya/ 
318b3(khri brgyad): mtshor gnas pa med pa bzhin// de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam bdag/ stobs bcus byang chub reg par lung bstan snyam mi sems// 'di la ci yang med ces byang chub skrag pa med// de
318b4(khri brgyad): ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyang pa yin// dgon pa'i dalam na lo nyes nad bcas 'jig rten rnams// mthong na/ skrag pa med cing bsngal ba'i go gyon to// phyi ma'i mu mthar
318b5(khri brgyad): tu brtson zhing rab shes nas// yongasu skyo ba'i yid kyi rdul tsam skyed pa med// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba shes rab spyong byed cing // phung po 'di dag gdod nas stong ni
318b6(khri brgyad): skye med shes// mnyam par ma bzhag sems can khams la snying rje 'jug/ bar skabs der yang sangs rgyas chos las yongs mi nyams// dper na skyes bu mkhas pa ston kun ldan zhing / 
318b7(khri brgyad): stobs ldan mi thub rgyu rtsal brtson byas tshul shes la// 'phong dang bzo gnas mang po'i pha rol phyin gyur cing // sgyu ma bsgrub shes 'gro don rab tu 'dod pa zhig/ pha dang ma dang chung mar bcas pa
318b8(khri brgyad): yongs bsdus na// dgra byed mang ba dgon pa'i lam du phyin pa dang // de'i sa dpa' zhing rtul pong skyes bu mang sprul nas// bde bar song ni daphyir yang khyim du 'ong ba ltar// de bzhin de che byang chu
319a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' mkhas pa yang // sems can khams rnams kun la snying rje chen po bskyed// bdud bzhi dag dang sa gnyis las kyang rab 'das nas// ting
319a2(khri brgyad): 'di la gnas shing byang chub reg mi byed// mkha' la rlung rten de la chu'i phung po rten// de las chen 'di rten de la 'gro ba rten// sems can las la spyod pa'i rgyu ni de 'dra ste// don de mkha'
319a3(khri brgyad): la gnas pa yin par bsam par bya// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid gnas pa// bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs 'gro la rab ston cing // sems can rnams kyi shes dang smon lam thabs
319a4(khri brgyad): stobs te// mya ngan 'das la mi reg stong par gnas pa med// / gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba// stong pa zhi pa'i ting 'dzin dam pa 'di spyod pa// bar skabs
319a5(khri brgyad): der ni mtshan ma sgom par mi bya ste// mtshan ma med par gan sa shing zhi la rab zhi spyod// bar snang 'phur ba'i bya la gnas yod ma yin te// de na gnas pa ma yin sa la ltung
319a6(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar sgo spyod pa// mya ngan 'das la mi reg mtshan ma spyod ma yin// dper na 'phong bslabs skyes bus gyen du 'da' 'phangs te/ mda' gzhan
319a7(khri brgyad): dgra gcig nas gcig tu long btags nas// snga ma'i mda' de sa la ltung ba'i skabs mi byed// mi de 'dod na mnga' des la ltung bar 'gyur// de ltar shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog spyod pa
319a8(khri brgyad): shes rab thabs stobs rdzu 'phrul gyis ni rnam rgyu zhing // de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba ji srid ma rdzogs pa// de srid stong nyid dam pa de ni thob mi byed// dper na dge slong rdzu 'phrul stobs mchog ldan
319b1(khri brgyad): pa zhig/ na mkhar gnas te chos 'phrul zung dag rnam par 'phrul// 'gro dang 'chag pa dang ni nyal dang 'dug pa ston// de ni ldog pa med cing de la skyo ba med// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'
319b2(khri brgyad): mkhas pa stong gnas shing // ye shes rdzu 'phrul pha rol son la gnas med rgyu// 'gro ba dag la bya ba rnam pa mtha' yas ston// bskal pa bye bar nyams pa med cing skyo ba med// dper na mi
319b3(khri brgyad): 'ga' g.yang sa chen por 'dug byed cing // lag pa gnyis gas gdugs gnyis 'dzin cing ji mi snyam// dus min rlung gi g.yang sa chen por phul byas kyang // bdag nyid der ni g.yang du ltung bar
319b4(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba med// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ste/ dang rjer gnas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi gdugs ni yongs bzung ste// chos rnams stong pa mtshan med smon pa
319b5(khri brgyad): med rtog cing // mya ngan 'das la reg pa med la chos kyang ma thong // dper na rin chen 'dod pa rin chen gling song ste// rin chen rnyed nas phyir yang khyim du 'ong bar byed// ded
319b6(khri brgyad): dpon de ni de la bde bar 'tsho mod kyi// 'on kyang gnyen bshes tshogs kyi sdug bsngal yid la 'byung // de ltar stong pa nyid kyi rin chen gling song ste// snying rje chen po bskyed cing sems can 'du she
319b7(khri brgyad): med// de tshe mkhas pa 'gro ba kun gyi sbyin gnas 'gyur// rtag tu yul 'khor bsod nams don yod yongasu spyod// lha mi sems can ring nas ngan song gsum 'brel pa// yongasu dgrol bar
319b8(khri brgyad): 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de// shes rab pha rol phyin pa nyid mtshan brtson byed pa// lam yangs 'di ni sems can khams kyi 'bab stegs ston// mi zhig sngon chad ma rnyed pa'i rin chen
320a1(khri brgyad): mchog/ dus gzhan zhig na rnyed par gyur te dga' ba las// rnyed ma thag tu stor te bag med gyur pas na// sbyor bas sdug bsngal rtag tu rin chen mngon 'dodapa/ 
320a2(khri brgyad): de ltar byang chub mchog zhugs rin chen mtshungs pa'i// shes rab pha rol phyin la rnal 'byor dor mi bya// rin chen rnyed nas 'dzin par byed cing mi phyed na// rje su 'brel bar byed cing myur du dbang // 
320a3(khri brgyad): du 'gyur// 'od zer 'phreng bas mun pas dkrugs pa'i mun nag kun// sel bar byed cing sprin med mkha' la nyi shar na// srog chags 'byung po'i srin bu me khyer thams cad dang // skar ma'i
320a4(khri brgyad): tshogs dang zla ba'i 'od kun zil gyis non// de ltar shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yi// byang chub sems da/ dpa' mkhas pa lta thibs sel byed cing // 'gro ba kun dang dgra
320a5(khri brgyad): bcom rang rgyal zil gyis non// byang chub sems dpa' sto/ nga ba mtshan med yongs spyad phyir// dper na rgyal po'i bu zhig nor gtong don 'dod pa// kun gyi gtso bor gyur te mngon
320a6(khri brgyad): bar 'gro bya'os// 'di ni da lta na yang sems can dga' byed na// thabs thob gyur nas rgyal srid gnas na smos ci dgos// de ltar spyad pa spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang // bdud rtsi sbyin// 
320a7(khri brgyad): pa byed cing lha dang mi rnams dga'// 'di ni da lta na yang sems can mang phan brtson// chos kyi rgyal por gnas par gyur nas smos ci dgos// de'i tshe na bdud ni zug rngu ldan par 'gyur// 
320a8(khri brgyad): mya ngan sdug bsngal nyams thag mthu chung yid mi bde// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di yid nur 'gyur zhes// 'jigs pa ston phyir phyogs rnams bsreg cing skar mda' gtong // gang / 
320b1(khri brgyad): tshe mkhas pa de dag bsam pa rab ldan zhing // nyin mtshan shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog don lta// rtag tu lus dang sems ni mkha' gro bya ltar gyur// de la nag po'i rtsa lag glags rnyed ga
320b2(khri brgyad): la 'gyur// gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'thab dang rtsod gyur cing // phan tshun mthun khros pa'i sems dang ldan 'gyur ba// de'i tshe na bdud ni dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur// de gnyis
320b3(khri brgyad): rgyal ba'i ye shes las ni ring du 'gyur// de gnyis ring du 'gyur zhing sha za 'dra bar 'gyur// de gnyis rang gi dam bcas nyams par byed par 'gyur// sdang zhing bzod dang bral la byang
320b4(khri brgyad): chub ga la yod// de ni bdud rnams dga' zhing bdud la thub mi 'gyur// lung bstan ma thob byang chub sems dang / da' la la zhig/ lung bstan thob la sems khros rtsod pa rtsom
320b5(khri brgyad): byed na// tha ba skyon ldan sems kyi skad cig ji snyed pa// de snyed bskal par phyir yang go cha bgo dgoso// sang sa rgyas bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pas byang chub reg/ de snyam
320b6(khri brgyad): sems shing ma legs snyam pa'i blo skyed de// so sor 'chags par byed cing phyis kyang sdom gtogs par// de ni dgra bcom rang rgyal dag la 'dod med pa// 'di ni bde bar gshegs pa'i
320b7(khri brgyad): sras kyi dben par gsungs// gang zhig dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa'i ri'i sul// sbrul gyi gang bar lo mang bye bar gnas byed kyang // dben pa 'di mi shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de// lhag
320b8(khri brgyad): pa'i nga rgyal rnyed nas 'dre bar gnas pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i don brtson bsam gtan dang // stobs dang dbang po rnam thar ting 'dzin slob rnams la// 'di ni dgon dben sbyong/ 
321a1(khri brgyad): pa min snyam sems byed pa// de ni dgon pa'i spyod yul min zhes rgyal bas gsungs// gang zhig grong ngam 'on te dgon par gnas kyang rung // theg pa
321a2(khri brgyad): gnyis kyi sems dral byang chub mchog nges na// 'di ni 'gro don zhugs pa rnams kyi dben pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' de ni bdag nyams gzhan ma yin// de lta bas na mkhas pas nga rgyal
321a3(khri brgyad): bcom byas te// bsam pa drag pos byang chub dam pa tshol ba na// nad pa shin tu gso phyir sman pa bstan pa ltar// g.yel ba med par dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par bya// sangs rgyas
321a4(khri brgyad): byang chub mchog zhugs byang chub sems dpa' dag/ pha rol daphyin dang mtshungs pa'i dge ba'i bshesu bstan// de dag na/ dan tan sa 'di rjesu ston pa yin// rnam pa gnyis kyi sangs
321a5(khri brgyad): rgyas byang chub rje su rtogs// rgyal ba 'das dang ma byon phyo gas bcur gang bzhugs pa// kun lam pha rol phyin pa 'di yin gzhan ma yin// pha rol phyin 'di byang chub
321a6(khri brgyad): mchog la zhugs rnams kyi// gsal dang sgron dang snang dang ston pa yin zhes bstan// ji ltar shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtshan gyis stong // de ltar mtshan dang chos 'di thams cad sus
321a7(khri brgyad): shes shing // chos rnams stong zhing mtshan nyid med par rab shes na// de ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod pa yin// sems can zas dang 'dod la yongasu rtog byed cing // 'khor
