321a8(khri brgyad): ba chags pa'i yid dang ldan rnams rtag tu 'khor// bdag dang bdag gi chos gnyis yod min stong pa ste// byis pa rnams kyis bdag la na mkha'i mdud 'di bcings// dper na dogs
321b1(khri brgyad): pas 'du shes kyis ni dug blangs pa// dug de lto bar song ba ma yin 'on kyang 'gyel// de ltar byis pa bdag dang bdag gis khas blangs pa// 'du shes skyes pas 'chi yang rtag tu yod ma yin// / 
321b2(khri brgyad): ji ltar 'dzin pa de ltar kun nas nyon mongs bstan// bdag dang bdag gi mi dmigs rnam par dag par gsungs// 'di la nyon mongs rnam dag gang yang yod min par// byang chub sems dpa'as
321b3(khri brgyad): shes rab pha rol phyin pas rtogs// 'dzam gling ma lus dag na sems can ji snyed pa// de dag thams cad byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas// lo stong bye ba mang por sbyin pa byin byas la/ 
321b4(khri brgyad): kun kyang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub rgyur sngo yang // gang ni dag shes rab pha rol phyin mchog mngon brtson pa// tha na nyi ma gcig cig rjesu 'thun byed na// bsod nams de la
321b5(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i phung pos char mi phod// de phyir g.yel med rtag tu shes rab 'jug par bya// shes rab pha rol phyin ma cho ga spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// byang chub sems dpa'
321b6(khri brgyad): bsam gtan dbang po stobs thob pa// mya ngan 'das la reg par mngon par dga' mod kyi// 'on kyang sdug bsngal sems can sdug bsngal yid la 'byung // tshong ba gang zhig grong khyer nang nas
321b7(khri brgyad): grong brdal dang // grong du bya ba'i phyir dang shes par bya phyir 'gro// de yang mi gnas rin chen gling du'ang ma gnas la// mkhas pa khyim du mi gnas lam la mkhas par 'gyur// de bzhin
321b8(khri brgyad): rang rgyal bcas pa'i nyan thos rnam grol shes// kun la byang chub sems dpa' gsal ba mkhas par 'gyur// de la mi gnas sangs rgyas ye shes gnas ma yin// lam mkhas chog
322a1(khri brgyad): shes pa 'dus byas gnas mi 'gyur// gang tshe 'gro la byams pa rjesu 'brel byas nas// stong pa mtshan med smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin spyod// gal te
322a2(khri brgyad): mya ngan 'das la reg byed de la med// de lta mod kyi de ni thob par byed kyang nus// dper na sprul pa'i mi lus mi snang ma yin zhing // de ni ming gis gdags par bya bar nus pa ste// de
322a3(khri brgyad): bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar sgor spyod pa// de ni ming gis gdags nus rnam pa gzhan du min// gal te spyod pa dang ni dbang po yongs dris la// byang chub sems dpa' zab chos
322a4(khri brgyad): yongasu mi ston te// stong pa mtshan ma med dang mi ldog cho// das rnams kun// mi 'chad de ni lung bstan ma yin ri dag par bya// dgra bcom sa dang rkyen kyis sangs rgyas
322a5(khri brgyad): ye shes dang // khams gsum dag la rmi lam na yang mi 'dod cing // 'gro la chos ston mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba// de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig
322a6(khri brgyad): par bya// rmi lam na ni sems can ngan song gsum gnas mthong // skad cig de la ngan song rgyun gcad smon lam btab// bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis me'i phung po zhig/ de ni
322a7(khri brgyad): mi ldog lung stan yin par rig par bya// mi'i 'jig rten 'byung po'i gdon dang nad mang ba// phan dang snying brtser ldan pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis zhing // 'on kyang rlom sems med cing nga
322a8(khri brgyad): rgyal skye med pa// de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya// byang chub sems dpa' bdag lung bstan snyam rlom sems sam// bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis rnam pa grub med/ 
322b1(khri brgyad): dam// pha rol lung bstan yin snyam rlom sems 'byung gyur na// rlom sems gnas pa de ni blo chung rig par bya// ming gi gzhi las bdud ni nye bar 'ongs gyur nas 'di skad smras te 'di ni/ 
322b2(khri brgyad): khyod dang pha ma dang // khyod kyi bdun mes rgyud kyi bar gyi ming yin zhing // 'di ni khyod kyi sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i ming yin zhes 'am// sbyangs sdoms ci 'da' brtson pa rnal 'byor ldan de la// 
322b3(khri brgyad): khyod sngon yon tshul yang 'di zhes brjod byed de// de skad gang thos rlom sems byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongasu bslang zhing blo chung rig par bya// rab tu dben pa'i grong
322b4(khri brgyad): dang grong khyer ri sul dang // dgon pa dben pa nags khro du rab tu ston byed cing // bdag bstod gzhan la smod dpa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongs su
322b5(khri brgyad): bslang zhing blo chung rig par bya// rtag tu grong dang yul 'a khor grong rdal gnas byed cing // byang chub ldan pa se mas can smin byed ma byed la// bral bar gyur pa de ni sang
322b6(khri brgyad): rgyas chos 'dir slob// gang zhig slob la bslab pa gang du sleb med cing // slob pa po dang bslab pa'i chos rnams mi dmigs la// bslab dang bslab pa ma yin 'di gnyis mi rtog pa
322b7(khri brgyad): de ltar gang slob de ni sangs chos 'dir slob// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bslab 'dir de ltar shes// de ni bsla ba nyams tshul khrims 'chal pa gzhar mi 'gyur// de ni
322b8(khri brgyad): mnyes par byed cing sangs rgyas chos 'dir slob// bslab pa mkhas shing dmigs pa med par gyur pas slob// mkhas pa 'od ces rnams kyi shes rab der ltar spyod// dge ba ma
323a1(khri brgyad): yin sems cig tsam yang skyed mi byed// nyi ma bar snang la ni 'gro bar byed pa na// 'od zer snang bas mdun na mun pa mi gnas bzhin// shes rab pa
323a2(khri brgyad): rol phyin pa bslab par byas rnams kyi// pha rol phyin pa thams cad 'dir ni 'dus par 'gyur// 'jigs tshogs lta bar lta ba drug cu gnyis 'dus ltar// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa
323a3(khri brgyad): 'di dag 'dus par 'gyur// dper na srog gi dbang po 'gags nas dbang po gzhan// gang dag ji snyed yod pa zad par 'gags par 'gyur// de ltar shes rab spyod pa mkhas pa mchog
323a4(khri brgyad): rnams kyi// pha rol phyin pa thams cad 'dir ni 'dus pa dar gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag nyan thos ston dang // rang rgyal ston kun la bslabs par gyur
323a5(khri brgyad): pa rnams de dag de la mi gnas 'dod pa mi bskyed de// 'di ni bdag gis bslab bya yod snyam de phyir slob// mi ldo ga byang chub mchog la rab tu zhugs pa'i// sems bskyed
323a6(khri brgyad): pa la bsam pa thag pas yid rang bas// stong gsum ri rab srang la gzhal nas tshad gzung rung // rje su yi rang dge ba de ni de ltar min// dge ba don gnyis thar 'dod sems can ji snyed pa
323a7(khri brgyad): kun gyi bsod nams phung po la yang yid rang gyur// de phyir de dag rgyal ba'i yon thob gyur nas// sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir 'jig rten chos sbyin byed// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig
323a8(khri brgyad): mi rtog chos rnams kun// stong dang mtshan ma med par spros med yongs shes la// shes rab bsam pa thag pas byang chub mi tshol ba// rnal 'byor pa de shes rab pha rol phyin mchog brtson
323b1(khri brgyad): rnam pa'i khams dang khams gnyis tha dang 'gyur du ni// de dang de la gang phyir ces kyang bye brag med// de bzhin shes rab spyod ma khas byang chub sems dpa' yang // rnam pa' mtshungs shing dru
323b2(khri brgyad): pa nye bar zhi bar spyod// skye bo'i dbus na sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di snyam du// skye bo 'di dag mgu bya mi sems bya ba med// g.yo smra sna tshogs rab tu ston pa de yang mthong // 'on kyang de la lus med
323b3(khri brgyad): sems med ming yang med// de bzhin shes rab spyod pa rnams kyang 'di snyam du// byang chub sangs rgyas 'gro ba yongasu sgrol mi sems// rang gi skye ba bya ba sna tshogs ldan pa'ang ston// sgyu ma lta
323b4(khri brgyad): bur rnam par rtogs pa med par spyod// dper na sangs rgyas sprul pa sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed// de ni ci zhig bya snyam du yang sems mi bskyed// de bzhin shes rab spyod mkhas byang/ 
323b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' yang // sprul pa sgyu ma bzhin du bya ba thams cad ston// shing mkhan bzo bo mkhas pas shing gi 'a khrul 'khor byas// skyes pa bu med 'dra de bya ba thams cad byed
323b6(khri brgyad): de bzhin shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang // rnam par mi rtog ye shes bya ba thams cad byed// de ltar spyod mkhas rnams la lha tshogs mang po dag/ thal mo sbyar ba 'dud cing phyag kyang
323b7(khri brgyad): 'tshal bar byed// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi sangs rgyas ji snyed kyang // ston bsngags pa'i 'phreng bas yongasu brjod par mdzad// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed zhing na sems can rnams// 
323b8(khri brgyad): de kun bdud du gyur par yongasu brtag bzung te// baspu nyag ma re re ji snyed sprul byas kyang // de dag kun gyis mkhas la bar chad bya mi nus// rnam pa zhes byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa stobs ldan
324a1(khri brgyad): ba/ thub par dka' zhing bdud bzhis bskyod par mi nus te// stong par gnas dang sems can yongs mi gtong dang // dzaM skad smras bzhin byed dang bde gshegs
324a2(khri brgyad): byin rlabs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs yum shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di// 'chang tshe byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mos byed cing // bsam pa thag pas bsgrub par mngon du brtson byed pa/ 
324a3(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir mngon zhugs rig par bya// de bzhin nyid kyi gan su chos dbyings nyer mi 'gro/ dper na bar snang spri ni gnas medas pa bzhin// rig sngags 'chang ba dmigs med nags/ 
324a4(khri brgyad): sems mkha'agro tshe// me tog shing phyir sngags kyi stobs kyi byin rwa dbas byed// de ltar spyod pa byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba// rtog par byed dang sangs rgyas chos rnams
324a5(khri brgyad): dmigs mi 'gyur// 'chad par byed dang chos nyid mthong ba mid migs pa// 'di ni zhi 'dod ston dga' ba'i gnas pa yin// de bzhin gshegs kyi dgra bcom rnam thar ma
324a6(khri brgyad): gtogs par// gnas pa 'di ni nyan thos rang rgyal bcas pa'i// gnas pa zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rab zhi bde ldan pa// ji snyed kun gyi mchog dang gong na med pa yin// mdab chags na mkhar
324a7(khri brgyad): gnas kyang ltung bar 'gyur ma yin// nya ni chun gnas kyang 'tshubs te 'chi ba med// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan stobs dag gis// pha rol son pa stong gnas mya ngan 'da'
324a8(khri brgyad): mi 'gyur// sems can kun gyi ston mchog 'gro gang 'dod pas// chos kyi sbyin pa rab mchog dam pa sbyin bya zhing // phan mdzad rnams kyi gnas pa mchog 'dir sten cig dang // sangs
324b1(khri brgyad): rgyas ye shes mchog du rmad byung mchog reg 'gyur// bslab pa 'di ni 'dren pas bslab pa yongs brjod pa// bslab pa ji snyed kun gyi mchog dang gong na med// mkhas pa gang zhig bslab
324b2(khri brgyad): kun pha rol 'gro 'dod pas// sangs rgyas bslab pa shes rab pha rol phyin 'dir spobs// chos mdzad dam pa 'di ni gter gyi phul du byung // 'jig rten dag na sangs rgyas rigs kyi bde skyed
324b3(khri brgyad): mdzad// 'das dang ma byon phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams// de dag 'di la byung te chos dbyings zad mi 'gyur// shing dang 'bras bu me tog nags tshal ji snyed pa// de dag thams
324b4(khri brgyad): cad sa la yang dag byung zhing 'thon// 'on kyang sa la zad pa med cing 'phel ba med// skyo ba med cing yongasu mi nyams na dam rtog med// sangs rgyas nyan thos rang rgyal bcas
324b5(khri brgyad): pa ji snyed dang // 'jig rten kun na lha dang bde skyid chos yod pa/ de kun shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog las byung // shes rab nam kyang zad pa med cing 'phel ba med// 
324b6(khri brgyad): sems can tha ma 'bring dang // mchog gyur ji snyed pa// de kun ma rig las byung bde bar gshegs pas gsungs rkyen rnams tshogs nas sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor rab tu byung // 'khrul 'khor
324b7(khri brgyad): zad pa med cing ma rig 'phel ba med// ye shes tshul sgo thabs kyi rtsa ba ji snyed pa// de kun shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog las byung // rkyen rnams tshogs nas las kyi 'khrul 'khor rab
324b8(khri brgyad): tu byung // shes rab pha rol phyin pa zad pa 'am 'phel ba med// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rten cing 'brel 'byung 'di// shes rab kyis ni 'byung med rtogs pa de// dper na sprin
325a1(khri brgyad): gyis sgrib med nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar// ma rig 'gebs pa bsal nas rang byung thob par 'gyur// mthu chen ldan pa dag ni lasas bzhir gnas kyang / 
325a2(khri brgyad): rten par byed pa ma yin gnas par byed pa med// 'on kyang bsam gtan bzhi po 'di dag rten yin zhing // thob par gyur nas byang chub dam pa mchog kyang 'thob// shes rab mchog thob
325a3(khri brgyad): pa dag bsam gtan gnas pa myong // gzugs med cing 'dzin dam pa bzhi po rnams kyang myong // bsam gtan 'di dag byang chub la phan byed 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' zag pa
325a4(khri brgyad): zad phyir slob pa min// bsam gtan ting nge 'dzin lag/ nas nas mtshan ma med// de la gnas rnams gal te lus ni zhig gyur nas// bsam pa ji bzhin 'dod pa'i
325a5(khri brgyad): khamasu yang skye ste// 'di ni ston sogs pa'i ngo mtshar rma du byung // dper na 'dzam gling mi zhig sngon chad ma rnye dpa'i// lha yul lha'i khang pa dam pa rnyed gyur cing / 
325a6(khri brgyad): mthong nas de yis der ni yul rnams yongasu bzung ba// de dag gnas par mi byed phyir yang 'ong ba ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' ston mchog 'chang // rnal 'byor brtson ga pa
325a7(khri brgyad): bsam gtan ting nge 'dzin gnas nas// phyir yang 'dod pa'i kham su gnas te gos pa med// chu la pad+ma bzhin du byis pa'i chos mi gnas// sems can yongasu smin par bya dang zhing
325a8(khri brgyad): sbyang dang // pha rol phyin 'di yong su rdzogs bya ba ma gtogs par// bdag nyid chen po gzugs med khamasu mi skye mi byed// byang chub ston pha rol phyin rnams nyams par 'gyur// dper
325b1(khri brgyad): na mi zhig rin chen gter rnams rnyed gyur cing // de la 'dod pa'i blo ni bskyed pa ma byas la// des kyang dus gzhan zhig na de dag yongs blangs shing // blangs nas khyim du bcug te chags
325b2(khri brgyad): par byed pa ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas bsam gtan bzhi// ting 'dzin zhi ba dga' bde sbyin byed thob gyur la/ ya tan de da la la gtan ting mi thob btang ste// 'gro la
325b3(khri brgyad): snying brtse ldan pa phyir yang 'dod khams 'jug/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin bsam gtan gnas// dgra bcom rang rgyal theg par 'dod pa'i blo skyed na// mnyam par ma
325b4(khri brgyad): bzhag rgod cing sems g.yengs gyur pa ste// sangs rgyas s+ho/ na yongs nyams mnyan pa gru zhig bzhin// gzhan yang gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri dang ro// reg dang 'dod pa'i
325b5(khri brgyad): ljon lnga la brtson gyur kyang // dgra bcom rang rgyal theg pa la byang chub sems dga' na// dpa' bo rtag tu mnyam bzhag yin par shes par bya// sems can rnam dag sems
325b6(khri brgyad): can gang zag gzhan gyi phyir// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin la brtson zhing rnam par rgyu// dper na bran mo bum thogs dbang med rje bo'i dbang // de bzhin dpa' rnams sems can kun gyi dbang
325b7(khri brgyad): gis 'gro/ spro ba byas sam 'on te rtag tu brdegs kyang rung // bran mo rje bo la ni zlogs pa'i tshig mi smra// bdag la des na gnod pa byas 'ong snyam nas// shin tu skrag pa'i yid kyis
325b8(khri brgyad): 'jig pas zil gyis non// de bzhin byang chub che du byang chub mchog zhugs pa// 'gro ba kun la bran gyur de bzhin gnas par bya// lung gi ston rtogs pa yongasu rdzogs mi byed// 
326a1(khri brgyad): shing las me byung ba yis shing de sregs pa bzhin// bdag gi bde ba btang nas reb med sems kyis// sems can gzhan gyi dgos la nyin mtshan mngon par rlom
326a2(khri brgyad): bu cig pa la ma ni rim 'gro byed pa ltar// bsam pa thag pas byed de skyo med gnas pa bzhin// sems can don dang zhing skyong brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa// gang zhig byang chub sems dpa'i
326a3(khri brgyad): spyad pa spyod sems shing // skyo ba'i blo ni rdul tsam skye bar mi 'gyur ba// de ni g.yel med brtson 'grus pha rol phyin la brtson// byang chub sems dpa' mi mkhas bskal pa bye grangs la// 
326a4(khri brgyad): gal te ring bar 'du shes sdug bsngal byang chub bsgrub// / chos sgrub byed pa'i tshen rab tu sdug bsngal 'gyur// de// tshe brtson 'grus pha rol phyin nyams le lo can// zhi ba bla na med/ 
326a5(khri brgyad): pa thob par bya snyam te// byang chub mchog tu sems skyed thog mar bskyed byas nas// nyin dang mtshan du de la yid cig gnas byed pa// mkhas pa gsal ba brtson 'grus brtsams
326a6(khri brgyad): par rig par bya// gal te la la 'di skad ri rab ri shig la// phyi nas byang chub mchog thob bya zhes smras pa las// gal te skye ba'i blo skyes ched du byed gyur na// de tshe byang chub sems dpa'
326a7(khri brgyad): le lo rnyed par 'gyur// ji ste chung zad 'di lta ci smos blo skyes te// skad cig tsam la ri rab thal bar rlag snyam na// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa ste/ 
326a8(khri brgyad): ring por mi thogs 'dren par byang chub thob par 'gyur// yongasu smin par byas la 'gro ba'i don bya zhes// gal te lus dang ngag dang yid kyi brtson byed na// bdag du 'du shes gnas pa/ 
326b1(khri brgyad): me lo rnyed 'gyur te// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las ring 'gyur gnams bzhin// gang tshe lus dang sems dang sems can 'du shes med// 'du shes rnam par log nas chos gnyis
326b2(khri brgyad): mi spyod pa// 'di ni byang chub ma nyams mchog zhi tshol ba yi// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin ces phan pa mdzad pas gsungs// gzhan las ngan du brjod pa'i tshig rtsug thos gyur nas// su
326b3(khri brgyad): sgra su thos gang na su'i gang tang zhes// ma lus mgu byed byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin dang ldan pa mdzangs pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig
326b4(khri brgyad): bzod pa'i legs chos ldan// gang zhig stong gsum ri na chen bkang ste 'jig rten khams// sangs rgyas rnam sa dang dgra bcom rang rgyal bu la byas pa// sbyin pa'i phung pos
326b5(khri brgyad): de'i bsod nams char mi phod// bzod la gnas pa/ 'i lus ni yongasu dag 'gyur te// sum cu rtsa gnyis ma/ tshan dang mthu stobs pa mtha' yas// sems can rnams la
326b6(khri brgyad): dad pa'i chos rab sgrogs par byed// bzod pa mkhas la 'jig rten 'di na dga' bar 'gyur// gal te sems can la las tsan dan snying bkang ste// bla ma phangs pas byang chub sems
326b7(khri brgyad): dpa' mthong ba dang // gzhan zhig me mdag mgo la 'thor ba gnyi ga la// de yis mnyam zhing snyoms pa'i yid ni skyed par bya// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas de ltar bzod byas nas/ 
326b8(khri brgyad): sems bskyed de ni byang chub mchog du yongs bsngos nas// dpa' bo bzod pas 'jig rten kun na dgra bcom dang // rang rgyal sems can khams kyi bzod kun zil gyis non// bzod byed/ 
327a1(khri brgyad): 'di snyam du yang sems ni bskyed bya ste// sems dmyal dud 'gro gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal mang // 'dod pa'i ston rgyu yis mi 'dod gnod myongan/ 
327a2(khri brgyad): byang chub ched du ji phyir dbazod mi bya snyam// lcag dbyig mtshon dang gsang dang bcing dang rdeg pa dang // mgo gcod pa dang rna ba rkang lag sna gcod dang // 'jig rten sdug bsngal ji snyed
327a3(khri brgyad): bdag gis bzod snyam pa// byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i pha rol phyin la gnas// zhi ba 'dod pa rnams ni khrims kyis byung ba yin// stobs bcu'i spyod yul gnas shing tshul khrims
327a4(khri brgyad): nyams pa med// sdom pa'i bya ba ji snyed kun gyi rjesu 'jug/ sems can kun la phan phyir de yang byang chub bsngo// ga te rang rgyal dgra bcom byang chub 'dod skyed na// tshul khrim
327a5(khri brgyad): 'chal cing tshul mkhas de bzhin spyod pa nyams// ji ste bya nga chub zhi ba mchog tu yongs bsngon// 'dod yon pargya yang tshul khrims pha rol phyin la gnas// chos gang nges
327a6(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub ston 'byung med pa// de ni ston chos don ldan pa'i tshul khrims yin// chos gang phan byed rnams kyi byang chub yongs nyams pa// 'di ni tshul khrims 'chal ces rnam par 'dren
327a7(khri brgyad): pas gsungs// gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'dod yon lnga spyod la// sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun skyabs song ste// sangs rgyas 'grub bya snyams du kun mkhyen yid byed pa/ 
327a8(khri brgyad): mkhas pa tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas rig par bya// gal te bskal babye bar dge ba'i las lam bcu// spyod cing rang rgyal dgra bcom nyid la 'dod bskyed na// de ma tshul khrims skyon zung / 
327b1(khri brgyad): tshul khrims nyams pa yin// sems skyed de ni phas lam kyang shin tu lci// tshul khrims bsrungs zhing byang chub mchog tu yongs bsngol// de'i rlom sems med de bdag bstong mi byed cing // 
327b2(khri brgyad): nga'i 'du shes sems can 'du shes yongs spangs pa// tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas byang chub sems dpa' brjod// gal te byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i lam spyod pa// sems can 'di/ 
327b3(khri brgyad): dag khrims ldan 'di dag khrims 'chal ces// sna tshogs 'du shes zhugs pa shin tu tshul khrims 'chal// tshul khrims nyams shing de la yongs dag tshul khrims med// gang la bdag
327b4(khri brgyad): gi 'du shes sems can 'du shes med// 'du shes 'dod / chags bral la sdom pa ci phyir med// gang la sdom dang / dasdom pa ma yin rlom sems med// 'di ni tshul khrims
327b5(khri brgyad): sdom par rnam par 'dren par gsungs// sems can dag pa gang zhig 'di lta'i khrims ldan pa// sdug dang mi sdu/ kun la lta ba med pa yin// mgo dang rkang lag gtong zhing / 
327b6(khri brgyad): zhum pa'i sems kyang med// bdog pa thams cad gtong zhing rtag tu zhen pa med// chos rnams rang bzhin bdag med ya ma rlar shes nas// bdag gi sha yang gtong zhing zhen pa'i sems
327b7(khri brgyad): med na// de las phyi rol dngos po gtong ba smos ci dgos gal te ser sna byed pa de ni gnas min te// bdag dang bdag gir dngos por 'du shes 'dod chags 'gyur// blun po rnams la gtod
327b8(khri brgyad): ba'i blo lta ga la yod// ser sna yi dgas gan su skye bar byed pa ste// ji ste mir skyes na yang de tshe dbul por 'gyur// de tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can dbul zhes na// gtong la/ 
328a1(khri brgyad): mos par 'gyur zhing rtag tu lhug par gtong // gling bzhi legs par brgyan pa mchil ma'i thal ba 'dra// byin nas dga' bar 'gyur gyi gling thob de ltar min
328a2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gsal ba sbyin byin na// srid pa gsum gyi sems can ji snyed bsam byas te// de dag kun la sbyin 'di byin par gyur cig sems// de yang 'gro ba'i don phyir
328a3(khri brgyad): byang chub mchog du bsngo// sbyin pa byin nas dam par gnas par byed pa med// de ni nam du'ang rnam par smin la re ba med// de ltar gtong ba mkhas la thams cad gtong ba ste// chung ngu gtong
328a4(khri brgyad): la dpag tu med pa mang por 'gyur// srid pa gsum na se/ dmas can ma lus ji snyed pa// yongasu brtag pa bzung ste/ de dag thams cad kyis// 'jig rten mkhyen pa sangs rgyas
328a5(khri brgyad): dgra bcom rang rgyal la// bskal pa mtha' yis sbyin byin nyan thos legs tshol na// byang chub sems dpa' ma khas pa thabs mkhas gang zhig gis// de dag bsod nams
328a6(khri brgyad): bya ba'i dngos por yid rang nas// sems can don du byang chub mchog rab yongs bsngo na// yongasu bsngo bas 'gro ba thams cad zil gyis non// nor bu mching bu'i phung po chen por gyur pa yang // 
328a7(khri brgyad): rin chen bai DUr+ya gcig de kun zil gyis non// de bzhin 'gro kun sbyin pa'i phung po rgya chen kun// rjesu yid rang byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non// gal te byang chub sems dpas 'gro la
328a8(khri brgyad): sbyin byin na// de la bdag gir mi byed dngos po phangs med na// de las dge ba'i rtsa ba mthu chen 'phel 'gyur te// sprin med zla ba yar ngo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bzhin// byang chub sems dpa'i
328b1(khri brgyad): sbyin pa yi dgas 'gro ba gcod// dbul ba dang ni de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad gcod// rnam par rgyu tshe long spyod mtha' yas yangs pa 'thob// sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sems can sbyin pa
328b2(khri brgyad): yongs smin byed// khrims kyi dud 'gro 'gro ba du ma'i ngo bo spong // dus rnams kun tu mi khom brgyad kyang rnam par spang // bzod pas gzugs bzangs dam pa rgya chen thob 'gyur te// gser
328b3(khri brgyad): mdog sdug cing 'gro bas lta ba'i 'o su 'gyur// brtson 'grus kyis ni dkar po'i ston 'grib mi 'gyur// rgyal ba'i bang mdzod ye shes mtha' yas thob par 'gyur// bsam gtan gyis ni
328b4(khri brgyad): 'dod pa'i ston smad pa 'dor// rig dang mngon par shes// dang ting 'dzin mngon par sgrub// shes rab kyis ni chos kyi rang bzhin yongs shes na// ngan song gsum po'i khams
328b5(khri brgyad): gsum dag las shin tu 'da' ma'i 'dren pa'i 'khor lo rin chen bskor byas na// sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir 'gro la chos kyang ston// chos ni yongs rdzogs byas nas byang chub
328b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' de// yongs dag zhing dang sems can dag pa yongasu 'dzin// sangs rgyas rgyud dang chos kyi rgyud kyang yongasu 'dzin// de bzhin dge 'dun rgyud dang chos kun yongasu 'dzin// byang chub
328b7(khri brgyad): lam 'di shes rab bstan phyir brjod pa ste// 'jig rten dag na nad gsor byed pa sman pa'i mchog/ ming ni ston thams cad sdud pa'i byang chub lam// lam 'di sems can thams cad kyis
328b8(khri brgyad): ni thob gyur cig// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las// sdud pa tshig su bcad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // shes rab
329a1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las// bam po lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsungs nas/ tshe dang
329a2(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshol bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo des// 
329a3(khri brgyad): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs mi bzad pa sgrog pa'i drung na/ 
329a4(khri brgyad): tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa des yongasu btsal ba de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongasu btsal bar bya'o// // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe/ 
329a5(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bco ma ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ chen po rtag tu ngu des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
329a6(khri brgyad): yongasu tshol ba na// ji ltar yongasu btsal ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub
329a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu sngon/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu tshol ba na/ lus la ched cher mi 'dzin/ srog la mi lta rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshig su
329a8(khri brgyad): bcad pa dag la mi gnas par yongasu btsal bas yongasu btsal to// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu tshol zhing / 'brog dgon pa zhig du phyin pa na/ bar snang la sgra thos par
329b1(khri brgyad): gyur te/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogasu song shig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur gyis/ ci nas lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / gnyid dang rmugs pa yid
329b2(khri brgyad): la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / btung ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / nyin mo yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / 
329b3(khri brgyad): grang ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa de ltar song shig/ nang dang phyi rol gang la yang sems smon par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu g.yas g.yo su ma blta bar
329b4(khri brgyad): song shig dang / nub dang steng dang 'og dang / phyogs mtsham su 'ang ma blta bar song shig/ rigs kyi bu ci nas 'dzi dgas tshogs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang / ci nas gzugs
329b5(khri brgyad): las kyang ma g.yos pa dang / ci nas tshor ba dang / 'du she/ sa dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sa kyang ma g.yos pa de ltar song shig/ gang las g.yos
329b6(khri brgyad): pa de ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro// ci nas nyams par 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyam par 'gyur ro// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ba de
329b7(khri brgyad): ni 'khor ba la spyod do// gang 'khor ba la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rje su mi 'thob po// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus
329b8(khri brgyad): sgra de la 'di skad ces smraso// de bzhin du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag ni sems can thams cad la snang bar byed par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrub par 'dod
330a1(khri brgyad): pa'i phyiraro// de skad ces smras pa dang / sgra des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smraso// rtag tu ngu leg so leg so// de/ 
330a2(khri brgyad): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra thos te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos dag la mos pa
330a3(khri brgyad): bskyed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu btsal bar bya'o// khyod kyis mtshan ma yongasu spang bar bya// dngos po yongasu spang bar bya/ sems can du lta ba yongasu spang bar bya'o// 
330a4(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grog po dag spang bar bya'o// // dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ma byung ba dang / 
330a5(khri brgyad): ma skyes pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / ma 'gags pa'i chos rnams ston pa dag la bsnyen par bya// rten par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar
330a6(khri brgyad): bsgrubs na ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du chud pa 'am/ dge slong chos smra ba'i lus la yod pa zlos par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu gang la las shes rab
330a7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa de la rigs kyi bu khyod ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing // khyod kyis byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa tshor bar bya ste/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu
330a8(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di thos pa 'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bdag gis thos pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
330b1(khri brgyad): phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 
330b2(khri brgyad): ma bral ba rnamasu skye bar 'gyur ro// mi khom pa rnams spong bar 'gyur ro// dal pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu phan yon 'di rnams khyod kyis yongasu rtogs la// 
330b3(khri brgyad): de dge slong chos smra ba la ston pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar
330b4(khri brgyad): mi bya'o// khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba la chos don du ga nyer ba dang / chos la gus par bya bas phyi bzhin 'brang ba ra bya'o// khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par bya ste/ 
330b5(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu bdud sdig can ni byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang / sgra dang drid/  nga / ro dang reg pa dag bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang / spyad
330b6(khri brgyad): par bya ba'i phyir nye bar bsgrub ste/ de dag des zil gyis mnan nas thabs la mkhas pas 'grogs shing / bsten pa dang bsnyen par byed pa yang yod de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos smra
330b7(khri brgyad): bde la ma dad pa bskyed par mi bya'o// gzhan du na sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag ni thabs la mkhas pa de mi shes kyi/ 'di ni thabs la mkhas pas rab tu sheso// 'di ni
330b8(khri brgyad): sems can gyi tshul gyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu gzung ba'i phyir chos 'di dag la rten cing 'grogs te bsnyen par byed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// / 
331a1(khri brgyad): rnams ni gang la yang ma chags pa 'am/ sgrib pa med kyis skad cig de nyid la rigs kyis bu khyod kyis yang dag pa'i tshul so so rtog par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu
331a2(khri brgyad): chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis
331a3(khri brgyad): stong pa'i phyir te/ chos thams cad ni sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med pa/ sgyu ma lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu brag cha lta bu/ mig yor lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi
331a4(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing chos smra ba'i phyir 'brang na/ ring po mi thog par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu khyod
331a5(khri brgyad): kyis bdud kyi las la soms shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te chos smra ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i ri gas kyi bu la brnyas par byed cing / mi sems na de la
331a6(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyir 'gyed par mi bya ste/ gzhan du na chos don du gnyer ba nyid dang / chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang / yid mi skyo bas dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o/ 
331a7(khri brgyad): zhes thos// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de la rje su bstan pa 'di blangs nas shar phyogs ga la ba der song ba dang / ring por ma phyin pa de 'di snyam du sems// 
331a8(khri brgyad): te/ bdag gis sgra de la ji srid du 'gro bar bya ba ma driso snyam nas/ de sa phyogs 'di nyid na ngu zhing mya ngan byed de sme zhing 'dug/ des phyogs de na nyin zhag gcig 'das par byed/ nyin zhag/ 
331b1(khri brgyad): gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lnga'am/ bdun 'das kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par ma gyur gyi bar du lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ rmugs pa dang gnyid yid
331b2(khri brgyad): la byed pa mi skyed/ bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ btung ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi skyed/ nyin mo yid la byed pa mi skyed/ grang ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ tsha ba
331b3(khri brgyad): yid la byed pa mi skyed de/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig bu gcig pa 'chi ba'i dus byas na sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i mya ngan/ 
331b4(khri brgyad): gyi bu gcig pu yid la byed pa 'byung ba ma gtogs par yid la ra byed pa gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de bzhi ngan du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu/ 
331b5(khri brgyad): yang de'i tshe bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha ro tu phyin pa 'di tho sa par 'gyur snyam pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa ga zhan gang yang mi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de nas byang chub
331b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de gdung zhing 'dug pa'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shig bzhugs nas leg so zhes bya ba byin to// rigs kyi bu khyod tshig de skad smras pa
331b7(khri brgyad): legaso leg so// ji ltar khyod kyis da ltar yongasu btsal ba de bzhin du sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i
331b8(khri brgyad): spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu btsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di dang spo ba 'di dang / don du gnyer ba 'di dang / 'dod pa 'di lta bus rjesu
332a1(khri brgyad): 'brang zhing shar phyogs nyid du song shig dang / rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyan spos ldan zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i rab rim
332a2(khri brgyad): pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang / shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongasu bskor ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor pa
332a3(khri brgyad): rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba grong bar dang srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin btams pa/ khyogs khri nyams mi nga ba dang / bar bar
332a4(khri brgyad): dag tu zam pa btags pa/ grong khyer gyi 'khor yug tu zhol gyi phyir rin po che sna bdun legs par byas shing bskor la/  rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba de dag gi mda' yab rnams ni 'dzam
332a5(khri brgyad): bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa mtho zhing tshad dang ldan pa mda'/ yab thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing skyes te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing tog gi 'bras
332a6(khri brgyad): bu chags pa mda' yab las shing skyes pa thams cad las kyang rin po che'i tha gu byung bas mda' yab gcig shos gzhan dang 'brel pa/ grong khyer thams cad gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dra
332a7(khri brgyad): bas khebs te/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha de dag la rlung gis btab na sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ dper na yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo tshogs pa rol mo
332a8(khri brgyad): mkhan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du dril bu g.yer kha de dag la rlung gis btab na sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ 
332b1(khri brgyad): sgra des sems can de dag rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// grong cher na 'or yug tu 'obs chu 'bab pas gang zhing chu yang yang phreng pang mang slong pasang bdag yod do// chu de la sngon gyi rnam par smin pas grub
332b2(khri brgyad): pa rin po che sna bdun gyis gru dag yod de der sems can dag zhugs nas rtse dga' zhing rab tu rgyu'o// chu de thams cad kyang me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis khengs
332b3(khri brgyad): pa me tog rigs che zhing bzang la dri zhim po'i ngang dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis kyang khebs te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i me tog gi rigs las de na med pa
332b4(khri brgyad): gang yang med do// grong khyer de'i nang na bskyed mos tshal lnga pa rgya yod de/ thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas dpa rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa sha stag ste/ bskyed mos
332b5(khri brgyad): tshal de dag re re na yang rdzing bu khor yug tu rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya yod pa rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug thams cad nas rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu ta
332b6(khri brgyad): dang / pad+ma dkar po rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu de khebs shing me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po de dag thams cad kyang chu zheng du shing rta'i pang
332b7(khri brgyad): lo tsam ste/ sngon po kha dog sngon bldan po yang ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba/ ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur ston pa/ 'od ser po 'byung ba/ dmar po kha dog dmar po dmar po lta bur
332b8(khri brgyad): ston pa/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba/ dkar po kha dog dkar po dkar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba dag yod do// rdzing bu de dag thams cad na ngang ngur dang / khrung khrung dang / byaka
333a1(khri brgyad): ran da dang / gzhad sgra 'byin pa dag yod do// bskyed mos tshal de dag thams cad kyang nga yir bya ba med cing ri su bcad pa med de/ 'di ltar sems can
333a2(khri brgyad): dag yun ring por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / yun ring por chos zab mo la mos pa'i sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa yin no// rigs kyi bu
333a3(khri brgyad): grong khyer de dag gi dbus kyi bzhi mdon byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khang pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ khor yug tu dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam yod pa rnam par
333a4(khri brgyad): bkra zhing blta na sdug pa rab rim pa bdun dang / ta la'i phrengabadun gyis yongasu bskor ba zhig yod do// khang pa de na khang pa'i longs spyod du rtag tu rab dga' zhes bya ba'i bskyed
333a5(khri brgyad): mos tshal dang / mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba dang / mya ngan bra la ba zhes bya ba dang / me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i ba skyed mos tshal dang bskyed mos tshal bzhi yod de// bskyed
333a6(khri brgyad): mos tshal de dag re re na yang rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang / bzang mchog ces bya ba dang / dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dga' mchog ces bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang / bde ldan zhes bya/ 
333a7(khri brgyad): ba dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / mi 'bab ces bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de/ rdzing bu de dag gi ngos gcig ni gser las byas/ ngos gnyis pa ni dngul las byas/ ngos gsum pa ni bai DUr+ya
333a8(khri brgyad): las byas/ ngos bzhi pa ni shel las byas/ nang gis gzhi la ni ke ke ru la byas pa'i bye ma brdal ba ste/ rdzing bu de dag re re la yang them skas them pa rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas
333b1(khri brgyad): brgyan pa brgyad brgyad yod de/ them skas de dag thams cad kyi bar nas kyang 'dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi shing ljon pa dag skyes so rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu ni me tog ku mu ta dang / ud
333b2(khri brgyad): pa la dang / pad+ma dkar po sna tshogs kyi khebs shing ngang dur dang / khrung khrung dang / bzhad rnams skad 'byin to// rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug tu me tog gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te/ 
333b3(khri brgyad): shing de dag la rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bas rdzing bu de thams cad kyi chu yang tsan dan gyi drir phyogs shing kha dog dang ldan dri dang ldan no// de na byang chub sems
333b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas pa bud med du/  brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i ston lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// 
333b5(khri brgyad): grong khyer de na sems can skyes pa dang bud med gang gzhan da// ga 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang bskyed mos tshal la/ ma rdzing bu de dag rtag tu dga' zhing 'dod pa'i ston lnga dang ldan
333b6(khri brgyad): zhing 'byor te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' ste dga' mgur spyod cing de na
333b7(khri brgyad): dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// sems can gang dag grong khyer spos ldan na 'khod pa de dag kyang grong khyer gyi dbus kyi bzhi mdor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
333b8(khri brgyad): chen po chos 'phags kyi khri gser gyi rkang pa dang / dngul gyi rkang pa dang / baiDUR+Ya'i rkang pa dang / shel gyi rkang pa gtsugs pa/ shing bal bting ba/ stan nang tshangs can bting ba// steng / 
334a1(khri brgyad): snying po can du byas pa ka shi ka'i ras bting ba/ 'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa bshams te/ steng gi bar snang la ras kyi bla re mu tig gi brgyan pa bres
334a2(khri brgyad): shing / de ltar chos la gus par byed pas sa phyogs de kho ra yug kyang me tog kha dog sna tshogs dag mngon par gtor cing sa phyogs de yang spos sna tshogs dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi shin tu
334a3(khri brgyad): bdug par byed pa/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can de dag de lta bur gus par byed
334a4(khri brgyad): cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phag/ das la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan to// de na gang dadag nyan pa'i lha dang mi srogs chags brgya phrag mang po srog sa
334a5(khri brgyad): nga grag ma sa ga ga ma mdang po tshogs pa de dag las la la ni lung nod/ la la ni kha don byed/ la la ni yi ger 'bri/ la la ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rtogs par byed de/ sems
334a6(khri brgyad): can de dag thams cad log par mi ltung ba'i chos can te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
334a7(khri brgyad): po chos 'phags de'i drung du song shig dang / de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ni yun ring po nas khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ bla na med pa
334a8(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par ston// yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ yang dag par gzeng bstod pa/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu
334b1(khri brgyad): des kyang sngon da ltar tshol ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu btsal gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod nyin mtshan du yid la byed pa rgyun ma chad par song shig dang / ring po mi thogs par shes
334b2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de thos nas dga' mgu yid rangs rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes par
334b3(khri brgyad): gyur pa 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gis phog na yid la byed pa gzhan mi skyed kyi/ gang bdag bsdug bsngal 'di las thar par byed pa zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa bdag gi
334b4(khri brgyad): nam rnyed snyam sems pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sem ngas dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de thos par byed cing / chos gang thos nas
334b5(khri brgyad): bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs/ kyi bu de bdag gis nam mthong snyam du sems pa ma ga/ togs par chos gang yang yid la mi byed do// de nas byang
334b6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/ chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ de ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa 'di lta ste/ 
334b7(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa dang bral
334b8(khri brgyad): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
335a1(khri brgyad): cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i
335a2(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bdag gi dngos po mi sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
335a3(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad tha dad pa med zhes bya ba'i
335a4(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad mngon par dag/ nga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjesu song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
335a5(khri brgyad): sgra dang tshig 'bru sna tshogs sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mkhengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rang / bzhin rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
335a6(khri brgyad): sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming dang nges pa'i sgra dang 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
335a7(khri brgyad): cad la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
335a8(khri brgyad): rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi rdul sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldogs pa'i mig zhes bya ba'i ting
335b1(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbugs 'byin pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge mngon par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting ngo nge/ 
335b2(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad zil gyis gnan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
335b3(khri brgyad): pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po thams cad kyi rjesu song ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las mngon par
335b4(khri brgyad): 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes dpa dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting dnge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la nges par 'bigs pa zhes
335b5(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pargya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bye brag med par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lta bar
335b6(khri brgyad): 'gyur pa'i thibs po thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
335b7(khri brgyad): chags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / le lo thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos zab mo'i 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
335b8(khri brgyad): ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi 'bogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten
336a1(khri brgyad): gsum la mngon par mazhen pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
336a2(khri brgyad): 'dzin rnams mngon du gyur te/ de ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag byang chub sems
336a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rab tu ston pa dag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis leg so zhes bya ba byin nas/ dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de
336a4(khri brgyad): tshig 'di skad kyang gsungaso// rigs kyi bu nged kyis kyang bya ngang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol ba tu phyin pa 'di bzhin du btsal te/ yongasu tshol ba na yang ting
336a5(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin 'di dag thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur te/ phyir mi ldogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la
336a6(khri brgyad): gnas par gyur to// nged kyis kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin la bltas na gang mnyam par gzhag pa 'am/ ldang bar bya ba 'am/ byang chub tu spyod pa'am/ gang bla
336a7(khri brgyad): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rje su ma mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yin te/ 
336a8(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu chos gang gis kyang rlom sems sam/ rlom sems med par mi byed pa la gnas nas/ nged kyis 'di 'dra ba'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
336b1(khri brgyad): cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'od 'doms gang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin
336b2(khri brgyad): bla na med pa dang / yon thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rje su thob ste/ yon gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis kyang tshad bzung ba 'am/ mtha' bstan par mi nus na nyan
336b3(khri brgyad): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis chos 'di dag nyid la rab tu don du gnyer ba dang / 'dun pas gus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya ste/ 
336b4(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu don du gnyer ba dang / 'dun pa la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no// khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shin tu
336b5(khri brgyad): gus pa bskyed par bya'o// phangs par bya'o// dge ba'i/ kha shes gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa'i byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
336b6(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gi dge
336b7(khri brgyad): ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags/ de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bla na med pa
336b8(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu smin par byas shing / yongasu bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la bslabs so// rigs kyi bu de ni khyod yongs su
337a1(khri brgyad): 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin gyi des khyod la ci bsgo ba bzhin du zung shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
337a2(khri brgyad): chen po chos 'phags la skal pa'am/ skal pa gnyis sam/ skal pa brgya 'am/ skal pa stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang mgo la thod bzhin du thogs shing bde ba'i yo byad thams
337a3(khri brgyad): cad kyis rim gror byas te/ stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / rigs pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad phul yang rigs
337a4(khri brgyad): kyi bu khyod kyis de la lan lon pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir da zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de'i mthus khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu dag rnyed par gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
337a5(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa thos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par gyur to// de nas de bzhin ga shegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
337a6(khri brgyad): chen po rtag tu ngu dbugs phyung nas mi snang bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de yang ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te langs nas kyang 'di snyam du sems so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang
337a7(khri brgyad): nas byon// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam ste/ de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mthong bas rab tu gdung shing mi dga' bar gyur to// yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ 
337a8(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni gzungs thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa ste/ bdag yongs
337b1(khri brgyad): su 'dzin pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen yun ring po nas des bdag gi don byas pa yin gyis/ bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mngon par
337b2(khri brgyad): stong ste byin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon// de bzhin gshegs pa de / nga du bzhud ces don 'di nyid dri'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
337b3(khri brgyad): po rtag tu dus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba dang dadas ri mo dang / gus par bya ba nye bar gzhag ste/ nye bar gzhag nas 'di snyam du sems// bangs
337b4(khri brgyad): gis ji lta bu'i bkur bstir bya bas byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du 'gro bar bya// bdag ni dbul te bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'
337b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bdag bkur bstir/ bya ba'i gos rin po che'am/ gser ram/ nor bu/ 'am/ mu tig gam/ bai DUR+Ya 'am/ dung ngam/ man
337b6(khri brgyad): shel lam/ byi ru 'am/ dngul lam/ sa le sbram 'am/ me tog gam/ spos sam/ me tog phreng ngam/ byug pa 'am/ gdugs pa de lta bu yang bdag la med na/ bdag
337b7(khri brgyad): 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du song na ni/ bdag gis tshul ma yin pa byas par 'gyur te/ bdag dga' ba'am/ rangs pa yang mi
337b8(khri brgyad): skye'o snyam sems so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag/ de lta bu'i yon tan dag dang / bla ma la gus pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pas song nas mthar gyis grong
338a1(khri brgyad): gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang / de grong bar gyi dbus su 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag gis lus btsongs la de'i rin gyis byang chub sems dpa'
338a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur bstir bya'o// yun ring po nas bdag gi lus stong zhig cing zad de/ btsongs la 'khor ba dpag tu med pa na 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i
338a3(khri brgyad): rgyus yang dang yang du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa dag myong yang 'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir ram/ 'di lta bu'i sems can chen po la bkur bsti bya ba'i phyir ma yin no snyam
338a4(khri brgyad): mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus grong bar 'dug ste mi su 'dod mi su 'dod ces sgra sgrags shing skad kyis bos so// de nas bdud
338a5(khri brgyad): sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sa/ mas dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir/ bdag nyid btsongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
338a6(khri brgyad): chen po chos 'phags la bkur bstir byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
338a7(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ thos pa rgya mtsho rjesu thob par 'gyur/ bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis mi thub par 'gyur/ yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
338a8(khri brgyad): rjesu thob par 'gyur zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa yongasu 'dri bar 'gyur te/ der sems can mang po dag gi don byed par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang
338b1(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed sems can gzhan dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyis/ 
338b2(khri brgyad): bdag gis 'di la bar chad bya'o snyam nas/ bdud sdig to can gyis ci nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ mi su 'dod
338b3(khri brgyad): su nga nyo bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra mi thos par 'gyur ba de lta bur yongasu bsgribs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu gang gi tshe bdag nyo ba ma rnyed pa de'i tshe phyog
338b4(khri brgyad): gcig tu song nas mchi ma phyung ste/ 'di ltar bdag gi/ sa lus btsongs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen po chos 'phags la bkur bstir bya snyam na lus nyo
338b5(khri brgyad): ba yang bdag gis ma rnyed de/ kye ma bdag ni rnyed pa ngan pa rnyed do snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
338b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gi lus yongasu btang ba lhag par bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin nam ma yin nam ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa'
338b7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul bdag gis bgam par bya'o snyam ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
338b8(khri brgyad): chen po rtag tu dug la bder song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smras// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar yid mi dga' zhing ying
339a1(khri brgyad): gdung la mchi ma byung ba ci nyes/ des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u kho bo ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs te/ chos la mchod par bya bar 'dod
339a2(khri brgyad): na lus nyo ba de kho bos ma rnyed nas/ de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so// kye ma nga ni bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba dang
339a3(khri brgyad): 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur bsti bya snyam na bdag gis lus nyo ba yang ma rnyed do snyam mo// de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byang chub
339a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ce/ sa smra so// rigs kyi bu kho bo la mis ni bya ba med kyi kho bo mchod sbyin zhig byed de/ der mi'i snying dang / khrag
339a5(khri brgyad): dang rus pa dang rkang dag kho bo la dgos na/ de'i rin gyi sa nyor byin cig ces byas pa dang / byang chub sems// dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ 
339a6(khri brgyad): gang dag gis bram ze'i khye'u 'di bdag gi snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang / rkang nyo ba rnyed pa 'di ni bdag gi rnyed pa'i mchog log par rnyed do// bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
339a7(khri brgyad): thabs la mkhas pa rnams la yongasu rdzogs par gyur to snyam ste/ de sems dga' ba dang / sems bde ba dang / sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas bram ze'i khye'u la 'di skad ces smra so// 
339a8(khri brgyad): bram ze'i khye'u kho bo'i lus 'di las khyod gang 'dod pa sbyin no// des de la 'di skad ce smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod rin tu ci 'dod sbyin no zhes bya ba dang / des de la 'di skad ces smras so// 
339b1(khri brgyad): bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis gang yongasu btang ba de kho bo la byin cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mtshon rnon po thogs nas lag pa g.yas pa phug ste khrag
339b2(khri brgyad): gzag so// brla g.yas pa sha med par btogs nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa'
339b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu brla sha med par btog nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i phyir bdag nyid la bdag nyid
339b4(khri brgyad): 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed pa bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du so dang ste dri'o snyam nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub se dmas dpa' sems dpa' chen rtag tu ngug la ba der song ste phyin
339b5(khri brgyad): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed/ khrag dang / 
339b6(khri brgyad): rus pa dang rkang 'dis ci zhig bya rtag tu ngus bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u 'di la btsongs te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya'o// 'phags pa byang
339b7(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bsnyen bkur bya'o// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras
339b8(khri brgyad): so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang rus pa dang rkang yang btsongs te/ rigs kyi bu de la bkur bstir bya bar 'dod pa khyod la yon tan gyi rnam pa ci zhig 'grub
340a1(khri brgyad): par 'gyur/ des de la smras pa/ bu mo rigs kyi bu de ni gang la kho bos bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa dag
340a2(khri brgyad): ston par 'gyur te/ kho bos de la bslabs na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur/ lus
340a3(khri brgyad): gser gyi kha dog lta bu yang 'thob par 'gyur/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / 'od zer mtha' yas pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
340a4(khri brgyad): chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen nga po dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
340a5(khri brgyad): kyang thob par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang / chul khrims rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / shes
340a6(khri brgyad): rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ye shes kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ gang
340a7(khri brgyad): gis sems can thams cad la kun du bgo bsha' bya ba'i bla na med pa'i chos rin po che yang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
340a8(khri brgyad): rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di ltar chos rgya chen po 'di dag yongasu brjod pa ni ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu chos 'di bu re re'i phyir yang skal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye
340b1(khri brgyad): ma snyed du lus yongasu btang bar bya ba yin na/ gcig lta ci smos te/ de tsam du khyod kyis chos 'di dag rgya cher yongasu brjod na/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
340b2(khri brgyad): chen po chos 'phags la bkur bstir bya ba'i gser ram/ nor bu'am/ mu tig gam/ bai DUR+Ya 'am/ dngul lam/ me tog gam/ bdug pa 'am/ spos sam/ me tog phreng ngam/ 
340b3(khri brgyad): byug pa 'am/ phye ma 'am/ gos sam/ gdugs sam/ khyod la ci dgos pa de khyod la sbyin gyis/ bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig/ bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs te
340b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags dag la ba der dong la bdag kyang khyod la dang lhan cig tu 'a de lta ste/ de lta bu'i chos de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir dge
340b5(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad mi snang bar byas nas/ bdag nyid kyi lus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
340b6(khri brgyad): chen po rtag tu ngu'i mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar yid ma la brtan pa ni leg so legs so// 'di lta bu'i chos 'dod pas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
340b7(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa yongasu rdzogs par mdzad de/ 
340b8(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rigs kyi bu kho bo la snying dang / khrag dang rus pa dang / rkang gis bya ba med kyi/ kho bos khyod la
341a1(khri brgyad): sad pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyi rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dam pa slongs shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod la dam pa ji lta bu zhig sbyin par bya// des de la smras pa
341a2(khri brgyad): brgya byin sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dag bdag la bcol cig/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yul 'di ni kho bo'i yul du gyur pa ma yin te/ yul 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan
341a3(khri brgyad): 'das rnams kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyis/ dam pa gzhan slong shig/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngus smras pa/ bdag gi lus yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i gnas pa 'di la ni lha'i
341a4(khri brgyad): dbang po brtson pa chung bar gyis shig/ lha'i dbang po bdag nyid kyis bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs bya'o// lha'i dbang po bden pa gang gis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par
341a5(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs// rgyas rnams kyi lung bstan cing / bdag gi lhag pa'i
341a6(khri brgyad): bsam pa g.yo med par mkhyen ces na/ bden pa de dang bden po'i tshig des bdag gi lus sngon bzhin du gyur cig ces byas pa dang / skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyis
341a7(khri brgyad): mthu dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongasu dag pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen rtag tu ngu'i lus sngon gyi bzhin du gnas par gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin spobs
341a8(khri brgyad): pa med par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la lan glan par spobs pa ma skyes nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang
341b1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu tshur shog/ kho mo'i khyim ga la der 'dong ngo // kho mos pa ma las nor blangs te/ des shes
341b2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mchod par bya dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la'ang bkur bsti bya ba bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems
341b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang tshong dpon gyi bu mo de 'grogs nas de rang gi khyim gang na bder dong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de bdag gi khyim du phyin pas/ pha ma la 'di skad ces smras
341b4(khri brgyad): so// yab yum gser dang dngul dang / rin po che dadang / nor bu dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma
341b5(khri brgyad): dang gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i cha byad mang po dag stsol cig/ bdag kyang khyed kyis stsal ba'i g.yog mo lnga brgya 'di dag
341b6(khri brgyad): dang lhan cig gagyer gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang bdag cag 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod
341b7(khri brgyad): par bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de yang bdag cag la chos ston par 'gyur ro// de nas bu mo de'i pha mas 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
341b8(khri brgyad): rtag tu ngu de su zhig/ bu mo rigs kyi bu de da ltar gang na 'dug/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de da ltar 'o skol gyi sgo drung na mchis te/ rigs kyi bu de ni lhag pa'i bsam pas
342a1(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu ma mchis
342a2(khri brgyad): pa las thar par bgyi bar 'tshal bas de chos 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag nyid btsongs la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal la byang chub sems dpa' sems
342a3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur bsti bgyi bar 'tshal na/ de'i lus nyo ba su yang ma byung ste/ de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas mi dga' bar sems shing mchis
342a4(khri brgyad): te/ des nga ni lus 'tshong bar 'dod na/ lus nyo// dab ma rnyed do zhes bgyis pa dang / brgya byin bram ze'ikhye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur te/ de la 'di skad du rigs
342a5(khri brgyad): kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir lus 'tshong bar 'dod ces bgyi ba dang / rtag tu 'des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ la mchod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
342a6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bkur bstir bya'o// nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de la rag las pas 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes bgyis pa dang / brgya byin
342a7(khri brgyad): bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugasu bsgyur bas 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ning mi 'dod de/ nga mchod sbyin zhig byed pa der mi'i snying dang / khrag dang rus pa dang / rkang dag dgos
342a8(khri brgyad): so zhes bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu des yis bsad par de la 'di skad du sbyin no zhes smras pas/ de mtshon rnon po thogs te/ bdag gi lag pa phug nas khrag gzags brla'i
342b1(khri brgyad): sha btogs te rus pa gcog tu song nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ rus pa dang rkang sbyin no// snyam nas/ de khrag gzags pa dang / bdag khang pa'i yang thog na
342b2(khri brgyad): mchis pas mthong ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid do// mi 'di ci'i slad du 'di lta bur bdag nyid la na tsa dag bgyid snyam ste/ de'i thad du mchis nas 'di skad bgyis so// 
342b3(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bdag nyid kyi lus kyi khrag gzags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad mchi ste/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang snying dang / rus pa
342b4(khri brgyad): dang rkang sbyin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga ni dbul teng la nor gzhan ci yang med do zhes mchi'o// bad gra gris khyod la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / 
342b5(khri brgyad): bdag la 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
342b6(khri brgyad): la yang bkur bsti bya'o// zhes mchi nas/ bdag gos 'di skad du bgyis te/ rigs kyi bu des khyod la yon tan gyi rnam pa'am/ khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ 
342b7(khri brgyad): de bdag la 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa rnams rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// 'di lta bu'i chos rnams de las
342b8(khri brgyad): nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos nas bdag kyang dga' ba dang rab tu mgu ba chen po skyes nas 'di snyam bgyid
343a1(khri brgyad): de rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'di lta bu'i gnas la spo ba bgyid pa ni shin tu dka' ba bgyid pa ste/ ngo mtshor to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod
343a2(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongasu gtong na bdag cag la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod la ci'i phyir chos la mchod pa mi bgyid/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la smon lam ci'i phyir mi
343a3(khri brgyad): gdab snyam nas rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so// rigs kyi bu khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag ma byed cig/ khyod 'dod pa gang gis 'phags
343a4(khri brgyad): pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'pha dgas la bkur bstir bya ba'i nor mang po dag khyod la sbyin no// bdag kyang khyod nyid dang 'grogs te/ byang
343a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der mchi'o// bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod par bgyi'o// gang khyod kyis yongs su
343a6(khri brgyad): brjod pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa de dag bdag gis thob par bgyi'o// zhes bgyis shing mchis na yab yum gyis dkor gyi phung po chen po bdag la stsal du gsol/ 
343a7(khri brgyad): bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
343a8(khri brgyad): byin pa khri brgyad stong pa las// bam po lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa/ de nas bu mo de'i phams bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de'i dka' ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis bstan
343b1(khri brgyad): pa la sa na chos de dag ni gcig tu nges par bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'jig rten thams cad las bye brag tu 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa yin te// 
343b2(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu de'i phyir de lta bu'i dka' ba'i gnas la spro bar byed na khyod nged kyis gnang gis/ bu mo nged kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
343b3(khri brgyad): 'phags blta zhing mched du nged kyang 'gros nged 'gro ba'i skabs phye ba zhig de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bya ba dang / bkur bsti bya ba'i
343b4(khri brgyad): phyir chas te/ pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so// ba dag ni dge ba'i phyogs gang gi yang bar chad mi bgyid do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des shing rta lnga brgya yang rgyan gyis
343b5(khri brgyad): brgyan bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang rgyan gyis brgyan to// / rgyan gyis brgyan nas me tog kha dog sna tshogs thog/ sa/ bdug pa dang spos dang / me tog phre dang byug pa dang / phye
343b6(khri brgyad): ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag thogs gser dang / dngul gyi me togs dag thogs/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag thogs te/ 
343b7(khri brgyad): bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba mang po mang du bskor nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang shing rta gcig tu zhugs te/ bu mo lnga brgya shing rta
343b8(khri brgyad): lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs pa de dag gis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar nas pha ma la sogs 'khor mang po dang shar phyogs ga la bde logs su dong ste/ mthar gyis song ba dang / 
344a1(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus rgyang ring po zhig nas grong khyer spos ldan rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba blta na sdug pa las
344a2(khri brgyad): byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ rta babs bdun yod pa 'obs rim pa bdun dang / ta la'i phreng ba rim bdun gyis yongasu bskor ba/ chur dpag
344a3(khri brgyad): tshang bcu gnyis/ zhing du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor cing rgyas pa/ bde ba lo legs pa/ mi dang skye bo mang pos gang bgrong bar dang srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag
344a4(khri brgyad): gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/ khyogs khrinyadam ming ba dang / bar bar dag tu zam pa btags po ngar legs par byas pa mthong ngo // de'i dbus kyi bzhi 'don
344a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos kyi khri la 'dug nas/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / stong phrag du ma dang / 'bum phrag du mas yong
344a6(khri brgyad): su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos 'chan pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu de dga' ba dang bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas
344a7(khri brgyad): snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no// de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag shing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba
344a8(khri brgyad): ni bdag gi mi che'o snyam nas/ de nas shing rta de las babs pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang mo rje ci dag kyang mnyam du shing rta de las babs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
344b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bkod pa tshad med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
344b2(khri brgyad): po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ngo // de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sel sa dpa' chen pa chos 'phags kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa rin po che sna bdun las
344b3(khri brgyad): byas pa tsan dan dmar pos brgyan cing mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de'i grwa bzhir nor bu rin po che bzhi gzhag par gyur te/ 
344b4(khri brgyad): dag sgron ma'i bya ba byed do// bdug spos kyi snod dngul las byas pa bzhi yang phyogs bzhir btags te/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba'i
344b5(khri brgyad): phyir a ka ru nag po 'ba' zhig gis bdug par byed do// / khang pa brtsegs pa de'i dbus su rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bzhi btsugs te/ de'i steng du rin po che'i sgom
344b6(khri brgyad): bzhi gzhag nas/ de'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUR+Ya bzhu bas bris pa bcug ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa de yang dar gyi chun po sna tshogs rnam
344b7(khri brgyad): pa tha dad pa 'phyang bas brgyan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu me la sogs te bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang pa brtsegs pa de bkod
344b8(khri brgyad): pa tshad med pas brgyan pa mthong / lha stong phrag du ma dag kyang mthong ngo // lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog man dar ba dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i
345a1(khri brgyad): gser phye dang / lha'i dngul sil ma dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa de la mthor/ mngon par 'thor mngon par rab tu 'thor ba mthong ngo // 
345a2(khri brgyad): lha'i sil snyan dag kyang thos so// mthong shing thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i dbang po ca
345a3(khri brgyad): phrag du ma dag dang rin po che'i khang bu brtsegs pa 'di la ci'i phyir me tog man da ra ba dag dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dag gi thor shing / mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor/ 
345a4(khri brgyad): lha'i sil snyan 'di dag kyang lha rnams par snang la ci'i phyi dar brdung / de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'idabang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
345a5(khri brgyad): chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum yongasu 'dren
345a6(khri brgyad): pa yin te/ 'di la bslabs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag yon tan thams cad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / 
345a7(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du 'thob par 'gyur ba yin na khyod mi shes sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ lha'i
345a8(khri brgyad): dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum/ yongs su 'dren
345b1(khri brgyad): pa de gang na bzhugs brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de khang brtsegs pa de'i nang na// gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUr+ya bzhu bas byis pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
345b2(khri brgyad): chos 'phags kyi rgya bdun gyis btab nas bzhag ste/ nged kyis khyod la bstan par bka'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te
345b3(khri brgyad): bu mo lnga brgya dag dang tshogs nas/ de dag gi me tog dang / me tog 'phreng gi chun po dang / gos rin po che dang / bdug pa dang spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / 
345b4(khri brgyad): ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog ji snyed thogs te 'ongs pa/ de dag gis shes rib kyi pha rol tu
345b5(khri brgyad): phyin pa la mchod pa byas te/ de dag las byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir shas shas kyis bzhago/ de nas byang chub
345b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 
345b7(khri brgyad): ba dan la sogs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngar mchod pa byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong te phyin nas/ chos la mchod
345b8(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos
346a1(khri brgyad): gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dag gi gtor/ mngon par
346a2(khri brgyad): gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng na/ me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa zhig tu gyur to// 
346a3(khri brgyad): gser dang dngul gyi me tog dag na mkha' la gzhal med khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to// chos gos dang / gos rin po che dag kyang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor
346a4(khri brgyad): 'khor bar 'dug par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/ byang
346a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che ba 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sem/ sa te/ ngo mtshar to// byang chub sems dpa' sems
346a6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing de ltar mthu che/ 'di ltar gzi brjod che ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / rdzu 'phrul
346a7(khri brgyad): rnam par sprul pa 'di 'dra na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas pa ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu ma
346a8(khri brgyad): lnga brgya de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba chen po bskyed nas/ de dag thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang /
