346b1(khri brgyad): chub tu sems bskyed de// 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag cag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gyur/ 
346b2(khri brgyad): cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis chos gang thob par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos
346b3(khri brgyad): rnams thob par gyur cig/ bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams mngon sum du gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang / 
346b4(khri brgyad): 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byed pa 'di bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur sti byed par shog
346b5(khri brgyad): shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che sa 'phags ji ltar ston pa bzhin du bdag cag/ nga skye bo mang po la ston par gyur cig/ ji ltar byang
346b6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing / yongs rdzogs pa 'di bzhin du/ bdag cag
346b7(khri brgyad): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongasu rdzogs par shog shig/ ces smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
346b8(khri brgyad): chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
347a1(khri brgyad): chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rkang pa la mgo la phyag 'tshal nas
347a2(khri brgyad): zhes byed cing thal mo sbyar te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ byang chub sems
347a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di la/ bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol zhing 'brog dgon par phyin pa na sgra thos pa/ 
347a4(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro// zhes bad dag gis sgra de thos nas/ shar phyogs ga la ba der
347a5(khri brgyad): logs mchis nas/ 'di snyam du bsame te/ bdag gi sgra de la ji srid cig tu mchi bar bgyi/ su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan cing rnyed par 'gyur ba ma dri so
347a6(khri brgyad): snyam ste/ des bdag yid mi bde zhing shin tu gdung bar gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te/ de ltar shin tu gdung bas/ zas la sems pa ni ma byung gi gzhan du na
347a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig yid la bgyis te/ ji srid du mchi bar bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di su las gnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur sgra de la ma driso snyam pa dang
347a8(khri brgyad): de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs shig byung ste/ de 'di skad gsungs ngo // rigs kyi bu khyod 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar song dang / grong khyer spos ldan zhe
347b1(khri brgyad): bya ba de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyu ro zhes gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs
347b2(khri brgyad): de las/ bdag gis 'di thos nas ji ltar btams pa bzhin tu/ shar phyogs ga la ba de log su zhugs te/ mchis pa dang / rgyang ring mo zhig nas 'phags pa chos ston pa mthong ste/ 
347b3(khri brgyad): mthong ma thag tu/ bdag la bde ba 'di lta bu skyes pa/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po la zhugs pa bzhin te/ bdag dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba des khyab par gyur nas/ sa
347b4(khri brgyad): phyogs de nas ma bskyod par khyod las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos// de nyan pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po skyes par gyur to// bdag de na mchis pa na/ phyogs
347b5(khri brgyad): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi// dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu legaso leg so// khyod kyi ting 'dzin 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha
347b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa las skyes pa yin te/ 'di la gnas pas nged kyis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongasu rdzogs par byaso zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag la shin tu leg
347b7(khri brgyad): par bstan nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ 'di snyam du bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gad
347b8(khri brgyad): du bzhud snyam mo// de nas yang bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa chos 'phags ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa/ 
348a1(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la shin tu bslabs pa lags te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas
348a2(khri brgyad): byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa/ de bdag la ston par 'gyu ro snyam nas rigs kyi khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gsheg/ 
348a3(khri brgyad): pa de dag gang du bzhud pa bdag 'drin ci nas/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud pa 'tshal cing de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar de bzhin
348a4(khri brgyad): gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud pa bdag la bsha du gsol// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri ba rgyad stong pa las/ rtag par rab tu ngu'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 
348a5(khri brgyad): brgyad cu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de skad ces smras par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
348a6(khri brgyad): rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni gang nas kyang ma byon gang du yang ma bzhud de/ de nyid las ma g.yos so// de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de
348a7(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu mi skye ba la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med de/ mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'ong ba 'am// 
348a8(khri brgyad): 'gro ba med de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med de/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
348b1(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu ji lta ba bzhin la/ 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ ji lta ba bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang bral ba la/ 
348b2(khri brgyad): 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med de/ 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'gog pa la/ 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ 'gog pa gang
348b3(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu na mkha'i khams la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med de/ na mkha'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu
348b4(khri brgyad): chos de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa gud med de/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de debazhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di ni// de bzhin
348b5(khri brgyad): nyid cig pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid la gnyi su byar med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ 'di lta ste// med pa'i phyir gnyis sam/ gsum du bgrang ba las 'das
348b6(khri brgyad): pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ de per na mi nyi mas gdungs pas/ sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la/ nyi ma gung gi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ smig rgyu g.yo ba mthong nas/ der chu btung ngo zhes de dang
348b7(khri brgyad): der rgyug na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems te/ chu de gang nas 'ongs/ gang du song / chu de shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ byang
348b8(khri brgyad): phyogs kyi rgya mtsho gang du song / rtag tu ngus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu smig rgyu la chu ma mchis na/ 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba ga la mchis te/ rigs kyi bu mi nyi mas gdungs shing / byis pa'i
349a1(khri brgyad): rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyis/ smig rgyu mthong nas/ chu ma mchis pa la/ chur 'du shes bskyed kyi/ de la chu ni rang
349a2(khri brgyad): bzhin gyis ma mchis so// chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyis bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu gang su dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs
349a3(khri brgyad): sam/ sgrar mngon par zhen par byed pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am/ bzhud par rtog go// gang de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am/ bzhud pa rtogs pa
349a4(khri brgyad): de dag thams cad ni/ byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ she sa rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ste/ dper na/ mi de chu med pa la chur 'du shes skyed pa bzhin no// 
349a5(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi skur mi blta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o// rigs kyi bu chos nyid ni 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro
349a6(khri brgyad): ba med de/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byon pa 'am/ bzhud pa med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma sprul pa glang po che'i tshogs sam/ 
349a7(khri brgyad): rta'i tshogs sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs la/ 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la'ang
349a8(khri brgyad): byon pa'am/ bzhud pa med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ 
349b1(khri brgyad): gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ bcu 'am/ nyi shu'am/ sum bcu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu'am/ de las lhag pa zhig mthong ba las/ sad pa dang / de/ 
349b2(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ gang du bzhud/ rtag tu ngus smras pa/ rigs
349b3(khri brgyad): kyi bu rmi lam la chos gang yang grub pa mi gda'o// rmi lam ni rdzun te yang dag pa ma lags so// chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad
349b4(khri brgyad): ni de bzhin gshegs pas/ rmi lam lta bu'o// zhes gsungs so// rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pas/ chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur yang
349b5(khri brgyad): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan par mi shes pa de dag ni/ ming dang mtshan gyi sku dang / gzugs kyi skur mdo/ na par zhen par byed de/ de ltar chos nyid mi shes pas
349b6(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang / bzhud par rtog go// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang / bzhud par 'dod pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni/ 'khor ba
349b7(khri brgyad): 'gro ba drug par dong ba/ 'dong ba 'dong bar 'gyur ba'o// de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi
349b8(khri brgyad): chos las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu gang dag chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu la/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o// zhes yang dag par
350a1(khri brgyad): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu bstan par shes pa de dag ni/ chos gang la yang 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par mi rtog go/ gang dag
350a2(khri brgyad): chos nyid la yang 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par mi rtog pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu shes so// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa
350a3(khri brgyad): chos nyid du rab tu shes pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am/ bzhud par mi rtog go// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de lta bur rab tu shes pa de dag ni/ 
350a4(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye b.ra'agyur ba ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dpa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos de dag ni
350a5(khri brgyad): yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za ste/ ded de dag ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnaso// rigs kyi bu de lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che dag
350a6(khri brgyad): yod pa ni shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ sems can
350a7(khri brgyad): de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che dag byung ste/ de dag kyang rgyu med par 'byung ba ma yin mod kyi/ rgyu dang rkyen dang / gzhi la rag las pa
350a8(khri brgyad): yin te/ brten nas byung // rin po che de dag 'gag pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du yang mi 'pho mod kyi/ rkyen de dag yod na/ rin po che dag rab tu 'byed do// rkyen
350b1(khri brgyad): de dag med na rin po che dag rab tu dbye ba yang med par 'gyu ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku mngon par grub pa yang / gang nas kyang ma byon/ phyogs
350b2(khri brgyad): bcu'i 'jig rten gang du yang ma bzhud do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu med pa yang ma yin te/ sngon spyod pas yongasu grub pa yin pas/ rgyu dang rkyen la rag las
350b3(khri brgyad): pa/ sngon gyi phrin las rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no// de dag kyang rkyen rnams yod na/ sku mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag med na sku mngon par 'grub par
350b4(khri brgyad): yang mi snang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na po ba rang gi sgra byung ba yang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gag yang gang du yang mi 'gro/ gang du yang mi 'pho ste/ brten na
350b5(khri brgyad): 'byung ba/ rgyu la rag las/ rkyen las rag las pa 'o// 'od lta ste/ pi bang gi khog pa la brten/ bag sa pa la brten/ rgyud la brten/ shing bu la brten// rgyud
350b6(khri brgyad): rten la rten/ mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba la brten nas/ pi bang de las sgra byung ste/ sgra de yang pi bang gi khog pa las ma byung / bag pa las ma byung / rgyud las ma byung / shing bu
350b7(khri brgyad): las ma byung / rgyud rten las ma byung / mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las sgra mi byung mod kyi/ de dag thams cad 'dus pa las kyang sgrar grag la/ sgra de 'gag pa yang gang du yang mi
350b8(khri brgyad): 'gro ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongasu 'grub pa yang / rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba du mas/ yongasu
351a1(khri brgyad): su grub pa yin te/ rgyud gcig gis ma yin/ rkyen gcig gis ma yin/ dge ba'i tsa ba gcig gis/ sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/ 
351a2(khri brgyad): rgyu med pa yang ma yin no// rgyu dang rkyen mang po tshogs pa las 'byung ba yin te/ de ni gang nas kyang ma byon to// rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med kyang / gang du yang mi bzhud de/ rigs
351a3(khri brgyad): kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang bzhud pa de ltar blta'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyod kyis 'di bzhin du khong du chud par gyis shig/ rigs
351a4(khri brgyad): kyi bu khyod gang tshun chad de ltar de bzhin gshegs da pa dang / chos thams skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par shes pa de tshun chad khyod bla na med pa yang dag par
351a5(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la nges par spro/ da par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa dang / 
351a6(khri brgyad): bzhud pa med pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sa g.yo ba chen po byung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug du g.yos pa 'di lta ste/ g.yos
351a7(khri brgyad): rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang dkrogs shing / spa skong par gyur to// stong gsu
351a8(khri brgyad): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rtsa dang / shing gil pa dang / nags tshal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos
351b1(khri brgyad): 'phags ga la ba der log su rab tu 'dud par gyur to// dus ma yin pa'i me tog kyang steng gi bar snang las 'thor zhing / me tog gi char dag kyang bab bo// lha'i dbang po brgya byin/ 
351b2(khri brgyad): dang rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul/ lha'i rtsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog dag gi 'thor/ mngon par 'thor/ 
351b3(khri brgyad): mngon par rab tu 'thor zhing / tshig 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng bdag cag gis kyang / don dam pa las byung ba'i gtam 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa/ 
351b4(khri brgyad): gang 'jig tshogs la gnas thams cad kyis ma yin pa bstan pa thos so zhes 'dzer to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la
351b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu sa g.yos pa chen po byung ba 'di/ rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags// chos
351b6(khri brgyad): 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byon/ ma bzhud pa 'di khyod kyis dris te/ kho bos bstan pas/ srogs chags brgyad khris mi skye ba'i chos la
351b7(khri brgyad): bzod pa thob par gyur pa dag/ khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / srog chags drug khri bzhi stong / chos rnams la chos
351b8(khri brgyad): kyi mig rdul med cing / dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag par bar gyur pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dga' ba dang / rangs pa rgya chen po dang
352a1(khri brgyad): ldan par gyur te/ bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / bzhud pa med pa bstan pa 'di dris
352a2(khri brgyad): pas sems can 'di rnyed kyi don byas par gyur pa ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// 'di nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i
352a3(khri brgyad): rtsa ba mchog gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phyir the tsom mi bya'o// bdag ni the tsom med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
352a4(khri brgyad): rgyasu 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / de dga' ba dang / rangs da pa de dang ldan pas/ ta la bdun tsam du/ namakha da' la 'phags nas/ ta la bdun tsam na 'dug ste/ 
352a5(khri brgyad): bdag na mkha' la 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o snya ma du sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
352a6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du mngon par 'phags pa mthong nas/ de'i sems sems kyis shes nas/ de la lha'i me tog mnad ra ba dag byin te/ 'di skad
352a7(khri brgyad): du rigs kyi bu me tog 'di dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bskur sti gyis shig/ 'di ni ngas khyod yongasu bzung ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu
352a8(khri brgyad): khyod kyi mthus/ srogs chags stong phrag ma de'i don byas te/ rigs kyi bu gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir/ ji ltar khyod spro bar byed pa de lta bur/ bskal pa grangs med
352b1(khri brgyad): dpag tu med par spro bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni/ rnyed par dka'o zhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i dbang po brgya
352b2(khri brgyad): byin las me tog blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos 'phags la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ bdag gis
352b3(khri brgyad): lus kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par bkab ste/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu deng slan chad khyod kyi rim gro dang / 
352b4(khri brgyad): zham ring bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag gi lus khyod la dbu dal lo// des bdag gis lus phul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos 'phag
352b5(khri brgyad): kyi mdun tu thal mo sbyar te 'dug go// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dag 'khor lnga brgya de dag gi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad
352b6(khri brgyad): ces smras so// rigs kyi bu bdag cag kyang khyod la lus 'bul gyis/ bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ chos de dag thob par gyur cig/ khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu
352b7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bkur bsti bgyid/ de dag dang nye bar gyur par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu
352b8(khri brgyad): dus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smraso// bu mo dag khyod/ kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas par byed na/ kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas
353a1(khri brgyad): bdag nyid byin cig dang bu mo khyod kho bos blang ngo // bu mo de dag gis smras pa/ khyod la lhags pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas/ khyod kyi rjesu
353a2(khri brgyad): 'thun par 'jug go// khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pas/ ci 'dod pa bya bar bdag nyid 'bul lo// de dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ tshong dpon
353a3(khri brgyad): gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ shing rta lnga brgya yang brgyan nas/ de thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
353a4(khri brgyad): 'phags la phul te/ rigs kyi bu bdag ni 'khor 'di dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya de dag kyang yongasu longs spyad pa'i phyir/ khyod la 'bul lo// de nas lha'i
353a5(khri brgyad): dbang po brgya byin gyis/ rigs kyi bu de la legs so zhe sa bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu leg so legs so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
353a6(khri brgyad): gis bdog pa thams cad yongasu btang bar bya'o// yongasu gtong ba'i sems de lta bus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
353a7(khri brgyad): rgya'o// de ltar na chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa nyan nus ste/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
353a8(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
353b1(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa yongasu dris so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
353b2(khri brgyad): chos 'phags kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa lnga brgya po de dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
353b3(khri brgyad): yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs ste/ blangs nas/ rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu la byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags stan las langs te/ 
353b4(khri brgyad): bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang / nyi ma nub par gyur nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'di ltar
353b5(khri brgyad): bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la/ 'dug pa 'am/ nyal bar byed pa ni/ bdag gi mi cha la 'di ni ma legs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
353b6(khri brgyad): chen po chos 'phags 'di lta ste/ chos ston du phyir ma byung gi bar du bdag 'greng ba dang / 'chags pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis gnas par bya'o snyam// de nas byang chub sems// 
353b7(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing // byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin grangs
353b8(khri brgyad): med dpag tu med pa dag dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
354a1(khri brgyad): rtag tu ngul/ lo bdun gyis bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa mabyung / gnod sems kyi rtogs pa ma byung / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pa ma byung / grol
354a2(khri brgyad): bskam pa ma skyes te/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po chos 'phags nam ldang bar 'gyur/ bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
354a3(khri brgyad): chos 'phags kyi chos kyi khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri bshams na bdag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag btab kyi legs par
354a4(khri brgyad): byugs la me tog sna tshogs gtor te/ sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs
354a5(khri brgyad): la mkhas pa rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der legs par byugapar bya'o snyam mo// tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang / byang chub sems
354a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob cing / spyod lam gnyis kyi dus 'da' bar byed de/ bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
354a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i sgra thos te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin 'dil ldang te/ langs nas grong khyer gyi dbus
354a8(khri brgyad): su 'dug ste/ chos ston par 'gyu ro zhes grags nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i sgra de thos pa dang / dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu mgu zhing / dga'
354b1(khri brgyad): ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya dang / sa phyogs de phyags nas chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad kyis smras pa bshams so// de
354b2(khri brgyad): nas bu mo de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos phud de/ stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas/ chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo // 
354b3(khri brgyad): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sa phyogs der chag chag gdab par 'dod na/ bdud sdig can gyis chu thams cad mi snang bar byas nas
354b4(khri brgyad): ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tur du chu ma rnyed nas yid mi dga' zhing / sems sdug bsngal te/ sems gzhan du gyur pa dang / dge
354b5(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang / mchod pa de yang mi ma/ dzes par bya ba'i phyir// chu de dag mi snang bar byas nas/ kun tu chu 'tshel na chu mi rnyed do// de nas
354b6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi lus phug la khrag gi sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab po// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs
354b7(khri brgyad): 'di ni rdul che ste/ rdul gyi khams 'di nas byung bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung na/ bdag gi lus gdon mi za
354b8(khri brgyad): bar 'jig pa 'dis ci zhig bya bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig pa ni sla'i nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i gzhis 'khor ba dag na bdag gi
355a1(khri brgyad): lus brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i gnasu zhig pa ni cir yang ma rung ngo snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus
355a2(khri brgyad): mtshon rnon po blangs te/ bdag gi lus la kun tu phug nas/ rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu chag chag btab po// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
355a3(khri brgyad): po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su spobs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya de dag thams cad kyis kyang / mtshon rnon po blangs te/ rang rang gi lus phug nas/ rang
355a4(khri brgyad): rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de chag chag btab ste/ gang de dag la bdud sdig can gyis dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar cha dbya ba'i glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba ra/ byang chub
355a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / bu mo de dag sems gzhan du gyur pa med do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du/ byang chub sems
355a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di/ 'di ltar chos 'dod pa dang / 'di ltar yid dam la brtan pa dang / 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang srog dang / 
355a7(khri brgyad): longs spyod rnams la mi lta ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog
355a8(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas nas/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa las/ sems can thar bar bya'o snyam du lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa ni ngo mtshar che'o snyam du semaso// de nas
355b1(khri brgyad): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ khrag de dag thams cad lha'i tsan dan gyi chur byin gyis brlab so// wA'i tsan+dan gi chu de'i dri dam pa/ rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ sa/ 
355b2(khri brgyad): phyogs de khor khor yug du/ dpag tshad brgya tsam gyis bar dris khyab bo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di
355b3(khri brgyad): skad ces smras// rigs kyi bu leg se legs so// khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab bo// khyod kyis chos 'dod pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba blan med // 
355b4(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang lhags pa'i bsapa de lta bu dang / brtson 'grus
355b5(khri brgyad): 'di lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag pa rabasgrub so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
355b6(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan btang sa phyogs 'di phyag dar ni byas/ chag chag
355b7(khri brgyad): ni btab na bdag gi gang dag gis/ sa phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags/ chos 'chad pa la gtor
355b8(khri brgyad): nga bya ba dang / me tog de dag gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam du sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la
356a1(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu lha'i me tog man da rab 'di dag long la/ khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di dag du me tog bkram par gyis
356a2(khri brgyad): shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos ston cing seng ge'i khril 'dug pa la yang gtor cig ces/ des de la lha'i me tog man da ra ba khal
356a3(khri brgyad): stong byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus me tog de dag blangs te/ me tog kha cig gis ni sa phyogs der me tog bkram pa byas so// 
356a4(khri brgyad): me tog kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sem das dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor to// de/ denas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
356a5(khri brgyad): 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ chos kyi stan gang na yod pa der 'ongs nas stan bting ba la 'dug ste/ 'khor brgya stong
356a6(khri brgyad): phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun gyi bltas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus byang chub
356a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la
356a8(khri brgyad): byed pa bzhin du/ bde ba de lta bu thob po// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston 'di ni 'di lta ste/ 
356b1(khri brgyad): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid / 
356b2(khri brgyad): chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad rlom sems med pa nyid bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
356b3(khri brgyad): phyin pa rloms sems med pa nyid do// chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas/ 
356b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do// cho nas thams cad mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// chos thams cad skye ba
356b5(khri brgyad): med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa
356b6(khri brgyad): med pa nyid do// nam mkha' mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// 
356b7(khri brgyad): ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid do// nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do// gzugs
356b8(khri brgyad): mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa nyid pas/ 
357a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// sa'i khams mu med pa nyid las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// tshul
357a2(khri brgyad): khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// na mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha
357a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas/ shes
357a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do// chos tha mas cad dmig su med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigasu med pa nyid do// chos thams
357a5(khri brgyad): cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas/ 
357a6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pasam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 
357a7(khri brgyad): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du/ de ltar 'dug bzhin du/ de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes par gyur to// 
357a8(khri brgyad): chos thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rlom sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge/ 
357b1(khri brgyad): 'dzin dang / chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ro cig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mu med pa zhes bya
357b2(khri brgyad): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / na mkha' mu med
357b3(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / na mkha' rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i
357b4(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang gzugs mu med pa zhes bya/  ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
357b5(khri brgyad): mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa'i kham sa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chu'i mas dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu
357b6(khri brgyad): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / na mkha'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes
357b7(khri brgyad): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigasu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'dzag pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting
357b8(khri brgyad): nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// byang
358a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob par gyur to// shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
358a2(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste/ brgyad cu rtsa drug pa'o// // rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
358a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 
358a4(khri brgyad): phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
358a5(khri brgyad): 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi yongasu bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi bdun gyis bltas te/ tshul 'di
358a6(khri brgyad): lta bu nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na/ da lta nga stong gsum gyi stong
358a7(khri brgyad): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ chos ston pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas
358a8(khri brgyad): nas tshul 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa bzhin no// de mang du thos pa bas gyis mi khyab
358b1(khri brgyad): pa dang / thos pa rgya mtshol bu dang ldan par gyur te/ gar skyes pa thams cad du yang / sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar gyur to// skye ba thams cad du yang / gang dang
358b2(khri brgyad): gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du 'gyur ba dang / de dag tu skyes te/ tha na rmi lam du yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang mi 'bral bar gyur
358b3(khri brgyad): des mi khom pa thams cad ni spangs dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni bsgrub so// rab 'byor rnams grangs 'dis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ byang
358b4(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub pa yin par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ byang chub
358b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thams cad/ mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pa dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o// 
358b6(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par yongasu bzung ba'i phyir/ 
358b7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig/ tshongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ kun dga'
358b8(khri brgyad): bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis/ mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ glags par bya/ 
359a1(khri brgyad): kun chub par bya/ gdon par bya// lung nod par bya// bstan par bya/ kha don du bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlangs
359a2(khri brgyad): kyis/ glegs bam chen po la/ yi ge bsal zhing rab tu gsal ba/ legs par bris te/ me tog dang / bdug po dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / 
359a3(khri brgyad): gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / kho ra khor yug du/ mar mo'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang pos/ bkur stir bya/ bla
359a4(khri brgyad): mar bya/ ri mor bya/ mchod par bya/ rjed par bya/ gsol bar bya ste/ kun dga' bo 'di ni nga'i ga dam ngag go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo de
359a5(khri brgyad): ji snyam du sems de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ ba com ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa lag so// bde bar
359a6(khri brgyad): gshegs pa bdag gis ston pa lagaso// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
359a7(khri brgyad): kun dga' bo khyod kyi ston pa// de bzhin gshegs pa la/ kun dga' bo khyod kyi lus kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag gi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / yid
359a8(khri brgyad): kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas/ rim gro byas so// kun dga' bo de lta bas na/ da lta nga bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sku 'di la/ khyod kyis phangs pa dang // 
359b1(khri brgyad): dad pa dang / gus par byas pa bzhin dung 'das nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang byos shig/ kun dga' bo ci nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
359b2(khri brgyad): 'di nub par mi 'gyur zhing / ci nas khyod skyes bu tha mar mi 'gyur bar khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du yongasu gtad do// rjes su yongs su gtad do// kun
359b3(khri brgyad): dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten du ji srid du spyod pa/ de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo de srid du/ 
359b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pas chos ston par rig par bya'o// / kun dga' bo// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba/ 
359b5(khri brgyad): dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / sto na pa dang / kha don du byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba
359b6(khri brgyad): dang me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / khor/ 
359b7(khri brgyad): yug du/ mar me'i 'phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis/ bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ rjed par byed// gsol
359b8(khri brgyad): bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ma bral ba dang / dam pa'i chos matan pa da ma bral ba dang / dge 'dun la rim 'gro byed pa dang ma bral bar rigs par bya'o//
